column1: There were varying degrees of Romanization throughout Roman Dacia.
column2: 整个罗马达契亚有不同程度的罗马化。

column1: The most Romanized segment was the region along the Danube, which was predominately under imperial administration, albeit in a form that was partially barbarized.
column2: 罗马化程度最高的部分是多瑙河沿岸地区，该地区主要由帝国管理，不过其形式为部分野蛮化。

column1: The population beyond this zone, having lived with the Roman legions before their withdrawal, were substantially Romanized.
column2: 在罗马军团撤退前，该地区以外的人口与他们生活在一起，基本上已经罗马化。

column1: The final zone, consisting of the northern portions of Maramures, Crisana, and Moldavia, stood at the edges of Roman Dacia.
column2: 最后一个区域由马拉穆列什、克里萨拉和摩尔达维亚组成，位于罗马达契亚的边缘。

column1: Although its people did not have Roman legions stationed among them, they were still nominally under the control of Rome, politically, socially, and economically.
column2: 虽然罗马军团没有驻扎其中，但人们在政治、社会和经济方面仍然名义上处于罗马的控制之下。

column1: These were the areas in which resided the Carpi, often referred to as the Free Dacians.
column2: 这些地区居住着卡尔皮人，通常被称为自由达契亚人。

column1: In an attempt to fill the cities, cultivate the fields, and mine the ore, a large-scale attempt at colonization took place with colonists coming in "from all over the Roman world".
column2: 为了充盈城市、耕种田地和开采矿石，进行了大规模的殖民化尝试，殖民者“从罗马世界的各个角落”涌入。

column1: The colonists were a heterogeneous mix: of the some 3,000 names preserved in inscriptions found by the 1990s, 74% (c. 2,200) were Latin, 14% (c. 420) were Greek, 4% (c. 120) were Illyrian, 2.3% (c. 70) were Celtic, 2% (c. 60) were Thraco-Dacian, and another 2% (c. 60) were Semites from Syria.
column2: 殖民者鱼龙混杂：在 20 世纪 90 年代发现的大约 3,000 个保存在铭文中的名字中，74%（约 2,200 人）是拉丁人，14%（约 420 人）是希腊人，4%（约 120 人）是伊利安人，2.3%（约 70 人）是凯尔特人，2%（约 60 人）是色拉科-达契亚人，另外 2%（约 60 人）是来自叙利亚的闪米特人。

column1: Regardless of their place of origin, the settlers and colonists were a physical manifestation of Roman civilisation and imperial culture, bringing with them the most effective Romanizing mechanism: the use of Latin as the new lingua franca.
column2: 无论他们来自哪里，定居者和殖民者都是罗马文明和帝国文化的实际体现，他们带来了最有效的罗马化机制：使用拉丁语作为新的通用语。

column1: The first settlement at Sarmizegethusa was made up of Roman citizens who had retired from the legions.
column2: Sarmizegethusa 的第一个村落由从军团退役的罗马公民组成。

column1: Based upon the location of names scattered throughout the province, it has been argued that, although places of origin are hardly ever noted in epigraphs, a large percentage of colonists originated from Noricum and western Pannonia.
column2: 根据散落该省各地的名称的位置来看，有人认为，尽管铭文中几乎没有注明原籍地，但很大一部分殖民者来自诺里库姆和潘诺尼亚西部。

column1: Specialist miners (the Pirusti tribesmen) were brought in from Dalmatia.
column2: 专业矿工（佩拉斯特部落成员）是从达尔马提亚带来的。

column1: These Dalmatian miners were kept in sheltered communities (Vicus Pirustarum) and were under the jurisdiction of their own tribal leadership (with individual leaders referred to as princeps).
column2: 这些达尔马提亚矿工被生活在群落庇护所 (Vicus Pirustarum) 并由他们自己的部落领导（称为第一公民的个人领袖）进行管辖。

column1: An estimated 50,000 troops were stationed in Dacia at its height.
column2: 在达契亚的鼎盛时期，估计有 50,000 名士兵驻扎在达契亚。

column1: At the close of Trajan's first campaign in Dacia in 102, he stationed one legion at Sarmizegetusa Regia.
column2: 102 年，在达契亚的第一次战役结束后，图拉真在 Sarmizegetusa Regia 驻扎了一个军团。

column1: With the conclusion of Trajan's conquest of Dacia, he stationed at least two legions in the new province – the Legio IV Flavia Felix positioned at Berzobis, and the Legio XIII Gemina stationed at Apulum.
column2: 随着图拉真对达契亚的征服结束，他在这个新行省至少驻扎了两个军团 - 驻扎在 Berzobis 的 Flavia Felix 第四军团和驻扎在 Apulum 的 Gemina 第十三军团。

column1: It has been conjectured that there was a third legion stationed in Dacia at the same time, the Legio I Adiutrix.
column2: 据推测，同一时期还有第三个军团驻扎在达契亚，那就是 Adiutrix 第一军团。

column1: However, there is no evidence to indicate when or where it was stationed, and it is unclear whether the legion was fully present, or whether it was only the vexillationes who were stationed in the province.
column2: 不过，没有证据表明它于何时何地驻扎，也不清楚该军团是否全员出动，或者是否只有分队驻扎在该省。

column1: Hadrian, the subsequent emperor, shifted the fourth legion (Legio IV Flavia Felix) from Berzobis to Singidunum in Moesia Superior, suggesting that Hadrian believed the presence of one legion in Dacia would be sufficient to ensure the security of the province.
column2: 后来的皇帝哈德良将第四军团（Flavia Felix 第四军团）从 Berzobis 转移到 Moesia Superior 的 Singidunum，表明了哈德良认为在达契亚派驻一个军团就足以确保该省的安全。

column1: The Marcomannic Wars that erupted north of the Danube forced Marcus Aurelius to reverse this policy, permanently transferring the Legio V Macedonica from Troesmis (modern Iglița in Romania) in Moesia Inferior to Potaissa in Dacia.
column2: 多瑙河以北爆发的马克曼尼战争迫使马库斯奥雷留斯改变了这一策略，将马其顿第五军团从 Moesia Inferior 的 Troesmis（现今的罗马尼亚 lglita）永久转移到达契亚的 Potaissa。

column1: The Kingston Fossil Plant is located on a peninsula at the junction of the Emory River (to the north) and Clinch River (to the south and east), just over 4 miles (6.4 km) upstream from the latter's mouth along the Tennessee River.
column2: Kingston 化石发电厂位于埃默里河（北部）与克林奇河（南部和东部）交界处的一个半岛上，距离后者沿田纳西河的河口仅 4 英里（6.4 公里）。

column1: Watts Bar Dam, located along the Tennessee 38 miles (61 km) downstream from the mouth of the Clinch, impounds a reservoir (Watts Bar Lake) that spans a 72-mile (116 km) stretch of the Tennessee (to Fort Loudoun Dam), the lower 23 miles (37 km) of the Clinch (to Melton Hill Dam), and the lower 12 miles (19 km) of the Emory.
column2: Watts Bar 大坝位于克林奇河口下游 38 英里（61 公里）的田纳西河沿岸，蓄积的水库（Watts Bar 湖）横跨田纳西 72 英里（116 公里）（到 Fort Loudoun 大坝）、克林奇下游 23 英里（37 公里）（到 Melton Hill 大坝），以及埃默里下游 12 英里（19 公里）。

column1: The plant, originally known as the Kingston Steam Plant, began operations in 1954, primarily to provide electricity to atomic energy installations at nearby Oak Ridge.
column2: 该工厂原名为 Kingston 蒸汽厂，于 1954 年开始运营，主要为附近 Oak Ridge 的原子能装置供电。

column1: The plant contains nine units with a combined generating capacity of 1,398 megawatts, and burns about 14,000 tonnes (14,000,000 kg) of coal every day.
column2: 该厂有 9 台机组，总发电量为 1,398 兆瓦，每天燃烧约 14,000 吨（14,000,000 公斤）煤。

column1: The plant's ash pond disposal area is located immediately north of the plant along the Emory River shore.
column2: 该厂的灰场处理区位于工厂北边的埃默里河岸边。

column1: The ash pond, which was impounded by a dike that rose 60 feet (18 m) above the winter level and 741 feet (226 m) above sea level, contained a watery slurry of fly ash generated by the burning of finely ground coal at the power plant.
column2: 灰场由比冬季水位 60 英尺（18 米）高和海平面以上 741 英尺（226 米）的堤坝蓄水，里面有发电厂燃烧细碎煤炭所产生的水状飞灰浆。

column1: Fly ash is the fine particulate pollutants produced by the combustion of coal, which are collected rather than allowing them to escape into the atmosphere, then mixed with water and pumped into a retaining pond, where the ash gradually settles to the bottom.
column2: 飞灰是煤炭燃烧产生的细粒污染物，它们会被收集起来，不会让它们逃逸到大气中，然后与水混合并泵入蓄水池，在那里煤灰逐渐沉淀到底部。

column1: Once the particulate matter settles out, it is dredged and moved to drying cells.
column2: 颗粒物质沉淀后，就会被挖出并移至干燥室。

column1: The 84-acre (0.34 km²) unlined above-ground dredge cell was surrounded by 60-foot (18 m) tall earthen dikes.
column2: 占地 84 英亩（0.34 平方公里）的无衬里地上疏浚室由 60 英尺（18 米）高的土堤包围。

column1: The dike breach occurred at the northwest corner of the dewatering pond, overlooking the Swan Pond Creek spillway.
column2: 堤坝决口发生在脱水池的西北角，俯瞰 Swan Pond Creek 的泄洪道。

column1: TVA had reportedly known about the dangers of using wet storage ponds for coal ash since a 1969 spill in Virginia in which coal ash seeped into the Clinch River and killed countless fish.
column2: 据报道，自从 1969 年弗吉尼亚州发生煤灰泄露事件，煤灰渗入克林奇河并导致无数鱼类死亡后，TVA 就知道了使用湿式储存池处理煤灰的危险性。

column1: In the 1980s, TVA engineers raised concerns about the stability of ash ponds.
column2: 在 20 世纪 80 年代，TVA 的工程师提出了对灰池稳定性的担忧。

column1: The utility repeatedly found leaks in levees and seepage in the soil at many of their ash ponds, including the ones at Kingston.
column2: 该电厂多次发现他们许多灰场的堤坝泄露并渗入土壤，其中就包括 Kingston 的灰场。

column1: However, TVA continued to make small repairs instead of switch to dry storage systems which would have cost ratepayers tens of millions.
column2: 然而，TVA 继续进行小规模维修，而不是改用原本会耗费纳税人数千万美元的干式储存系统。

column1: At the time of the disaster, TVA was using wet storage at six of their 11 coal-fired power plants.
column2: 在灾难发生时，TVA 旗下 11 家煤电厂中有 6 家在使用湿式储存。

column1: Leaks at the Kingston ash ponds had reportedly been taking place since the early 1980s, and local residents said that the spill was not a unique occurrence.
column2: 据报道，自 20 世纪 80 年代初以来，Kingston 灰场一直在发生泄露，当地居民称，这次泄露并非特例。

column1: The 1960s-era pond had been observed leaking and being repaired nearly every year since 2001.
column2: 自 2001 年以来，这个上世纪 60 年代的灰场几乎每年都发生泄露和修理。

column1: The two worst leaks occurred in 2003 and 2006 in which TVA suspended all ash deposits in the ponds to allow the dredge cells to dry out and stabilize.
column2: 两次最严重的泄露发生在 2003 年和 2006 年，当时 TVA 暂停了灰场中的所有煤灰沉积以使疏浚室干燥并稳定下来。

column1: An October 2008 inspection report had identified a "minor leak" in the faulty wall, but the report was not finalized.
column2: 2008 年 10 月的一份检查报告中认定故障墙体有“轻微泄露”，但并未最终敲定该报告。

column1: The spill began sometime between midnight and 1 a.m.
column2: 泄露开始于午夜和凌晨 1 点之间的某个时间。

column1: In January 1973 Young was made Chief of the Space Shuttle Branch of the Astronaut Office.
column2: 1973 年 1 月，Young 被任命为宇航员办公室航天飞机处处长。

column1: In January 1974, he became Chief of the Astronaut Office after the retirement of Alan Shepard.
column2: 1974 年 1 月，在 Alan Shepard 退休后，他成为宇航员办公室主任。

column1: Young flew two missions of the Space Shuttle, both aboard the Space Shuttle Columbia.
column2: Young 执行了两次航天飞机的飞行任务，两次任务都在哥伦比亚号航天飞机上进行。

column1: He commanded the program's 1981 maiden orbital flight, STS-1, and in 1983 commanded STS-9, which carried the first Spacelab module.
column2: 他指挥了该计划在 1981 年的首次轨道飞行 STS-1，并在 1983 年指挥 搭载了第一个太空实验室模块的 STS-9。

column1: In 1986 he was in line to make a record seventh space flight on STS-61-J to deploy the Hubble Space Telescope, but the Space Shuttle Challenger disaster earlier that year had delayed NASA's schedule.
column2: 1986 年，他准备在 STS-61-J 上进行创纪录的第七次太空飞行，部署哈勃太空望远镜，但该年早些时候的挑战者号航天飞机灾难推迟了美国航空航天局的计划。

column1: Young was openly critical of NASA management following the Challenger disaster, and in April 1987 was made Special Assistant to JSC Director Aaron Cohen for Engineering, Operations and Safety.
column2: 在挑战者号航天飞机灾难发生后，Young 公开批评美国航空航天局管理层，并于 1987 年 4 月被任命为 JSC 主任 Aaron Cohen 的工程、运营和安全特别助理。

column1: NASA denied that his criticism triggered the move, although Young and industry insiders believed that was the reason for the reassignment.
column2: 尽管美国航空航天局否认他的批评引发了这一举动，不过 Young 和业内人士认为这是他被调任的原因。

column1: In February 1996, he was assigned as Associate Director (Technical) JSC.
column2: 1996 年 2 月，他被任命为 JSC 副主任（技术）。

column1: During his NASA career, Young logged more than 15,000 hours of training, mostly in simulators, to prepare for positions on eleven spaceflights in prime and backup crew positions.
column2: Young 在美国航空航天局的职业生涯中，进行了超过 15,000 小时的训练，大部分在模拟器中进行，为 11 次太空飞行的主要和后备乘员位置做准备。

column1: Young worked for NASA for 42 years and announced his retirement on December 7, 2004.
column2: Young 为美国航空航天局工作了 42 年，于 2004 年 12 月 7 日宣布退休。

column1: He retired on December 31, 2004, at the age of 74, but continued to attend the Monday Morning Meeting at the Astronaut Office at JSC for several years thereafter.
column2: 他于 2004 年 12 月 31 日退休，时年 74 岁，但此后数年继续参加在 JSC 宇航员办公室举行的周一早会。

column1: He logged more than 15,275 hours flying time in props, jets, helicopters, and rocket jets; more than 9,200 hours in T-38s; and 835 hours in spacecraft during six space flights.
column2: 他在道具、喷气机、直升机和火箭喷气机上的飞行时间超过 15,275 小时；在 T-38 飞机上的飞行时间超过 9,200 小时；六次太空飞行中在航天器上飞行了 835 小时。

column1: On April 12, 2006, Young appeared at the 25th anniversary of the STS-1 launch at the Kennedy Space Center Visitor Complex, along with pilot Robert Crippen.
column2: 2006 年 4 月 12 日，Young 亮相肯尼迪航天中心参观园区的 STS-1 发射 25 周年纪念会，一同出现的还有飞行员 Robert Crippen。

column1: The two spoke of their experiences during the flight.
column2: 两人谈到了他们在飞行中的经历。

column1: In 2012, Young published an autobiography, Forever Young.
column2: 2012 年，Young 出版了一本自传《永远的 Young》。

column1: Young married Barbara White of Savannah, Georgia, and they had two children, Sandra and John.
column2: Young 与佐治亚州 Savannah 的 Barbara White 结婚，生育了 Sandra 和 John 两个孩子。

column1: They were divorced in 1972 after 16 years of marriage.
column2: 结婚 16 年后，他们于 1972 年离婚。

column1: He later married Susy Feldman, and lived in El Lago, Texas, a suburb of Houston.
column2: 后来他与 Susy Feldman 结婚，住在德克萨斯州的 El Lago，位于休斯顿的郊区。

column1: Young died on January 5, 2018, at his home in Houston of complications from pneumonia.
column2: 2018 年 1 月 5 日，Young 在休斯顿的家中因肺炎并发症去世。

column1: He was 87.
column2: 享年 87 岁。

column1: Abbotsford Bridge is a steel Allan truss bridge that is about 240 m (790 ft) in length.
column2: Abbotsford 大桥是一座钢制艾伦桁架桥，全长约 240 米（790 英尺）。

column1: The bridge also contains a single lift span about 20 m (66 ft) in length, which is still in working order.
column2: 该桥还有一个长约 20 米（66 英尺）的升降式桥孔，该桥孔仍处于工作状态。

column1: It is two lanes wide through most of its length, but the lift span is only capable of carrying a single lane.
column2: 它的大部分长度为双车道，但升降式桥孔只能承载单车道。

column1: The entire bridge has been marked with a single lane and has traffic lights on both ends to control vehicular flow.
column2: 整座桥被标为单车道，两端都有交通灯来控制车流量。

column1: The bridge was completed in 1928 by the NSW Department of Public Works and, although opened as a traffic bridge, it was designed to carry the loads required for a railway, once the Mildura railway line had been extended over the bridge.
column2: 该桥于 1928 年由新南威尔士州公共工程部完成，虽然是作为交通桥开放，但在 Mildura 铁路线延伸过这座桥后，它被设计为承载铁路所需的负荷。

column1: The line was never extended beyond Yelta, where the terminus remains to this day.
column2: 这条线路从未延伸到 Yelta 之外，那里的终点站至今仍在。

column1: The location of the bridge was thought to be convenient, as it provided a link to the Sturt Highway without travelling farther upstream to Mildura.
column2: 这座桥的位置便利，因为它提供了连接 Sturt 公路的通道，不用再往上游的 Mildura 行进。

column1: It is the only remaining steel truss bridge with a lift span on the Murray, although other lifting bridges still exist along the river.
column2: 这是 Murray 河上仅存的一座有升降式桥孔的钢桁架桥，不过沿河仍有其它升降桥。

column1: The bridge was built after the decline in commercial river traffic on the Murray.
column2: 这座桥是在 Murray 河的商业河道交通衰退后建造的。

column1: Due to its significance to the local area, it has been listed on the NSW State Heritage Register.
column2: 鉴于它对当地的重要性，它已被载入新南威尔士州遗产名录。

column1: The nearby town of Wentworth was an important river port from which wool was shipped to the coast, and as such there was a variety of traffic in the area.
column2: 附近的 Wentworth 镇是一个重要的河港，羊毛从这里运往海岸，因此该地区交通便利。

column1: In the 1890s, irrigated farming greatly expanded in Sunraysia region which is known for its fruit production, and traffic volumes increased further.
column2: 19 世纪 90 年代，以水果生产闻名的 Sunraysia 地区的灌溉农业大大扩张，交通量进一步增加。

column1: It was decided to install a punt at this location (then known as Abbot's Ford).
column2: 人们决定在这个地方（当时称为 Abbot's Ford）安装一个船坞。

column1: New South Wales and Victoria had signed an agreement towards constructing bridges for railways over the Murray to serve the settlements on the northern side.
column2: 新南威尔士州和维多利亚州签署了一项协议，将为 Murray 河上的铁路建造桥梁，来服务北侧的村落。

column1: In 1923, a report was released that recommended going ahead with the building of four bridges, one of those being the future Abbotsford Bridge.
column2: 1923 年，在发布的一份报告中，建议继续建造四座桥梁，其中一座就是后来的 Abbotsford 大桥。

column1: It was said a bridge in this area would benefit Curlwaa, Wentworth, and a proposed irrigation scheme to the north.
column2: 据称，在这个地区建桥将有利于 Curlwaa、Wentworth 和一项拟议的北部灌溉计划。

column1: The cost was estimated at £78,000.
column2: 费用估计为 78,000 英镑。

column1: It had been considered that it might be appropriate to combine these four bridges with locks, but this idea was rejected due to siting concerns.
column2: 有人认为也许可以将这四座桥与水闸结合起来，但由于选址问题，这个想法被拒绝。

column1: In 1924, residents of nearby settlements urged construction of the railway line to the proposed bridge site, but they were told this extension of the line was to be delayed.
column2: 1924 年，附近村落的居民敦促将铁路线修建到拟议的桥址，但他们被告知铁路线延伸将被推迟。

column1: Within that year it was decided that a bridge was to be constructed due to increased traffic volume, and tenders were let for manufacture of the bridge spans, construction of abutments and piles, and transport of materials to the future construction site.
column2: 同年，由于交通量增加，决定建造一座桥，并对桥孔的制造、桥墩和桩基的建造以及对日后工地的材料运输进行了招标。

column1: Achebe expanded this criticism when he presented a Chancellor's Lecture at Amherst on 18 February 1975, 'An Image of Africa: Racism in Conrad's "Heart of Darkness"'.
column2: 1975 年 2 月 18 日，Achebe 在阿莫斯特发表了题为“非洲的形象 - 康拉德《黑暗之心》中的种族主义”的校长讲座，扩大了这种批评。

column1: Decrying Joseph Conrad as "a bloody racist", Achebe asserted that Conrad's famous novel dehumanises Africans, rendering Africa as "a metaphysical battlefield devoid of all recognisable humanity, into which the wandering European enters at his peril."
column2: Achebe 谴责约瑟夫康拉德是“血腥的种族主义者”，断言康拉德的名著将非洲人非人化，将非洲描绘为“一个没有任何可承认的人性的形而上的战场，彷徨的欧洲人进入这个战场会有危险”。

column1: Achebe also discussed a quotation from Albert Schweitzer, a 1952 Nobel Peace Prize laureate: "That extraordinary missionary, Albert Schweitzer, who sacrificed brilliant careers in music and theology in Europe for a life of service to Africans in much the same area as Conrad writes about, epitomizes the ambivalence.
column2: Achebe 还讨论了 1952 年诺贝尔和平奖得主 Albert Schweitzer 的一段话：“那个非凡的传教士 Albert Schweitzer 牺牲了在欧洲的音乐和神学造诣，在康拉德笔下的同一地区为非洲人服务，他是这种矛盾心里的缩影。”

column1: In a comment which has often been quoted Schweitzer says: 'The African is indeed my brother but my junior brother.' And so he proceeded to build a hospital appropriate to the needs of junior brothers with standards of hygiene reminiscent of medical practice in the days before the germ theory of disease came into being." Some were surprised that Achebe would challenge a man honoured in the West for his "reverence for life".
column2: 在一段经常被引用的评论中，Schweitzer 说道：“非洲人确实是我的兄弟，但却是我的小弟。”于是他着手建造一所适合小弟需求的医院，其卫生标准不免让人想起病原菌学说出现前的医疗实践。”一些人对 Achebe 质疑一个在西方因“敬畏生命”而受到尊敬的人而感到吃惊。

column1: The lecture caused a storm of controversy, even at the reception immediately following his talk.
column2: 这次演讲引起了一场争议风暴，甚至在他演讲之后的招待会上也是如此。

column1: Many English professors in attendance were upset by his remarks; one elderly professor reportedly approached him, said: "How dare you!", and stormed away.
column2: 许多与会的英语教授对他的言论感到不满；据报道，一位年长的教授走到他面前，说：“你怎么敢！”，然后冲了出去。

column1: Another suggested that Achebe had "no sense of humour", but several days later Achebe was approached by a third professor, who told him: "I now realize that I had never really read Heart of Darkness although I have taught it for years." Although the lecture angered many of his colleagues, he was nevertheless presented later in 1975 with an honorary doctorate from the University of Stirling and the Lotus Prize for Afro-Asian Writers.
column2: 另一位教授认为 Achebe“没有幽默感”，但几天后，第三位教授找到了 Achebe，告诉他：“我现在意识到，尽管我已经教了《黑暗之心》很多年，但我从来没有真正读懂过它。”虽然这次演讲激怒了他的许多同事，但他还是在 1975 年被授予斯特林大学荣誉博士学位和亚非拉作家莲花奖。

column1: The first comprehensive rebuttal of Achebe's critique was published in 1983 by British critic Cedric Watts.
column2: 1983 年，英国批评家 Cedric Watts 发表了对 Achebe 的批判的第一次全面反驳。

column1: His essay "A Bloody Racist: About Achebe's View of Conrad" defends Heart of Darkness as an anti-imperialist novel, suggesting that "part of its greatness lies in the power of its criticisms of racial prejudice." Palestinian–American theorist Edward Said agreed in his book Culture and Imperialism that Conrad criticised imperialism, but added: "As a creature of his time, Conrad could not grant the natives their freedom, despite his severe critique of the imperialism that enslaved them".
column2: 他的文章“血腥的种族主义者：关于 Achebe 对康拉德的看法”为《黑暗之心》辩护，认为它是一部反帝国主义的小说，暗示“它的伟大之处在于它对种族偏见的批评的力量。”巴勒斯坦裔美国理论家 Edward Said 在他的《文化与帝国主义》一书中同意康拉德批判了帝国主义，但他补充道：“作为他那个时代的产物，康拉德不能给予当地人自由，尽管他对奴役他们的帝国主义进行了严厉的批判。”

column1: Building on Watts and Said, Nidesh Lawtoo argued that "underneath the first layer of straightforward opposition ... we find an underlying mimetic continuity between Conrad's colonial image of Africa [in Heart of Darkness] and Achebe's postcolonial representation" in Things Fall Apart.
column2: 在 Watts 和 Said 的基础上，Nidesh Lawtoo 认为，“在第一层直截了当的对立之下...我们发现康拉德[在《黑暗之心》中]的非洲殖民形象与 Achebe 在《瓦解》中的后殖民表现之间有一种潜在的模仿连续性。

column1: Achebe's criticism has become a mainstream perspective on Conrad's work.
column2: Achebe 的批判已经成为研究康拉德作品的主流观点。

column1: The essay was included in the 1988 Norton critical edition of Conrad's novel.
column2: 这篇文章被收录在 1988 年诺顿批判版的康拉德小说中。

column1: Editor Robert Kimbrough called it one of "the three most important events in Heart of Darkness criticism since the second edition of his book ..." Critic Nicolas Tredell divides Conrad criticism "into two epochal phases: before and after Achebe." Asked frequently about his essay, Achebe once explained that he never meant for the work to be abandoned: "It's not in my nature to talk about banning books.
column2: 编辑 Robert Kimbrough 称其为“自《黑暗之心》第二版以来对其批判的三大最重要事件之一……”，评论家 Nicolas Tredell 将康拉德批判“分为两个划时代的阶段：Achebe 之前和 Achebe 之后。”在人们经常问及他的文章时，Achebe 曾解释说他从未想过放弃这部作品：“谈论禁书并非我的本性。

column1: I am saying, read it – with the kind of understanding and with the knowledge I talk about.
column2: 我说的是，带着我说的那种理解和知识去阅读。

column1: And read it beside African works." Interviewed on National Public Radio with Robert Siegel, in October 2009, Achebe remains consistent, although tempering this criticism in a discussion entitled "'Heart of Darkness' is inappropriate": "Conrad was a seductive writer.
column2: 并且要连同非洲作品一起阅读。”2009 年 10 月，Achebe 在国家公共广播电台接受了 Robert Siegel 的采访，尽管在题为“《黑暗之心》不妥”的讨论中缓和了这种批判，但仍然保持一致。“康拉德是一位有魅力的作家。

column1: He could pull his reader into the fray.
column2: 他可以把他的读者拉到战场。

column1: And if it were not for what he said about me and my people, I would probably be thinking only of that seduction."
column2: 如果不是因为他对我和我的人民所说的话，我可能只会想到这种魅力。”

column1: When he returned to the University of Nigeria in 1976, he hoped to accomplish three goals: finish the novel he had been writing, renew the native publication of Okike, and further his study of Igbo culture.
column2: 1976 年回到尼日利亚大学时，他希望达成三个目标：完成他一直写作的小说，更新本土出版物《奥基凯》，并进一步研究伊博文化。

column1: He also showed that he would not restrict his criticism to European targets.
column2: 他还表明，他批判的对象并不局限于欧洲。

column1: In an August 1976 interview, he lashed out at the archetypal Nigerian intellectual, who is divorced from the intellect "but for two things: status and stomach.
column2: 在 1976 年 8 月的一次采访中，他抨击了典型的尼日利亚知识分子，他们与智力脱节，“只为两点：地位和胃口。

column1: On August 3, 2011, contestants Ricky Jaime and Sasha Mallory danced to "Schoolin Life" in Top 6 Perform round of the eighth season of the American television reality program and dance competition So You Think You Can Dance.
column2: 2011 年 8 月 3 日，在美国电视真人秀节目和舞蹈比赛《舞林争霸》第八季的 6 强表演赛中，参赛者 Ricky Jaime 和 Sasha Mallory 跳了“在校生活”。

column1: Their dance performance was choreographed by Kumari Suraj.
column2: 他们的舞蹈表演由 Kumari Suraj 编舞。

column1: Gwen Orel of The Wall Street Journal further described their performance during a review of that episode of the show: "He's in a fedora, and she's got a cute short swingy sheer skirt, with thigh high stockings and a garter belt, and a sheer purple blouse.
column2: 《华尔街日报》的 Gwen Orel 在对该节目那一集的评论中进一步描述了他们的表演：“他戴着宽沿绅士帽，她穿着可爱的短款摆动式薄纱裙，高筒袜和袜带，还有透明的紫色上衣。

column1: I don’t get what this style really is, it seems to have a lot of arm movements, and some crouching jumps.
column2: 我不知道这种风格到底是什么，它似乎有许多手臂动作，还有一些蹲跳。

column1: He doesn’t look quite sharp enough next to her.
column2: 他在她旁边看起来还不够犀利。

column1: His split leap is phenomenal."
column2: 他的劈叉跳很惊人。”

column1: The base slab, or pylon, of the tomb monument rests on a 38-centimetre (15 in) high plinth, separated by a cornice and concave mouldings.
column2: 墓碑的底板也叫塔台，位于 38 厘米（15 英寸）高的底座上，由檐口和凹模隔开。

column1: The pylon is 1.39 metres (4.56 ft) high and 2.02 metres (6.63 ft) wide, decorated with a frieze of winged angel heads (perhaps seraphim) and garlands and ribbons.
column2: 塔台高 1.39 米（4.56 英尺），宽 2.02 米（6.63 英尺），装饰有带翅膀的天使头像（可能是六翼天使）和花环及缎带。

column1: Above the pylon, separated by the cornice, are the three Virtues—from left to right, Faith, Charity, and Hope—in shell niches, separated by four Corinthian fluted pilasters.
column2: 塔台上方是由檐口隔开的三个美德 - 贝壳壁龛中从左到右是信仰、慈悲和希望，由四个柯林斯式的凹槽壁柱隔开。

column1: Such a motif is unprecedented in Tuscan funerary sculpture but found at this date in Venice, Padua, and especially Cossa's native Naples.
column2: 这样的装饰图案在托斯卡纳的墓葬雕塑中前所未有，但在威尼斯、帕多瓦，特别是 Cossa 的故乡那不勒斯都能找到。

column1: As a result, excursions to Venice have been suggested for both Michelozzo and Donatello.
column2: 因此，有人建议米开朗琪罗和多纳泰罗去威尼斯考察。

column1: However, Janson suggests that one "need not go all the way to Venice" to find such motifs.
column2: 然而，Janson 建议，“不必去往威尼斯”就能找到这样的装饰图案。

column1: Outside Florence, Virtues were common on tombs, with the cardinal Virtues used for laymen, and the theological virtues reserved for ecclesiastics, including the Brancaccio tomb.
column2: 在佛罗伦萨以外的地方，墓葬上的美德很常见，红衣主教的美德用于普通教徒，而神学美德留给教会人士，包括 Brancaccio 的墓。

column1: However, the Cossa Virtues, from their hair to their sandals, are more thoroughly antique.
column2: 然而，Cossa 美德从他们的头发到他们的凉鞋，都更加彻底地古香古色。

column1: Donatello also produced two similar bronze Virtues for the Siena Baptistry, whose chronological relationship to the Cossa Virtues is unclear.
column2: 多纳泰罗还为锡耶纳洗礼堂制作了两件类似的铜制美德，与 Cossa 美德的时间关系尚不清楚。

column1: The 1.05-metre (3.44 ft) tall Faith, to the right of Charity, is holding a Eucharistic chalice; the 1.07-metre (3.51 ft) tall Charity is holding a cornucopia and a brazier (or flaming vase); and the 1.06-metre (3.48 ft) tall Hope, to the left of Charity, has hands clasped in prayer.
column2: “慈悲”的右边是“信仰”，高 1.05  米（3.44 英尺），手持圣餐杯；“慈悲”高 1.07 米（3.51 英尺），手持聚宝盆和火盆（或火焰瓶）；“希望”位于“慈悲”左侧，高 1.06 米（3.48 英尺），双手合十祈祷。

column1: The central figure of Charity is the most antique, assimilating elements of Classical depictions of Abundantia, Ceres, and Juno, all of which were depicted with cornucopias in their left hands.
column2: “慈悲”的中心人物最古老，吸收了对 Abundantia、Ceres 和 Juno 的古典描绘元素，所有这些人都被描绘为左手拿着聚宝盆。

column1: Besides underscoring the antiquity of the tomb monument, the main purpose of the tall yet poorly finished Virtues is to put additional vertical distance between the viewer and the effigy, which has the cumulative effect of de-emphasizing the peculiarities of Cossa, in favor of a generic pontiff (i.e. a potential line of Florentine popes), by blunting the "immediacy" of the trope of lying in state, which was otherwise dominant on Quattrocento wall tombs.
column2: 除了强调墓碑的古老性之外，高大但完成度不高的美德的主要目的是增加观者与雕像之间的垂直距离，它具有一种不予强调 Cossa 特性的累积效应，即通过减弱公众瞻仰的“直接性”，有利于普通教皇（即潜在的一系列佛罗伦萨教皇），而这种特质在 Quattrocento 墙上墓葬中占据主导地位。

column1: On top of the sarcophagus, the bier of the effigy is supported by lions whose shape mimics Trecento consoles.
column2: 在石棺的顶部，雕像的棺材由形状模仿 Trecento 桌台的狮子支撑。

column1: The lions may be based on the Florentine Marzocco, as if to mark John XXIII in the same manner as a conquered city-state.
column2: 这些狮子可能以佛罗伦萨的 Marzocco 为根据，仿佛是以被征服的城邦相同的方式来纪念约翰二十三世。

column1: As Donatello's Marzocco for the papal apartment in Santa Maria Novella conveyed Florence's ambivalence towards Martin V (as both a source of prestige by visiting, and a potential adversary of the Republic), the lions supporting the bier contextualize the tomb monument's support for John XXIII's claim to the papacy by cementing it as a Florentine claim.
column2: 正如多纳泰罗为新圣母大殿所写的 Marzocco 传达了佛罗伦萨对马丁五世的矛盾态度（既是通过访问获得声望来源，又是共和国的潜在对手），支撑棺材的狮子使得墓碑支持约翰二十三世教皇地位的背景得以巩固，因而成为佛罗伦萨的主张。

column1: Yet, any iconographical interpretation of the lions must be taken with a grain of salt as lions are symbolically promiscuous, and are also seen as supports on earlier tombs, such as that of Lapo de' Bardi (d. 1342) in the Bargello.
column2: 然而，对狮子的任何图像学解释都必须谨慎对待，因为狮子象征着混乱，并且在早期坟墓上也视为支撑物，例如 Bargello 的 Lapo de' Bardi（卒于 1342 年）。

column1: The bier and the pall spread over it are tilted towards the viewer with the lion supporting the head standing 2-centimetre (1 in) shorter, increasing the visibility of the effigy, especially the head.
column2: 棺材和铺在上面的棺罩向观者倾斜，支撑头部的狮子矮了 2 厘米（1 英寸），增加了雕像的可见度，尤其是头部。

column1: The gilded-bronze, life-size effigy itself makes no attempt to argue for Cossa's papal status, dressing Cossa clearly in the costume of a cardinal; the bedding it rests on is of un-gilt bronze.
column2: 真人大小的镀金青铜雕像本身并没有试图为 Cossa 的教皇地位辩护，而是让 Cossa 身着红衣主教服装，它所依靠的垫子是未镀金的青铜。

column1: The opening in the 16th century of the sarcophagus confirmed that Cossa's actual burial clothes matched the effigy.
column2: 16 世纪石棺开棺证实了 Cossa 的实际葬服与雕像相符。

column1: There was no precedent for a three-dimensional gilded-bronze effigy on an Italian tomb monument; there was, however, a 6-foot (1.83 m) gilt bronze statue on the balcony of the Palazzo della Briada in Bologna commissioned by Pope Boniface VIII.
column2: 在意大利的墓碑上没有三维镀金铜像的先例；不过，在 Bologna 的 Palazzo della Briada 露台上有一尊 6 英尺（1.83 米）的镀金铜像，由教宗波尼法爵八世委托制作。

column1: Chief Wiggum pulls Troy McClure over for dangerous driving.
column2: Wiggum 局长以危险驾驶为由将 Troy McClure 拦下。

column1: Not wishing to be required to wear his glasses while driving, Troy goes to the DMV to get his license changed to remove the requirement.
column2: 特洛伊不希望被要求在驾驶时戴眼镜，于是去 DMV 更换了驾照，以解除这一要求。

column1: He offers to take DMV employee Selma Bouvier to dinner if she lets him pass the eye test, to which she agrees.
column2: 他提出，如果 DMV 员工 Selma Bouvier 让他通过视力测试，就带她去用餐，她同意了。

column1: After dinner, photographers notice Troy leaving with Selma and the story hits the news.
column2: 晚饭后，摄影师注意到 Troy 和 Selma 一同离开，这件事就上了新闻。

column1: The next day, Troy's agent, MacArthur Parker, calls and says that he can get work again if he continues seeing Selma.
column2: 次日，Troy 的经纪人 MacArthur Parker 打电话说，如果他继续和 Selma 约会，他就能再次得到工作。

column1: Troy continues to date her and his career begins to recover.
column2: Troy 继续和她约会，他的事业开始恢复。

column1: On his agent's advice, Troy asks Selma to marry him; she agrees.
column2: 在经纪人的建议下，Troy 向 Selma 求婚；她同意了。

column1: The night before the wedding, a drunk Troy tells Homer the reason for his marriage: he doesn't really love Selma, and he just plans to use her as a sham wife to help further his career.
column2: 在婚礼前夜，喝醉了的 Troy 告诉 Homer 他结婚的原因：他并非真的爱 Selma，只是打算把她佯装妻子来帮助他的事业发展。

column1: Although Homer fails to act, Marge and Patty try to explain it to Selma, who accuses them of just being envious.
column2: 虽然 Homer 没有采取行动，但 Marge 和 Patty 试图向 Selma 解释，Selma 指责他们只是嫉妒而已。

column1: She confronts Troy, who shamelessly admits that their marriage is a sham but explains she has everything she could want and will be "the envy of every other sham wife in town".
column2: 她与 Troy 对峙，Troy 无耻地承认他们的婚姻是一场骗局，但解释说她拥有她想要的一切，并且会成为“城里其他所有妻子艳羡的对象”。

column1: Selma has doubts, but accepts the situation because she fears being alone.
column2: Selma 带着疑虑，但还是接受了这种情况，因为她害怕孤独。

column1: Parker thinks he can get Troy the part of McBain's sidekick in McBain IV: Fatal Discharge, but concludes he will have a better chance if he has a family.
column2: Parker 认为他可以让 Troy 成为《麦克贝恩 4：致命排放》中 Mcbain 的助手，但他得出结论，如果他有家庭的话机会更大。

column1: Troy and Selma try to conceive a child, but neither feels comfortable with their situation, and Selma finally leaves after deciding that bringing a child into a loveless family is wrong.
column2: Troy 和 Selma 想怀孩子，但两人都对自己的处境感到不称心，Selma 断定把孩子带到一个没有爱的家庭是错误的之后，终于离开了。

column1: During the first half of the end credits, news confirmed that Troy turns down the role of McBain's sidekick to direct and star in his own film, The Contrabulous Fabtraption of Professor Horatio Hufnagel.
column2: 在谢幕的前半部分，有消息证实，Troy 拒绝了 McBain 的助手角色，执导并主演了自己的电影 《Contrabulous Fabtraption of Professor Horatio Hufnagel 》。

column1: Show runners Bill Oakley and Josh Weinstein were fans of actor Phil Hartman, who had been a recurring guest star since the second season.
column2: 节目主持人 Bill Oakley 和 Josh Weinstein 是演员 Phil Hartman 的粉丝，他从第二季开始就经常客串。

column1: They decided to produce an episode entirely about his character Troy McClure to give Hartman as much to do as possible.
column2: 他们决定制作一集完全关于他的角色 Troy McClure 的节目，以便让 Hartman 尽可能多地发挥。

column1: Oakley wanted to explore Troy's character because he had never interacted with the show's other characters before, only appearing on television.
column2: Oakley 想要探索 Troy 的性格，因为他以前从未与剧中其他角色互动过，只是在电视上出现过。

column1: The writers chose the plot idea of Troy's marriage to Selma Bouvier because she was "always marrying people".
column2: 编剧选择了 Troy 与 Selma Bouvier 结婚的情节思路，因为她“总是在和人结婚”。

column1: The episode's first draft was written by freelance writer Jack Barth, although the rest of the writing staff rewrote it.
column2: 该集的初稿由自由撰稿人 Jack Barth 撰写，不过其余编剧对它进行了改写。

column1: One aspect of the rewrite was the song "Dr. Zaius" from the Planet of the Apes musical, which the staff consider to be one of the greatest musical numbers ever written for The Simpsons.
column2: 改写的一个方面是《人猿星球》音乐剧中的歌曲“Zaius 博士”，工作人员认为这是为《辛普森一家》创作的最伟大的音乐作品之一。

column1: Clair was created for The Cosby Show by series creator, comedian Bill Cosby.
column2: 克莱尔是为《考斯比一家》创作的，由该剧集的创作者、喜剧演员比尔考斯比创作。

column1: Cosby originally pitched a series about a detective who solves crime using his wit and humor; Clair's earliest incarnation resembled his character's girlfriend, who is depicted as "a strong woman with her own career." Networks were not interested in developing the series, so Cosby opted for a somewhat more autobiographical approach instead.
column2: 考斯比最初提出了一部关于运用他的机智和幽默来解决犯罪问题的侦探连续剧；克莱尔最早的化身类似于他这个角色的女友，她被描述为“一个有自己事业的女强人”。Networks 对制作该剧集不感兴趣，因此考斯比选择了一种带点自传性质的方式。

column1: Cosby eventually based The Cosby Show on his stand-up comedy film Bill Cosby: Himself (1983), which heavily features jokes about his relationship with his wife and their interactions with their children.
column2: 考斯比最终以他的单口喜剧电影《比尔考斯比其人》(1983) 为基础拍摄了《考斯比一家》，其中大量笑话关于他与妻子的关系以及他们与孩子的互动。

column1: Clair is based on Cosby's real-life wife Camille.
column2: 克莱尔的原型是考斯比现实生活中的妻子卡米尔。

column1: Although the role of the parents in the show evolved dramatically from The Cosby Show's initial inception to final production, the one idea that was retained from Cosby's detective series was the concept of a strong career woman.
column2: 尽管从《考斯比一家》最初的构思到最后的制作，剧中父母的角色发生了巨大变化，但从考斯比的侦探剧集中保留下来的一种观点就是职场女强人的概念。

column1: When Cosby originally pitched The Cosby Show to NBC, it revolved around the life of a blue-collar couple; Clair was intended to be a plumber while the character's husband Cliff, portrayed by Cosby himself, was a limousine driver.
column2: 在考斯比最初向 NBC 推荐《考斯比一家》时，它围绕一对蓝领夫妻的生活展开；克莱尔打算成为一名水管工，而这个角色的丈夫则是一名豪车司机，由考斯比本人饰演。

column1: Eventually, the idea of Clair working as a plumber was discarded and the character briefly became a Dominican housewife instead.
column2: 最终，克莱尔当水管工的构思被抛弃，这个角色变成了一名昙花一现的多米尼加家庭主妇。

column1: Inspired by Ricky Ricardo from the sitcom I Love Lucy, of whom Cosby was a fan, much of the show's humor would have been directly derived from Clair's tendency to revert to her native language Spanish when upset or agitated.
column2: 该剧的灵感来自情景喜剧《我爱露西》中的 Rick Ricardo，考斯比是他的粉丝，该剧的大部分幽默直接源自克莱尔在不开心或激动时倾向于使用母语西班牙语。

column1: Describing this concept as "the reverse of [I Love] Lucy," Cosby explained that the husband "would be the person that didn’t understand when she spoke Spanish" as opposed to the wife.
column2: 考斯比将这一概念描述为“[我爱]露西的反面”，他解释说，不是妻子，而是丈夫“成为她说西班牙语时听不懂的人”。

column1: Camille and executive producers Marcy Carsey and Tom Werner eventually convinced Cosby that the series should feature a family that resembled their own more closely, specifically one headed by a pair of successful parents with white-collar professions.
column2: 卡米尔和执行制片人马西凯瑟以及汤姆华纳最终说服了考斯比，认为该剧应以与他们自己的家庭更接近的家庭为主角，特别是由一对从事白领职业的成功父母领导的家庭。

column1: Thus, Cosby relented and re-wrote Clair and Cliff into a lawyer and doctor, respectively.
column2: 于是，考斯比终于同意将克莱尔与克里夫分别改写为律师和医生。

column1: The idea of Clair being Dominican was abandoned before the pilot was filmed.
column2: 克莱尔是多米尼加人的构思在试拍之前就被放弃。

column1: However, the character still speaks some Spanish in the first episode and continues to speak the language periodically throughout the series, albeit not as frequently as Cosby had originally intended.
column2: 然而，该角色在第一集中仍会说点西班牙语，并在整个剧集中继续经常说这门语言，只不过不像考斯比当初设想的那样频繁。

column1: Cosby borrowed several names from his real-life family for his fictional one; Clair's maiden name is Hanks, which she shares with Camille.
column2: 考斯比从他现实生活中的家庭借用了几个名字作为虚构家庭中的名字；克莱尔的婚前姓氏是汉克斯，她与卡米尔都用这个姓氏。

column1: The second season explores each character gaining more responsibility, none more-so than Clair, who is deliberately provided with more storylines to experience and new emotions to express in terms of her relationship with her husband and children.
column2: 第二季探讨了每个角色获得更多的责任，尤其是克莱尔，她被刻意提供了更多的故事情节来体验，并在她与丈夫和孩子的关系方面表达新的情感。

column1: Clair is portrayed by American actress Phylicia Rashad.
column2: 克莱尔由美国女演员菲利西亚拉斯海德饰演。

column1: In addition to appearing in minor roles on both television and Broadway, Rashad had a recurring role as Courtney Wright on the soap opera One Life to Live before Cosby personally selected her to play his character's wife.
column2: 除了在电视和百老汇出演小角色外，在考斯比亲自挑选她饰演他的角色的妻子前，拉斯海德还在肥皂剧《只此一生》中多次饰演 Courtney Wright。

column1: Several actresses auditioned for the role, the majority of whom tended to resort to angrily yelling and moving their heads in a manner similar to that of a bobblehead doll when scolding the child actors playing the character's children during their auditions.
column2: 多位女演员参加了该角色的试镜，大多数人在试镜过程中责骂扮演这个角色的孩子的儿童演员时，往往采取愤怒地大喊大叫和类似摇头公仔的方式摇动他们的头部。

column1: However, Rashad's subtle interpretation was different from those of her competitors; when the actress screen tested opposite actor Malcolm Jamal-Warner, who would ultimately go on to portray son Theo, Rashad simply paused, stared and silently gave him "a look" instead of immediately scolding the character that, according to Cosby, meant "four or five things ... and none of them were good." At the end of Rashad's audition, Cosby announced "[Rashad is] Clair" to Carsey.
column2: 然而，拉斯海德的微秒解读与她的竞争对手不同；当这位女演员与最终扮演儿子 Theo 的演员马尔科姆贾马尔华纳进行试镜时，拉斯海德只是停顿了一下，盯着他然后默默地给了他“一个眼神”，而不是立即责骂这个角色，据考斯比说，这意味着“四五件事......而且都不是好事。”在拉斯海德试镜结束时，考斯比宣布“[拉斯海德就是]克莱尔”。

column1: Additionally, because Clair was still intended to be of Dominican heritage at the time, Rashad's own bilingualism and fluency in Spanish benefited her successful casting.
column2: 此外，由于当时克莱尔的人设仍是多米尼加人，拉斯海德本身的双语能力和流利的西班牙语对她的成功选角受益匪浅。

column1: Most of what is now NY 171 was improved to state highway standards as part of a project contracted out by the state of New York on July 12, 1916.
column2: 作为纽约州 1916 年 7 月 12 日外包项目的一部分，如今的 NY 171 大部分路段按州级公路标准进行了改进。

column1: The work covered the 5.10 miles (8.21 km) of the route outside of the Frankfort village limits.
column2: 该工程涵盖法兰克福村范围外 5.10 英里（8.21 公里）的路线。

column1: The reconstruction was completed in the 1920s, and the Frankfort Gorge road was added to the state highway system as unsigned State Highway 1346 (SH 1346) by 1926.
column2: 重建工作在 20 世纪 20 年代完成，法兰克福峡谷公路在 1926 年作为无标志的 1346 (SH 1346) 州级公路纳入州级公路系统。

column1: In the 1930 renumbering of state highways in New York, SH 1346 became part of NY 171, which continued northeast to Main Street in Frankfort on several state and locally maintained streets.
column2: 在 1930 年纽约州级公路重新编号时，SH 1346 成为 NY 171 的一部分，在几个州和当地维护的街道上继续向东北延伸到法兰克福主街。

column1: At the time, Main Street was part of NY 5S, another route assigned as part of the renumbering.
column2: 当时，主街所属的 NY 5S 是作为重新编号的一部分分配的另一条路线。

column1: In the late 1960s, a limited-access highway was constructed between Utica and Ilion alongside NY 5S. The new highway became part of a rerouted NY 5S in the early 1970s.
column2: 20 世纪 60 年代后期，在 Utica 和 Ilion 之间的 NY 5S 旁边修建了一条限制通行的公路。20 世纪 70 年代初，这条新公路成为改道后的 NY 5S 的一部分。

column1: As a result, NY 171, which does not interchange with the highway, no longer connects to any other signed state routes.
column2: 因此，没有与该公路交汇的 NY 171 不再与任何其他有标志的州级道路连通。

column1: NY 171 is the only signed state highway in New York that is completely isolated from the remainder of the state highway system.
column2: NY 171 是纽约州唯一一条有标志的州级公路，与州级公路系统的其余部分完全隔离开来。

column1: In 1992, Sony submitted plans that required approval by the New York City Planning Commission, in which it would take some of the open space in the building's atrium that had been used to obtain approval for additional floors on top of the building, and convert those areas into retail space.
column2: 1992 年，索尼提交了需要纽约市规划委员会批准的计划，其中将占用大楼中庭的一些开放空间，并将这些区域改建为零售空间，这些空间曾用于获得大楼顶部额外楼层的审批。

column1: In exchange, the company would expand the glass-enclosed pedestrian walkway with the addition of planters and public seating.
column2: 作为交换，该公司将扩大玻璃封闭的人行道，增加花坛和公共座椅。

column1: Sony expected that the proposed conversion of the 8,727 sq ft (810.8 m²) of public space could be converted into stores that could be leased at rates that The New York Times estimated could approach $200 per square foot.
column2: 据索尼预计，拟议的 8,727 平方英尺（810.8 平方米）的公共空间可以改建为商铺，据《纽约时报》估计其租赁价格可能接近每平方英尺 200 美元。

column1: The company noted that the space was underutilized as a public amenity because it was "dark, windy and noisy" and that its conversion to commercial space would provide "retail continuity" with the remainder of Madison Avenue.
column2: 公司指出，该空间作为公共设施未得到充分利用，因为它“黑暗、风大、嘈杂”，将其改建为商业空间将为麦迪逊大道的其余部分提供“零售连续性”。

column1: By 1996, Sony had consolidated most of the operations for its Sony Music Entertainment division at 550 Madison Avenue, for which The New York Times noted that "such high-profile and elaborate space is appropriate and necessary." That same year, Sony acquired additional space across the street at 555 Madison Avenue, a 445,000 sq ft (41,300 m²) building built in the 1960s that underwent renovations of its lobby, windows, bathrooms and other common spaces in conjunction with Sony's lease.
column2: 到 1996 年，索尼将索尼音乐娱乐部门的大部分业务整合到麦迪逊大道 550 号，《纽约时报》指出，“这样高调和精致的空间适当且有必要”。同年，索尼在街对面的麦迪逊大道 555 号购置了额外空间，这是一座建于 20 世纪 60 年代的 445,000 平方英尺（41,300 平方米）的大楼，根据索尼的租约对其大堂、窗户、浴室和其他公共空间均进行了翻新。

column1: Sony signed leases through 2013 on an additional 90,000 sq ft (8,400 m²) on the sixth through ninth floors of the building, on top of an initial rental of 90,000 sq ft (8,400 m²) of space on the second through fifth floors of the building that it had made in 1995.
column2: 在 1995 年初次租赁这栋大楼二至五层 90,000 平方英尺（8,400 平方米）空间的基础上，索尼签署了一直到 2013 年的租约，租赁了大楼六到九层的另外 90,000 平方英尺（8,400 平方米）空间。

column1: Rents on the floors had averaged about $34 per square foot at the time.
column2: 当时这些楼层的租金平均约为每平方英尺 34 美元。

column1: Sony connected the two buildings using fiber optic cables that were run under Madison Avenue and installed microwave communications equipment on the top of the 555 building.
column2: 索尼用光缆将这两栋大楼连通，光缆从麦迪逊大道下面穿过，并在 555 号大楼楼顶安装了微波通信设备。

column1: Sony made these moves, which included early termination of leases on space in the surrounding area at 711 Fifth Avenue on the 43rd floor at 9 West 57th Street, as part of an effort to lower occupancy costs by bringing its businesses closer together.
column2: 索尼做出这些举动，包括提前终止位于 9 West 57 街 43 楼的第五大道 711 号周边地区空间租约，是为了通过拉近业务而降低占用成本。

column1: A cash-strapped AT&T sold the building to Sony in 2002 for $236 million, or $315 per square foot.
column2: 2002 年，资金拮据的 AT&T 以 2.36 亿美元，即每平方英尺 315 美元的价格将这栋大楼出售给索尼。

column1: The building incorporated the Sony Wonder Technology Lab, a multimedia hands-on tour through the world of media, located in a four-story annex accessible through a glass-roofed atrium that connects 55th and 56th Streets in mid-block.
column2: 这栋大楼中有一间索尼奇迹技术实验室，提供遨游于媒体世界的多媒体实践之旅，位于一栋可以通过玻璃屋顶的中庭进入的四层附属建筑中，中庭连接街区中的第 55 和 56 街。

column1: It was open on Tuesdays through Saturdays, and Sony described the free exhibits as a "technology and entertainment museum for all ages".
column2: 它在星期二至星期六开放，索尼将其免费展品描述为“适合所有年龄的技术和娱乐博物馆”。

column1: During 2008, the museum's third and fourth floors underwent renovations that were completed in fall 2008.
column2: 2008 年间，博物馆三楼和四楼进行了翻新，并于 2008 年秋季竣工。

column1: Sony Wonder replaced Infoquest Center, a permanent telecommunications exhibition that had been built by AT&T.
column2: 索尼神奇技术实验室取代了 Infoquest 中心，它是由 AT&T 建造的永久性电信展览馆。

column1: Sony permanently closed the lab on January 29, 2016.
column2: 2016 年 1 月 29 日，索尼永久关闭了该实验室。

column1: On February 27, 2010, an accumulation of ice from the February 25–27, 2010 North American blizzard broke loose from an upper floor, breaking the glass ceiling of the atrium and injuring at least 15 inside who were attending a Purim celebration.
column2: 2010 年 2 月 27 日，2010 年 2 月 25-27 日北美暴风雪造成的积冰从上层松脱，打破了中庭的玻璃天花板，造成里面至少 15 名正在参加普珥节庆祝活动的人受伤。

column1: In December 2012, bidding started on the building and in January 2013 Sony announced plans to sell the building to the Chetrit Group for $1.1 billion – $685 million more than it had paid for it.
column2: 2012 年 12 月，该栋大楼开始招标，2013 年 1 月，索尼宣布计划以 11 亿美元的价格将该栋大楼出售给 Chetrit 集团 - 比曾经为它支付的价格多出 6.85 亿美元。

column1: Sony leased back its offices there through 2016, when it moved its headquarters south to 11 Madison Avenue.
column2: 索尼在那里租回了租约一直延续到 2016 年的办公室，将其总部南迁至麦迪逊大道 11 号。

column1: The Chetrit Group planned to redevelop the building as a combination of condominiums and a hotel.
column2: Chetrit 集团计划将该栋大楼重新开发为公寓和酒店的组合。

column1: Chetrit abandoned this plan and sold the building to Olayan and Chelsfield in 2016, relinquishing the "Sony Tower" name.
column2: Chetrit 放弃了这一计划，并在 2016 年将该栋大楼出售给 Olayan and Chelsfield，放弃了“索尼大厦”的名称。

column1: McNicoll relinquished command of HMAS Australia in July 1954 before the cruiser was paid off and marked for disposal the following month, and he briefly returned to duties at the Navy Office.
column2: 1954 年 7 月，McNicoll 放弃了对 HMAS 澳大利亚号的指挥权，随后这艘巡洋舰被付清，并在次月标记为处置，他暂时回归海军办公室的职责。

column1: In November, he embarked for London to attend the Imperial Defence College as part of the 1955 course intake, which signified that he had been marked for senior command. McNicoll and his wife, Ruth, had separated in 1950 and their divorce, which cited adultery as the cause, was finalised in October 1956, while the former was still in London.
column2: 11 月，作为 1955 年课程入学的一部分，他前往伦敦就读帝国国防学院，这标志着他已经被标记为高级指挥官。McNicoll 和他妻子 Ruth 于 1950 年分居，他们于 1956 年 10 月以通奸为由最终离婚，当时前者仍住在伦敦。

column1: On 17 May the following year, McNicoll wed Frances Mary Chadwick, a journalist, in the Hampstead register office.
column2: 次年 5 月 17 日，McNicoll 在 Hampstead 登记处与记者 Frances Mary Chadwick 结婚。

column1: Made acting rear admiral in January 1957, McNicoll was appointed as Head of the Australian Joint Service Staff in London.
column2: 1957 年 1 月 McNicoll 被任命为代理海军少将，担任澳大利亚驻伦敦联合服务参谋部主任。

column1: He returned to Australia in February 1958 and was selected to serve as Deputy Secretary (Military) at the Department of Defence; McNicoll's rank was made substantive in July that year.
column2: 1958 年 2 月他回到澳大利亚，获选国防部副部长（军事）；同年 7 月 McNicoll 的军衔被定为实职。

column1: On 8 January 1960, McNicoll was posted to the Naval Board in Canberra as Second Naval Member and Chief of Personnel.
column2: 1960 年 1 月 8 日，McNicoll 被派往堪培拉海军委员会担任第二海军委员和人事部长。

column1: As noted by historian Ian Pfennigwerth, McNicoll held this position at a time in which recruitment and retention in the Navy particularly lagged behind targets.
column2: 正如历史学家 Ian Pfennigwerth 指出的那样，McNicoll 担任这一职务期间的海军招聘和留用工作尤其落后于目标。

column1: McNicoll was additionally appointed as a trustee of the RAN Relief Trust Fund during this period.
column2: 在此期间，McNicoll 还被任命为 RAN 救济信托基金的托管人。

column1: Completing his term on the Naval Board, McNicoll was posted as Flag Officer Commanding HM Australian Fleet on 8 January 1962 and hoisted his standard aboard HMAS Melbourne, the flagship of the RAN.
column2: 完成海军委员会的任期后，McNicoll 于 1962 年 1 月 8 日被任命为 HM 澳大利亚舰队司令官，并在 HMAS 墨尔本号上升起了他的旗帜。

column1: The Australian government had designated the role of the RAN to be primarily one of anti-submarine warfare, a posture which McNicoll thought unwise.
column2: 澳大利亚政府已指明 RAN 的作用主要是反潜战，McNicoll 认为这种姿态不明智。

column1: McNicoll argued that surface and air weapons posed a threat equal to that of submarines toward vessels in modern naval warfare.
column2: McNicoll 认为，在现代海战中，水面和空中武器对船只构成的威胁与潜艇对船只的相当。

column1: As such, he campaigned for a contemporary aircraft carrier to replace that of HMAS Melbourne.
column2: 因此，他为建造一艘当代航母来取代 HMAS 墨尔本号而奔走呼号。

column1: The Army and Air Force opposed McNicoll's stance, and the government ultimately concluded that there was no strategic requirement for a new carrier in light of agreements contained in the Southeast Asia Treaty Organization.
column2: 陆军和空军反对 McNicoll 的立场，政府最终得出结论，根据东南亚条约组织中的协议，对新航母没有战略要求。

column1: In any event, McNicoll experienced a particularly demanding tenure as Fleet Commander since the RAN was in the process of a complete overhaul of its order of battle and, as a consequence, he had to manage the introduction and deployment into service of six Ton-class minesweepers acquired from the Royal Navy, along with the first batch of Westland Wessex helicopters and modernised afloat support capabilities.
column2: 无论如何，McNicoll 作为舰队指挥官经历了特别艰难的任期，因为 RAN 正在对其战斗秩序进行全面改革，因此，他必须管理从皇家海军购买的六艘吨级扫雷舰的引进和部署，以及第一批 Westland Wessex  直升机和现代化的海上支援能力。

column1: Furthermore, McNicoll was charged with the responsibility of ensuring Australian naval commitments to the Far East Strategic Reserve were met.
column2: 此外，McNicoll 还负责确保澳大利亚海军对远东战略储备的承诺得到履行。

column1: McNicoll's two-year term as Fleet Commander concluded on 6 January 1964, at which point he returned to the Naval Board as Fourth Naval Member and Chief of Supply.
column2: 1964 年 1 月 6 日 McNicoll 结束了作为舰队指挥官的两年任期，这时他重返海军委员会担任第四海军委员和补给部长。

column1: However, this post proved short-lived with his appointment as Flag Officer-in-Charge East Australia Area, headquartered at the land base HMAS Kuttabul in Sydney, from June that year.
column2: 然而，这个职位被证明很短暂，因为从该年 6 月起，他被任命为总部设在悉尼的 HMAS Kuttabul 陆地基地的东澳大利亚地区旗官。

column1: In the 1965 New Year Honours, McNicoll was appointed a Companion of the Order of the Bath.
column2: 在 1965 的新年荣誉中，McNicoll 获颁巴斯勋章。

column1: On 24 February 1965, McNicoll was promoted vice admiral and made Chief of Naval Staff (CNS) in succession to Vice Admiral Sir Hastings Harrington.
column2: 1965 年 2 月 24 日 McNicoll 晋升为海军中将，担任海军参谋长 (CNS)，接替海军中将 Hastings Harrington 爵士。

column1: By virtue of this position, McNicoll was head of the Naval Board and the functional commander of the RAN. McNicoll's term as CNS was characterised by a period of heightened activity for the RAN in light of the Australian commitments to the Indonesia–Malaysia Konfrontasi and the Vietnam War.
column2: 凭借这一职位，McNicoll 成为海军委员会主席和 RAN 的职能指挥官。在 McNicoll 担任 CNS 期间，鉴于澳大利亚对印尼-马来西亚对抗战和越南战争的承诺，澳大利亚海军在这一时期的活动非常频繁。

column1: The first movement is longer and more complex than any that Mozart had previously composed in the concerto genre.
column2: 第一乐章比莫扎特以前创作的任何协奏曲都更长、更复杂。

column1: It is in ; among Mozart's 27 piano concertos, No. 4 in G Major, No.
column2: 在莫扎特的 27 首钢琴协奏曲中，G 大调第 4 钢琴协奏曲、

column1: 11 in F major and No. 14 in E♭ major are the only others to commence in triple metre.
column2: F 大调第 11 钢琴协奏曲和 E♭ 大调第 14 钢琴协奏曲是唯一以三拍子开始的作品。

column1: The first movement follows the standard outline of a sonata form concerto movement of the Classical period.
column2: 第一乐章遵循古典时期奏鸣曲式协奏曲的标准提纲。

column1: It begins with an orchestral exposition, which is followed by a solo exposition, a development section, a recapitulation, a cadenza and a coda.
column2: 它以管弦乐呈示部开始，之后是独奏呈示部、发展部、再现部、华彩段和尾声。

column1: Within this conventional outline, Mozart engages in extensive structural innovation.
column2: 在这个传统的提纲中，莫扎特进行了广泛的结构创新。

column1: The development begins with the piano repeating its entry to the solo exposition, this time in the relative major of E♭.
column2: 发展部开始时，钢琴反复进入独奏呈示部，这次是用 E♭ 的相对大调。

column1: The Concerto No. 20 is the only other of Mozart's concertos in which the solo exposition and the development commence with the same material.
column2: 第 20 号协奏曲是莫扎特唯一一首其中的独奏和发展部以相同材料开始的协奏曲。

column1: In the Concerto No. 24, the material unfolds in the development in a manner different from the solo exposition: the opening solo motif, with its half cadence, is repeated four times, with one intervention from the woodwinds, as if asking question after question.
column2: 在第 24 号协奏曲中，发展部的材料以不同于独奏呈示部的方式展开；开场独奏主题以半拍重复四次，木管乐器介入一次，仿佛在问一个又一个问题。

column1: The final question is asked in C minor and is answered by a descending scale from the piano that leads to an orchestral statement, in F minor, of the movement's principal theme.
column2: 最后一个问题用 C 小调提出，并由钢琴的一个下降音阶来回答，以 F 小调的管弦乐陈述该乐章的主要主题。

column1: The orchestral theme is then developed: the motif of the theme's fourth and fifth measures descends through the circle of fifths, accompanied by an elaborate piano figuration.
column2: 管弦乐主题随后得到发展：主题的第四和第五小节的主题通过五度音圈下降，伴随精心制作的钢琴构图。

column1: After this, the development proceeds to a stormy exchange between the piano and the orchestra, which the twentieth-century Mozart scholar Cuthbert Girdlestone describes as "one of the few [occasions] in Mozart where passion seems really unchained", and which Tovey describes as a passage of "fine, severe massiveness".
column2: 在此之后，发展部继续进入钢琴和管弦乐队之间的激烈交锋，二十世纪的莫扎特学者 Cuthbert Girdlestone 将其描述为“莫扎特为数不多的激情似乎不受约束的[场合]之一”，而 Tovey 将其描述为一段“精美、排山倒海之势”。

column1: The exchange resolves to a passage in which the piano plays a treble line of sixteenth notes, over which the winds add echoes of the main theme.
column2: 交换的结果是钢琴演奏出十六分音符的高音线，管乐在此基础上加入主旋律的回声。

column1: This transitional passage ultimately modulates to the home key of C minor, bringing about the start of the recapitulation with the conventional re-statement, by the orchestra, of the movement's principal theme.
column2: 这段过渡性的乐段最终调整为 C 小调的主调，再现部开始，管弦乐队以常规方式再述该乐章的主旋律。

column1: The wide range of thematic material presented in the orchestral and solo expositions poses a challenge for the recapitulation.
column2: 管弦乐和独奏呈示部中的主体材料范围广泛，对再现部提出了挑战。

column1: Mozart manages to recapitulate all of the themes in the home key of C minor.
column2: 莫扎特设法在 C 小调的主调中再现所有主题。

column1: The themes are necessarily compressed, are presented in a different order, and in their restated form, contain few virtuosic moments for the soloist.
column2: 这些主题必然被压缩，以不同的顺序和重述的形式呈现，独奏者技巧性的时刻寥寥无几。

column1: The last theme to be recapitulated is the secondary theme of the orchestral exposition, which has not been heard for some 400 measures and is now adorned by a passage of triplets from the piano.
column2: 再现的最后一个主题是管弦乐呈示部的次要主题，它已经有大约 400 小节没有被听到，现在由钢琴的三连音段落来装饰。

column1: The recapitulation concludes with the piano playing arpeggiated sixteenths before a cadential trill leads into a ritornello.
column2: 再现部的最后，钢琴弹出了十六分音符的琶音，然后由节奏颤音引出回奏曲。

column1: The ritornello in turn leads into a fermata that prompts the soloist's cadenza.
column2: 回奏曲进而又引出提示独奏者华彩段的延音。

column1: All of Creation was nominated for two awards at the 42nd GMA Dove Awards: "Song of the Year" and "Pop/Contemporary Recorded Song of the Year".
column2: “一切造物”在第 42 届 GMA 圣鸽奖上获得两项提名：“年度歌曲”和“年度流行/当代唱片歌曲”。

column1: It was also nominated for "Christian Song of the Year" at the 2011 Billboard Music Awards.
column2: 它还被提名为 2011 年公告牌音乐奖的“年度基督教歌曲”。

column1: The Ones was written by co-executive producer Jack Burditt, and directed by Beth McCarthy, a long-time television director who worked with series creator Tina Fey on the sketch comedy show Saturday Night Live.
column2: “The Ones”由联合执行制片人 Jack Burditt 编剧，由长期电视导演 Beth McCarthy 执导，她曾与该系列的创作者 Tina Fey 在小品喜剧节目《周六夜现场》中合作过。

column1: This was Burditt's tenth writing credit, and was McCarthy's sixth directed episode.
column2: 这是 Burditt 的第十部作品，也是 McCarthy 执导的第六集。

column1: The Ones originally aired on NBC in the United States on April 23, 2009.
column2: “The Ones”最初于 2009 年 4 月 23 日在美国 NBC 播出。

column1: At the beginning of the episode, Jack and Liz are at a jewelry store, as Jack is searching for an engagement ring for Elisa.
column2: 在这一集的开头，杰克和丽兹在一家珠宝店，因为杰克正在为伊莉莎寻找订婚戒指。

column1: They shot that scene in a Cartier store in New York's Fifth Avenue, which was filmed on February 22, 2009. A scene featuring Sue LaRoche-Van der Hout (Sue Galloway) as the Grim Reaper, in which Jenna is led to believe Kenneth has gone into shock because of the strawberries, was cut from the airing.
column2: 他们在纽约第五大道的一家卡地亚商店拍摄了这一场景，拍摄时间为 2009 年2 月 22 日。一场由 Sue LaRoche-Van der Hout (Sue Galloway) 饰演 Grim Reaper 的戏，即引导珍娜相信肯尼斯因为草莓而休克的戏份，在播出时被剪。

column1: According to Jane Krakowski, in the DVD commentary for this episode, there were alternate scenes with Jenna letting Kenneth know about the tampering she did to Kenneth's items, his chickpea, water bottle, and harmonica.
column2: 据 Jane Krakowski 说，在这一集的 DVD 评论中，有一些交替的场景是珍娜让肯尼斯知道她对肯尼斯的东西，即他的鹰嘴豆、水瓶和口琴动了手脚。

column1: The Ones was actress Salma Hayek's final guest appearance on 30 Rock.
column2: “The ones”是女演员萨尔玛海耶克最后一次客串《我为喜剧狂》。

column1: Her first appearance on the show was in the episode "Señor Macho Solo", as a nurse for Jack's mother and love interest for him.
column2: 她在该节目中的第一次亮相是在“Señor Macho Solo”一集中，饰演杰克母亲的护士和他的恋爱对象。

column1: She next guest-starred in the episodes "Flu Shot", "Generalissimo", "St.
column2: 她接下来客串了“流感疫苗”、“大元帅”、“情

column1: Valentine's Day", and "Larry King".
column2: 人节”和“拉里金”。

column1: News anchor Brian Williams, of NBC Nightly News, guest-starred as himself in this episode.
column2: NBC 晚间新闻的新闻主播 Brian Williams 在这一集里客串他本人。

column1: In a scene with Tracy and Jack at a club, Tracy reveals to Jack that he has been giving out his phone number to different women, though it is not his real number, which results in Williams receiving the calls.
column2: 在特蕾西和杰克在俱乐部的一场戏中，特蕾西向杰克透露，他一直在向不同女人告知电话号码，不过并不是他的真实号码，这导致威廉姆斯接到了这些电话。

column1: Kenneth revealing that his real name is "Dick Whitman" is a reference to the main character Don Draper of Mad Men (played by Jon Hamm, who had a recurring role on 30 Rock earlier in the season).
column2: 肯尼斯透露他的真名是“迪克惠特曼”，是《广告狂人》中的主角唐德雷柏（由乔哈姆饰演，他在本季早些时候曾在《我为喜剧狂》中扮演过一个经常出现的角色）。

column1: Earn this, spoken by Kenneth as Jenna has poisoned him again, references the 1998 film Saving Private Ryan when actor Tom Hanks says the same words to actor Matt Damon's title character.
column2: 肯尼斯在珍娜再次给他下毒时说的“善待它”，参考了 1998 年的电影《拯救大兵瑞恩》，当时男演员汤姆汉克斯对饰演主角的男演员马特达蒙说了同样的话。

column1: When she is told that Kenneth has gone into a severe allergic shock and needs to have his hands cut off, Jenna apologizes to him for what she has done, telling him "I'm just a girl sitting in front of a boy she poisoned so this other guy would go to town on her", which Jenna misquotes from actress Julia Roberts' character from the romantic comedy Notting Hill (1999).
column2: 当她被告知肯尼斯出现了严重的过敏性休克并且需要砍掉他的双手时，珍娜为她的所作所为向他道歉，告诉他“我只是一个坐在她毒害的男孩面前的女孩，会有另一个男人会去城里找她”，珍娜错误地引用了浪漫喜剧《诺丁山》(1999) 中女演员茱莉亚罗伯茨的角色。

column1: After Kenneth drinks his strawberry water, as he risked his life so that Jenna can meet the paramedic again, Jenna says to Kenneth "You magnificent sonofabitch!", a line quoted by actor George C. Scott in the American biographical war film Patton (1970).
column2: 肯尼斯喝下草莓水后，冒着生命危险让珍娜再次见到救护人员，珍娜对肯尼斯说“你这个了不起的混蛋！”，这是男演员乔治 C 斯科特在美国传记战争片《巴顿》(1970) 中说过的一句话。

column1: Kenneth blows white smoke out while referencing bringing back something from "the other side" (death) echoes the same look when actor Haley Joel Osment remarked "I see dead people" in the movie The Sixth Sense (1999).
column2: 肯尼斯在提到从“另一个世界”（死亡）带回一些东西时吹出了白烟，这与电影《第六感》(1999) 中演员海利乔尔奥斯曼说“我看到死人”的表情相呼应。

column1: The final three clips in the montage of Tracy taking off his shirt are real clips from Tracy Morgan interviews.
column2: 特蕾西脱下衬衫的剪辑中的最后三个片段是特蕾西摩根采访的真实片段。

column1: Also, Elisa wears a "What the Frak?!" Battlestar Galactica t-shirt, as she admits her secret to Jack and Liz. "It's not product placement—I just like it!", says Liz to Jack, after he storms into her office and she is wearing a Slanket, a sleeved blanket with sleeves usually made of fleece material.
column2: 此外，伊莉莎穿了一件“搞什么？！”的太空堡垒卡拉狄加 T 恤，因为她向杰克和丽兹承认了她的秘密。“这不是产品植入 - 我就是喜欢而已！”，在杰克冲进她办公室后，丽兹这样对他说，她穿着袖毯，一种袖子通常由羊毛材料制成的带袖毛毯。

column1: In its original American broadcast, "The Ones" was watched by 6.3 million households, according to the Nielsen ratings system.
column2: 根据尼尔森评级系统，在最初的美国广播中，有 630 万户家庭观看了“The Ones”。

column1: Caesium is a relatively rare element, estimated to average 3 parts per million in the Earth's crust.
column2: 铯是一种相对稀有的元素，据估计在地壳中的平均含量为百万分之三。

column1: It is the 45th most abundant element and the 36th among the metals.
column2: 它是第 45 位最丰富的元素，在金属中排名第 36 位。

column1: Nevertheless, it is more abundant than such elements as antimony, cadmium, tin, and tungsten, and two orders of magnitude more abundant than mercury and silver; it is 3.3% as abundant as rubidium, with which it is closely associated, chemically.
column2: 然而，它比锑、 镉、锡和钨等元素丰富，比汞和银的含量高两个数量级；它的含量是铷的 3.3%，在化学上，它与铷密切相关。

column1: Due to its large ionic radius, caesium is one of the "incompatible elements".
column2: 由于其离子半径大，铯是“不相容元素”之一。

column1: During magma crystallization, caesium is concentrated in the liquid phase and crystallizes last.
column2: 在岩浆结晶过程中，铯以液相浓缩，最后结晶。

column1: Therefore, the largest deposits of caesium are zone pegmatite ore bodies formed by this enrichment process.
column2: 因此，最大的铯矿床是由这种富集过程形成的分带伟晶岩矿体。

column1: Because caesium does not substitute for potassium as readily as rubidium does, the alkali evaporite minerals sylvite (KCl) and carnallite (KMgCl
column2: 由于铯不像铷那样容易替代钾，碱蒸发岩矿物锡石 (KCl) 和光卤石 (KMgCl

column2: ₂O) 可能仅含 0.002% 的铯。

column1: Consequently, caesium is found in few minerals.
column2: 因此，只在少数矿物中发现了铯。

column2: ₆) 和氟硼钾石 ((K,Cs)BF

column2: ₂₈) 中高达 8.4 wt% CS2O，而在分布更广的棱菱锰矿中含量较少。

column1: A major theme in this story is that of a symbiotic relationship between a planet and its inhabitants, similar to that in The Word for World Is Forest.
column2: 这个故事的主要主题是一个星球与其居民之间的共生关系，与《世界的名字是森林》中的主题相似。

column1: In her introduction to the story, Le Guin stated "We all have forests in our minds.
column2: 在这个故事的介绍中，Le Guin 说道：“我们心中都有森林。

column1: Forests unexplored, unending.
column2: 未经探索的森林，没有尽头。

column1: Each of us gets lost in the forests, every night, alone." The "vegetable love" referred to in the poem from which the title is taken can be used to describe the final relationship between Osden and the planetary intelligence of World 4470.
column2: 每天晚上独自一人时，我们每个人都会在森林里迷路。”标题出处的那首诗中提到的“植物之爱”可以用来描述 Osden 和 4470 世界的行星智能之间的最终关系。

column1: When Osden is attacked by Porlock in the planet, he transmits his fear to the planet, which amplifies it and reflects it back at him.
column2: 当 Osden 在这个星球上受到 Porlock 攻击时，他将恐惧传给了星球，而星球将其放大并反射到他身上。

column1: Thus Osden's role is similar to that of Selver in The Word for World is Forest, in that he introduces violence to the forest world.
column2: 因此，Osden 的角色类似于《世界的名字是森林》中的 Selver，因为他将暴力引入了森林世界。

column1: The intelligence of Le Guin's forest has been contrasted to the "low" position occupied by vegetative beings in the works of other science fiction authors such as Arthur C. Clarke.
column2: Le Guin 笔下森林的智慧与 Arthur C. Clarke 等其他科幻作家作品中的植物人所占据的“低级”地位形成对比。

column1: An additional similarity between The Word for World Is Forest and "Vaster than Empires" is the theme of first contact between humans and a new environment.
column2: 《世界的名字是森林》和《甚于帝国》之间的另一个相似之处是人类与新环境的首次接触的主题。

column1: In "Vaster than Empires," the forest is both the setting for the story and a character in it.
column2: 在《甚于帝国》中，森林既是故事的背景，也是其中的一个角色。

column1: The forest directly responds to the humans with fear, a response that is similar to the response of Osden, the empath, to the rest of society: "the normal defensive-aggressive reaction between strangers meeting." Thus Le Guin makes an analogy between contact between humans and aliens, and contact between individual humans; both are contact between the self and the "other".
column2: 森林以恐惧直接回应人类，这种回应类似于异能者 Osden 对社会其他人的回应：“陌生人之间相遇时的正常防御 - 攻击回应。”因此 Le Guin 在人类与外星人的接触和人类个体之间的接触之间进行了类比；两者都是自我与“他人”之间的接触。

column1: Osden is depicted as having a strong empathetic connection with the vegetated planet visited by the explorers.
column2: Osden 被描绘为探险家访问的植被星球有着强烈的移情联系。

column1: This is in contrast to the sharply antagonistic relationship that the other members of the team have with him.
column2: 这与队伍中其他成员与他的尖锐对立关系形成鲜明对比。

column1: The team is depicted as a dysfunctional group, with each individual having quirks and oddities of their own.
column2: 这支队伍被描绘为一个不正常的群体，每个人都有自己的怪癖和奇怪之处。

column1: They are regarded as being of "unsound mind" by the people of Earth and Hain, because they were willing to travel on a voyage that lasted 500 years of actual time.
column2: 他们被地球和 Hain 的人视为“心智不全”，因为他们愿意踏上一段实际时间长达 500 年的旅行。

column1: The fear transmitted by the forest drives them further into their neuroticism.
column2: 森林传递的恐惧促使他们进一步陷入神经质。

column1: In contrast, Osden the empath surrenders completely to the forest, and thus achieves a mental unity with the planet.
column2: 相比之下，异能者 Osden 完全屈服于森林，从而实现了与地球的精神统一。

column1: In choosing a sort of union with the planet, Osden shows that the singular consciousness of the vegetative creature is preferable to the chaos and discord in human society.
column2: 在选择与地球的某种结合时，Osden 表明植物性生物的单一意识比人类社会的混乱和不和谐更可取。

column1: At the conclusion of the story Tomiko describes Osden's relationship with the planet, saying "He had taken the fear into himself, and, accepting, had transcended it.
column2: 在故事的结尾，Tomiko 描述了 Osden 与这个星球的关系，他说：“他已经把恐惧带给自己，而且接受并超越了它。

column1: He had given up his self to the alien, and unreserved surrender, that left no place for evil.
column2: 他已经把自己交给了外星人，毫无保留地投降，没有给邪恶留下任何空间。

column1: He had learned the love of the Other and thereby had been given his whole self." Osden achieves a completely empathetic relationship with the planet, "both literally and figuratively in touch with the forest;" which also grants him temporary goodwill towards humans, as he says "Listen, I will you well" before leaving his colleagues.
column2: 他已经学会了对他人的爱，从而得到了他的整个自我。”Osden 与这个星球实现了完全的移情关系，“从字面和象征意义上都与森林建立了联系；”这也赋予了他对人类暂时的善意，正如他在离开同伴前说“听着，我要你好好的”。

column1: Immediately after CR 557 joins US 40, the road enters Buena, Atlantic County and continues southeast into inhabited areas.
column2: 在 CR 557 与 US 40 汇合后，该公路立即进入大西洋县的 Buena，并继续向东南进入居民区。

column1: After running through the commercial center of town, where it crosses the Southern Railroad of New Jersey's Southern Running Track line, the road comes to the southern terminus of Route 54 and the eastern end of CR 619 in a business area located on the outskirts.
column2: 在穿过城镇的商业中心后，在那里穿过新泽西州南方铁路的南方运行轨道线，道路来到位于郊区商业区的 54 号公路南端和 CR 619 东端。

column1: At this point, it enters Buena Vista Township, and CR 557 splits form US 40 by heading to the southeast on Buena-Tuckahoe Road.
column2: 在该点，它进入 Buena Vista 镇，CR 557 从 US 40 分流，沿 Buena-Tuckahoe 路向东南方向延伸。

column1: From this point, US 40 becomes concurrent with CR 557 Truck and enters dense woodland containing homes and businesses as well as occasional farms.
column2: 从该点开始，US 40 与 CR 557 干线并行，进入茂密的林地，住宅和企业以及三三两两的农场穿插其中。

column1: The road reaches the residential community of Richland, where it encounters the eastern terminus of CR 540 and CR 622 and crosses Conrail Shared Assets Operations' Beesleys Point Secondary railroad line.
column2: 这条路到达 Richland 的住宅社区，在那里与 CR 540 和 CR 622 的东部终点站相遇，并穿过 Conrail Shared Assets Operations 的 Beesleys Point 二级铁路线。

column1: Upon leaving Richland, the route crosses into Hamilton Township, where it runs through Mizpah before heading back into forested areas and a few residential sectors.
column2: 离开 Richland 后，该路线进入 Hamilton 镇，在那里穿过 Mizpah，然后回到森林地区和一些住宅区。

column1: US 40 intersects the eastern terminus of CR 552, briefly becoming a divided highway before turning east into denser inhabited areas.
column2: US 40 与 CR 552 的东部终点相交，短暂地成为一条分叉公路，然后转向东部进入密集居住区。

column1: The highway intersects CR 559 Truck/CR 606, at which point it becomes concurrent with CR 559 Truck.
column2: 该公路与 CR 559 干线/CR 606 相交，在该点它与 CR 559 干线并行。

column1: The route meets Route 50, where CR 557 Truck splits to the south.
column2: 该路线与 50 号路线相交，CR 557 干线在此向南分叉。

column1: Route 50 joins US 40 before the road crosses the Great Egg Harbor River.
column2: 50 号路线在穿越 Great Egg Harbor 河之前与 US 40 相接。

column1: Upon crossing the river, the road enters Mays Landing and turns north into the downtown area.
column2: 过河后，该路进入 Mays Landing，向北转入市中心。

column1: CR 559 Truck splits southbound to follow CR 617 to the east.
column2: CR 559 干线向南分叉，沿着 CR 617 向东延伸。

column1: A short distance later, the road meets CR 559 and US 40 splits from Route 50 by turning east onto that route.
column2: 经过一小段距离后，该公路与 CR 559 相交，US 40 从 50 号路线分出，向东转入该路线。

column1: This intersection marks the beginning of CR 559 Truck northbound.
column2: 这个十字路口标志着 CR 559 干线开始北行。

column1: The road passes more development before CR 559 splits from the road by heading southeast.
column2: 在 CR 559 向东南方向分叉之前，这条路经过了更多的开发区。

column1: US 40 heads east out of Mays Landing, where it continues through woodland and increasing residential development.
column2: US 40 向东驶出 Mays Landing，继续穿过林地和越来越多的住宅开发区。

column1: The road widens into four lanes as it comes to US 322 (Black Horse Pike) near the Hamilton Mall.
column2: 到达汉密尔顿购物中心附近的 US 322 (Black Horse Pike) 时，道路拓宽为四车道。

column1: At this point, US 40 forms a concurrency with US 322, which lasts for the remainder of the route.
column2: 在该点，US 40 与 US 322 构成并行，一直持续到该路线的剩余部分。

column1: The two routes continue to the southeast through business areas, meeting CR 575 and a ramp to the Atlantic City Expressway.
column2: 这两条路线继续向东南方向穿过商业区，与 CR 575 和通往大西洋城高速公路的匝道相遇。

column1: CR 575 turns east to follow US 40/US 322.
column2: CR 575 向东转弯，沿着 US 40/US 322 延伸。

column1: Sixteen years before Oceanic 815 crashes on the island, Rousseau was a heavily pregnant member of a six-person crew aboard a French research vessel three days out of Tahiti.
column2: 在大洋航空 815 航班在岛上坠毁的 16 年前，Rousseau 是一艘从大溪地出发三天的法国研究船上六名船员中的一名临产期孕妇。

column1: The crew picked up a radio signal emanating from the South Pacific, which was a repeating set of six numbers: 4, 8, 15, 16, 23 and 42.
column2: 船员接收到一个从南太平洋发出的无线电信号，这是一组重复的六个数字：4、8、15、16、23 和 42。

column1: While attempting to find the source of the signal, the ship ran aground on rocks surrounding the island.
column2: 在试图寻找信号来源时，这艘船在岛屿周围的岩石上搁浅。

column1: Before reaching the shore, Rousseau and her team found Oceanic 815 survivor Jin-Soo Kwon (Daniel Dae Kim) in the water, who had been time-travelling as a result of the time shifts which had been moving him and the flight survivors through the island's history.
column2: 在抵达岸边前，Rousseau 和她的团队在水中发现了大洋航空 815 航班的幸存者 Jin-Soo Kwon (Daniel Dae Kim)，由于时空穿越，他和航班幸存者在岛上的时间里一直在进行时间旅行。

column1: Rousseau later tells the survivors of Oceanic 815 that two months after their arrival, that the island natives, which she called the Others, carried a disease that the rest of her crew had contracted.
column2: Rousseau 后来告诉大洋航空 815 航班的幸存者，在他们到达两个月后，岛上的土著人也就是她口中的其他人，携带一种疾病，她的其他船员也感染了这种疾病。

column1: She believed that this disease could not be allowed to reach the rest of the world, so she killed her colleagues, including her husband Robert.
column2: 她认为不能让这种疾病传播到世界其他地方，所以她杀死了她的同事，包括她的丈夫 Robert。

column1: When Jin time-travels to the past, he witnesses a different version of Rousseau's past.
column2: 当 Jin 穿越到过去时，他目睹了 Rousseau 另一个版本的过往。

column1: It is shown that the Smoke Monster, not the Others, was responsible for the "sickness" that forced her to kill her crew.
column2: 事实表明，是烟怪而不是其他人，才是迫使她杀死船员的“疾病”的原因。

column1: Rousseau confronts the father of her child, Robert, at gunpoint and accuses him of "being changed" inside the temple.
column2: Rousseau 用枪指着她孩子的父亲 Robert，指责他在神庙里“被变身”。

column1: Robert denies this, explaining that the Monster is a security system for the temple, and convinces Rousseau to lower her weapon.
column2: Robert 否认这一点，解释说烟怪是神庙的安全系统，并说服 Rousseau 放下武器。

column1: He attempts to shoot her when she does, but is shot by Rousseau.
column2: 当她照做时，他试图向她开枪，但被 Rousseau 射杀。

column1: Rousseau also attempts to kill Jin, having witnessed him vanish moments after her team entered the Smoke Monster's lair, believing he has the disease.
column2: Rousseau 也试图杀死 Jin，因为她目睹了 Jin 在她的团队进入烟怪的巢穴后不久就消失了，认为他得了这种病。

column1: Rousseau hiked to the radio tower and changed the message from the numbers to a repeating distress call. Three days later, Rousseau gave birth to a daughter, Alexandra.
column2: Rousseau 徒步走到无线电塔，将讯息从数字更改为重复的求救信号。三天后，Rousseau 生下女儿 Alexandra。

column1: One week after Alex's birth, Benjamin Linus (Michael Emerson) came and took Alex from Rousseau.
column2: Alex 出生一周后，Benjamin Linus (Michael Emerson) 来到这里，从 Rousseau 手中接过 Alex。

column1: Ben told Rousseau that the child would be safe with them, and that she was lucky for being left alive.
column2: Ben 告诉 Rousseau，孩子和他们在一起会很安全，她能活着离开是很幸运的。

column1: Before leaving, Ben tells her that if she hears whispers, she should run the other way.
column2: 在离开前，Ben 告诉她，如果听到耳语，就应该往另一个方向跑。

column1: After this, Rousseau began setting traps in the jungle with the hope of catching one of the people responsible for Alex's kidnapping.
column2: 在这之后，Rousseau 开始在丛林中布设陷阱，希望能抓住对 Alex 的绑架负责的人之一。

column1: Rousseau makes her first appearance in the season one episode "Solitary", where she captures Sayid (Naveen Andrews), one of the plane crash survivors.
column2: Rousseau 在第一季的“孤单一人"这一集中首次路面，她俘获了飞机失事的幸存者之一 Sayid (Naveen Andrews)。

column1: Rousseau tortures him until he eventually convinces her that he is not one of the Others.
column2: Rousseau 折磨他，直到他最终让她相信他并非其他人之一。

column1: She allows Sayid to return to his camp, and cautions him to keep a close eye on the other survivors.
column2: 她允许 Sayid 回到营地，并告诫他要密切留意其他幸存者的情况。

column1: Among harem-holding species, the adult females mate only with their harem stallion, while in other species, mating is more promiscuous and the males have larger testes for sperm competition.
column2: 在拥有后宫的物种中，成年雌性只与它们的后宫公马交配，而在其他物种中，交配更加混乱，雄性有较大的睾丸用于精子竞争。

column1: Estrus in female equines lasts 5–10 days; physical signs include frequent urination, flowing muscus, and swollen, everted labia.
column2: 雌性马的发情期持续 5–10 天；体征包括频繁排尿、粘液流动和阴唇肿胀、外翻。

column1: In addition, estrous females will stand with their hind legs spread and raise their tails when in the presence of a male.
column2: 此外，发情的雌性在雄性面前会张开后腿站立并翘起尾巴。

column1: Males assess the female's reproductive state with the flehmen response and the female will solicit mating by backing in.
column2: 雄性用裂唇嗅反应来评估雌性的生殖状态，雌性会通过后腿来寻求交配。

column1: Length of gestation varies by species; it is roughly 11 to 13 months, and most mares come into estrus again within a few days after foaling, depending on conditions.
column2: 妊娠期长度因物种而异；大约是 11 到 13 个月，大多数母马在产驹后几天内再次发情，视情况而定。

column1: Usually, only a single foal is born, which is capable of running within an hour.
column2: 通常只生一只马驹，它能在一小时内跑动。

column1: Within a few weeks, foals attempt to graze, but may continue to nurse for 8–13 months.
column2: 在几周内，马驹会尝试吃草，但可能继续哺乳 8-13 个月。

column1: Species in arid habitats, like Grévy's zebra, have longer nursing intervals and do not drink water until they are three months old.
column2: 干旱栖息地的物种，如细纹斑马，有更长的哺乳间隔，直到三个月大才喝水。

column1: Among harem-holding species, foals are cared for mostly by their mothers, but if threatened by predators, the entire group works together to protect all the young.
column2: 在拥有后宫的物种中，马驹主要由它们的母亲照顾，但如果受到捕食者的威胁，整个群体会共同保护所有幼崽。

column1: The group forms a protective front with the foals in the center and the stallion will rush at predators that come too close.
column2: 群体形成一个以马驹为中心的保护阵线，公马会冲向靠得太近的捕食者。

column1: In territory-holding species, mothers may gather into small groups and leave their young in "kindergartens" under the guard of a territorial male while searching for water.
column2: 在拥有领地的物种中，母亲可能会聚集成小群，在寻找水源时将幼崽留在“幼儿园”，由领地的雄性看管。

column1: Grévy's zebra stallions may look after a foal in his territory to ensure that the mother stays, though it may not be his.
column2: 细纹斑马的公马可能会照看自己领地内的马驹，以确保母亲留下来，尽管马驹可能不是它的孩子。

column1: The earliest archaeological evidence for the domestication of the horse comes from sites in Ukraine and Kazakhstan, dating to around 4000-3500 BC.
column2: 关于马的驯化，最早的考古学证据来自乌克兰和哈萨克斯坦的遗址，可追溯到公元前 4000-3500 年左右。

column1: By 3000 BC, the horse was completely domesticated, and by 2000 BC, a sharp increase occurred in the number of horse bones found in human settlements in northwestern Europe, indicating the spread of domesticated horses throughout the continent.
column2: 直到公元前 3000 年，马才被完全驯化，到公元前 2000 年，在欧洲西北部的人类居住区发现的马骨数量剧增，表明驯化的马遍布整个欧洲大陆。

column1: The most recent, but most irrefutable, evidence of domestication comes from sites where horse remains were buried with chariots in graves of the Sintashta and Petrovka cultures c. 2100 BC.
column2: 最近但也是最无可辩驳的驯化证据来自于公元前 2100 年左右 Sintashta 和 Petrovka 文化的坟墓，遗址中马的遗骸与战车埋葬在一起。

column1: Studies of variation in genetic material shows that very few wild stallions, possibly all from a single haplotype, contributed to the domestic horse, while many mares were part of early domesticated herds.
column2: 对遗传物质变异的研究表明，很少有野生公马可能全部来自单倍型，对家马有贡献，而许多母马是早期驯化畜群的一部分。

column1: Przewalski's horse has been conclusively shown not to be an ancestor of the domestic horse, though the two can hybridize and produce fertile offspring.
column2: 普氏野马已被最终证明为不是家马的祖先，尽管两者可以杂交并产生可生育的后代。

column1: The split between Przewalskii's horse and E. ferus caballus is estimated to have occurred 120,000– 240,000 years ago, long before domestication.
column2: 普氏野马和 E. ferus caballus 之间的分裂估计发生在 120,000– 240,000 年前，远在驯化之前。

column1: Of the caballine equines of E. ferus, E. f. ferus, also known as the European wild horse or "tarpan", shares ancestry with the modern domestic horse.
column2: 在 E. ferus 的马科中，E. f. ferus 也被称为欧洲野马或“草原野马”，与现代家马有着共同的祖先。

column1: In addition, tarpans that lived into modern times may have been hybridized with domestic horses.
column2: 此外，活到现代的草原野马可能已经与家马杂交。

column1: In the early 20th century, "Nkosi Sikielel' iAfrika" was becoming popular with black Africans.
column2: 20 世纪初，“Nkosi Sikielel' iAfrika”开始在非洲黑人中流行。

column1: In Southern Rhodesia it was originally sung in the original Xhosa language before being translated into Shona which created "Ishe Komborera Africa".
column2: 在南罗得西亚，它最初用原始的科萨语演唱，然后被翻译成创造了“上帝保佑非洲”的绍纳语。

column1: The new Shona language hymn was first performed at the start of a meeting of the Southern Rhodesia Native Association and then again four days later at the closure of the first meeting of the Bantu National Congress, which the Southern Rhodesia Native Association later became affiliated to.
column2: 这首新的绍纳语赞美诗首次在南罗得西亚原住民协会的会议开始时演唱，四天后在班图国民大会第一次会议闭幕时再次演唱，南罗得西亚原住民协会后来成为该协会的附属机构。

column1: By the 1948 African General Strike, it had become the main political song amongst black Africans.
column2: 到 1948 年非洲大罢工时，它已经成为非洲黑人的主要政治歌曲。

column1: Despite that connotation, the song was accepted by black and white Rhodesians.
column2: 尽管有这样的内涵，这首歌还是被罗得西亚的黑人和白人所接受。

column1: In 1951, at a British South African Police athletics competition, "Ishe Komborera Africa" was sung by combined black and white policemen to commemorate the first multi-racial competition in Southern Rhodesia.
column2: 1951 年，在英国南非警察田径比赛中，“上帝保佑非洲”由黑人和白人警察联合演唱，以纪念南罗得西亚的第一次多种族比赛。

column1: Following Rhodesia's Unilateral Declaration of Independence from the British Empire, the new Rhodesian authorities started to crack down on African liberation movements.
column2: 在罗得西亚单方面宣布脱离大英帝国独立后，新的罗得西亚当局开始镇压非洲解放运动。
