column1: On November 7 she performed the song at the MTV Europe Music Awards in Madrid, wearing a "fairy tale"-inspired ensemble and walking through a set of flowers against a sunset.
column2: 11 月 7 日，她在马德里举行的 MTV 欧洲音乐奖颁奖典礼上演唱了这首歌，她身着一套以“童话”为灵感的服装，在夕阳的映衬下缓缓走过一排鲜花。

column1: Two days later, Rihanna sang "Only Girl (In the World)" on the Italian version of The X Factor in a floral-print bikini, boots and a red pigtail.
column2: 两天后，蕾哈娜在意大利版的 The X Factor 上演唱了《Only Girl (In the World)》。

column1: The next day she flew to France to sing the song on Le Grand Journal, on a set covered with white balloons.
column2: 第二天，她飞到法国，在“Le Grand Journal”上演唱了这首歌，现场布满了白色气球。

column1: The singer returned to London on November 11 to record an interview for The Graham Norton Show, which included a live performance of "Only Girl (In the World)".
column2: 11 月 11 日，这位歌手回到伦敦，录制了《格拉汉姆·诺顿秀》的采访，其中包括现场演唱《Only Girl (In the World)》。

column1: Rihanna opened the American Music Awards with a medley of songs from Loud.
column2: 蕾哈娜以《Loud》中的一系列组曲揭开了全美音乐奖的序幕。

column1: She began with an a cappella version of "Love the Way You Lie (Part II)", sitting on a stylized tree of lights above "a field of sable-colored blades of grass." Rihanna then sang a solo version of "What's My Name?" and a short version of "Only Girl (In the World)". According to Mawuse Ziegbe of MTV News, the singer "kicked up the island theme" as drummers in tribal dress circled her.
column2: 她以无伴奏版本的《Love the Way You Lie (Part II)》开场，坐在一棵风格独特的灯光树上，上面是“一片貂皮色的草叶”。蕾哈娜随后演唱了独唱版的《What's My Name?》和简短版的《Only Girl (In the World)》。据 MTV News 的马武塞·齐格贝报道，当穿着部落服装的鼓手围绕着她时，她“开始唱到岛屿主题”。

column1: Rihanna performed a short version of "Only Girl (In the World)" at the 31st Brit Awards on February 15, 2011, as part of a medley with two other singles from Loud: "S&M" and "What's My Name?". She had planned to perform "S&M" only (to coincide with its United Kingdom release), but was asked by the British Phonographic Industry to "tone down the sexual references in the song's lyrics".
column2: 2011 年 2 月 15 日，蕾哈娜在第 31 届全英音乐奖上演唱了《Only Girl (In the World)》的简短版，这首歌与《Loud》中的另外两首单曲《S&M》和《What's My Name?》构成了组曲。她原本计划只表演《S&M》（以便配合其在英国的发行），但英国唱片业协会要求她“淡化歌词中的性暗示”。

column1: Rihanna was reportedly angered at the request and a related one to perform a different song.
column2: 据报道，蕾哈娜对这一要求和一位相关人士演唱另一首歌的要求感到愤怒。

column1: A June 2017 NRA video entitled "The Clenched Fist of Truth" used an image of "The Bean" sculpture.
column2: 2017 年 6 月，NRA 的一段叫做“紧握真相的拳头”的视频使用了“豆子”雕塑图。

column1: Anish Kapoor sued the NRA to stop running the video, pay any profits gained as a result of the video, compensate him for statutory damages equivalent to $150,000 per infringement, and attorney fees.
column2: Anish Kapoor 起诉 NRA，要求其停止播放该视频，支付因该视频而获取的任何利润，向他赔偿相当于每次侵权 150,000 美元的法定赔偿金以及律师费。

column1: The first results of the polls from the reader participation project appeared in the form of the first three short stories which resulted from direct fan involvement in the March 2004 issue of Dengeki G's Magazine.
column2: 读者参与项目的首轮投票结果以前三篇短篇故事的形式出现，这三篇短篇故事是粉丝直接参与 2004 年 3 月这期 Dengeki G's Magazine 的结果。

column1: The stories were written by Sakurako Kimino and illustrated by Chitose Maki.
column2: 这些故事由 Sakurako Kimino 撰写，由 Chitose Maki 绘制插图。

column1: Over the following months, the stories continued, producing the first story arc named the Etoile Chapter (エトワール編 Etowāru-hen) containing eighteen stories which ran between March and July 2004.
column2: 在接下来的几个月里，随着故事的继续进行，产生了第一条叫做 Etoile Chapter (エトワール編 Etowāru-hen) 的故事线，其中包含 2004 年 3 月至 7 月之间发生的 18 个故事。

column1: Due to the concerns that there was not enough time between the Athletic Festival (an early summer event) and the Cultural Festival (an autumn event), the second, and last, story arc named the Dormitory Panic Chapter (寄宿舎パニック編 Kishukusha Panikku-hen) containing seven stories began the next month, running between August 2004 and January 2005.
column2: 由于担心运动节（初夏的活动）和文化节（秋季的活动）之间的时间不够，第二条也是最后一条叫做 Dormitory Panic Chapter (寄宿舎パニック編 Kishukusha Panikku-hen) 的故事线在次月开始，时间跨度为 2004 年 8 月至 2005 年 1 月。

column1: The second arc's stories, which were longer than the earlier pieces, involved taking one of the three main characters, performing coupling for them with one of the other eleven girls and presenting them in various situations.
column2: 第二条线的故事比早期作品长，涉及三个主要人物之一，为他们与其他 11 个女孩中的一个配对，并在各种情况下展示他们。

column1: None of the original stories were ever published again in bound volumes.
column2: 原先的故事都没有再装订成册出版。

column1: The stories themselves were more or less vignettes, in which each gave a brief glimpse into what was referred to as a "yuri coupling".
column2: 这些故事本身或多或少是些花絮，其中每个故事都对所谓的“yuri 配对”进行了简短介绍。

column1: Between May and September 2005, a revised series of the short stories was produced; once per month, five more supplementary short stories were published during this time period, each of which was longer than any of the previous pieces.
column2: 在 2005 年 5 月至 9 月，制作了短篇故事修订系列；在此期间，每月再出版 5 篇补充性的短篇故事，每篇都比以前的任何作品长。

column1: Although each individual story had its own title, the stories were under the collective title of "The Girls, who art in heaven".
column2: 尽管每个单独的故事都有自己的标题，但这些故事都在“徜徉于天堂艺术的女孩”的总标题之下。

column1: After the ending of this short compilation in September 2005, it was decided that the original illustrator, Chitose Maki, would be replaced by Namuchi Takumi for future Strawberry Panic!
column2: 在 2005 年 9 月这次短篇编纂结束后，决定在未来的 Strawberry Panic! 项目中，由 Namuchi Takumi 取代原来的插画师 Chitose Maki。

column1: The show was hosted by Mai Nakahara, who voiced Nagisa Aoi in the anime edition, and Ai Shimizu, who voiced both Tamao Suzumi and Kizuna Hyūga in the anime.
column2: 该节目由在动画版中为 Nagisa Aoi 配音的 Mai Nakahara 和在动画中为 Tamao Suzumi 和 Kizuna Hyūga 配音的 Tamao Suzumi 主持。

column1: The show contained sixty-one episodes, which were divided between three CDs; the first went on sale on March 8, 2006.
column2: 该剧有 61 集，分为三张 CD；第一张于 2006 年 3 月 8 日发售。

column1: The other two releases came out on July 5, 2006, and January 11, 2007, in Japan.
column2: 其他两个版本于 2006 年 7 月 5 日和 2007 年 1 月 11 日在日本上市。

column1: The radio show included nine guests who had played other voice acting roles in the anime version, and Rino, singer of the opening theme "Sweetest" in the PlayStation 2 game version.
column2: 这个广播节目包括九位曾在动漫版中饰演其他配音角色的嘉宾，以及 PlayStation 2 游戏版中开场主题“Sweetest”的演唱者 Rino。

column1: The Strawberry Panic!
column2: Strawberry Panic!

column1: manga, written by Sakurako Kimino and illustrated by Namuchi Takumi, was serialized in Dengeki G's Magazine between September 30, 2005, and February 28, 2007, with a new chapter released once a month.
column2: 是由 Sakurako Kimino 创作的漫画，由 Namuchi Takumi 绘制插图，于 2005 年 9 月 30 日至 2007 年 2 月 28 日在 Dengeki G's Magazine 上连载，每月发布新的一章。

column1: Two bound volumes have been published in Japan under MediaWorks' Dengeki Comics label.
column2: 这两册合订本以 MediaWorks' Dengeki Comics 标签在日本出版。

column1: The first went on sale on March 27, 2006, featuring Nagisa and Shizuma on the cover, and the second volume came out on October 27, 2006, featuring Nagisa and Tamao on the cover.
column2: 第一册于 2006 年 3 月 27 日发售，封面是 Nagisa 和 Shizuma，第二册于 2006 年 10 月 27 日发售，封面是 Nagisa 和 Tamao。

column1: The education system is monitored by the District Education Officer (EDO) of the City District Government of Faisalabad.
column2: 教育系统由 Faisalabad 市区政府的地区教育官 (EDO) 监督。

column1: The city government reports its findings to the Ministry of Federal Education and Professional Training and the Minister for Education.
column2: 市政府向联邦教育和专业培训部及教育部长报告其调查结果。

column1: Funding is provided by the Government of Punjab, Pakistan, City District Government and the fees collected from schools.
column2: 资金由巴基斯坦旁遮普省政府、市区政府和向学校收取的费用提供。

column1: There are four levels of the education system in the city: Primary, Elementary, High and Higher Secondary Level.
column2: 该市的教育系统分为四个阶段：小学、中学、高中和高级中学水平。

column1: Primary level education is only compulsory.
column2: 小学阶段的教育只是义务教育。

column1: There are a number of schools for the assistance of children with special needs.
column2: 有些学校用于帮助有特殊需要的儿童。

column1: The Pakistan Electronic Media Regulatory Authority (PEMRA) is responsible for the regulation and monitoring of electronic media entertainment in the country.
column2: 巴基斯坦电子媒体监管局 (PEMRA) 负责管理和监督该国的电子媒体娱乐。

column1: Pakistan Television Corporation, is the state-owned regulated television broadcasting network.
column2: 巴基斯坦电视公司是受监管的国有电视广播网络。

column1: The government began licensing private broadcasters in 2002.
column2: 政府于 2002 年开始向私营广播公司发放许可证。

column1: The government of Pakistan installed the first radio transmitters in the city on 15 September 1982.
column2: 1982 年 9 月 15 日，巴基斯坦政府在该市安装了第一批无线电发射器。

column1: Radio Pakistan broadcasts three government regulated FM stations: "Radio Pakistan FM101, Radio Pakistan FM93 and Radio Pakistan Sautul Qur'an Channel FM93.4. FM101 became operational in 2002, FM93 went live in 2010 and FM93.4 Sautul Qur'an Channel went live in 2016; PBC all three stations are standard power KW 2.5.
column2: “巴基斯坦电台”播送三个由政府监管的 FM 电台：巴基斯坦电台 FM101、巴基斯坦电台 FM93 和巴基斯坦电台 Sautul Qur'an 频道 FM93.4。FM101 于 2002 年开通，FM93 于 2010 年上线，FM93.4 Sautul Qur'an 频道于 2016 年上线；PBC 所有三个电台都是标准功率 KW 2.5。

column1: Pakistan Telecommunication Authority is a government-owned organisation that is responsible for the establishment, operation and maintenance of telecommunications in the city.
column2: 巴基斯坦电信局是一个政府所有的组织，负责城市电信的建立、运营和维护。

column1: The organisation monitors and prevents illegal exchanges in the city.
column2: 该组织监督和防止城市中的非法交换。

column1: Pakistan Telecommunication Company Limited is the main provider of fixed line, mobile and broadband services.
column2: 巴基斯坦电信有限公司是固定线路、移动和宽带服务的主要供应商。

column1: Regional headquarters is located at the Central Telecom House in Chinot Bazaar.
column2: 地区总部位于 Chinot Bazaar 的中央电信大楼。

column1: With the deregulation of the telecommunication sector by the Ministry of Information Technology, a range of companies now offer mobile and broadband services in the city.
column2: 随着信息技术部放松对电信部门的管制，现在该市有多家公司提供移动和宽带服务。

column1: In 2008, the Government of Pakistan lifted a forty-year ban on Bollywood films which allowed Indian films to be played in cinemas.
column2: 2008 年，巴基斯坦政府解除了对宝莱坞电影长达四十年的禁令，允许电影院播放印度电影。

column1: The cinema industry has since seen the introduction of new cinemas such as Cinepax by Hotel One, and Cine Nagina.
column2: 此后，电影业出现了一些新的电影院，如 Hotel One 和 Cine Nagina。

column1: The Government College University in Faisalabad encourages students from the University of Agriculture to hold workshops and explore themes of peace and tolerance which can be used in an engaging and entertaining way to communicate complex issues to different audiences.
column2: Faisalabad 政府学院大学鼓励农业大学的学生举办研讨会，探讨和平与宽容的主题，这些主题可以用一种引人入胜而又有趣的方式向不同的受众传达复杂的问题。

column1: In its original American broadcast on March 10, 2002, "The Old Man and the Key" received a 7.9 rating, according to Nielsen Media Research, translating to approximately 7.9 million viewers.
column2: 在 2002 年 3 月 10 日的美国首播中，根据尼尔森媒体研究公司的数据，“老人与钥匙”的收视率为 7.9，相当于大约 790 万观众。

column1: The episode ranked 19 in the top 25 most watched television programs the week it aired.
column2: 这一集在播出当周的前 25 个收视率最高的电视节目中排名第 19 位。

column1: Later in 2002, "Ode to Branson" was nominated for the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Music And Lyrics, which it ultimately lost to a score from BBC's nature documentary The Blue Planet.
column2: 在 2002 年晚些时候，“布兰森颂”被提名为黄金时段艾美奖杰出音乐和歌词奖，但它最终输给了 BBC 的自然纪录片“蓝色星球”。

column1: In 2007, the song was included on the soundtrack album The Simpsons: Testify.
column2: 2007 年，这首歌被收录在原声专辑《辛普森一家：证词》中。

column1: Following the thirteenth season's release on DVD and Blu-ray, "The Old Man and the Key" received mixed reviews from critics.
column2: 在第十三季的 DVD 和蓝光版发行后，“老人与钥匙”得到了评论家褒贬不一的评价。

column1: Writing for Project:Blu, Nate Boss stated that Grampa "just isn't all that funny when cornered, and that's what we get here," and that "the jokes are a bit too few and far between".
column2: Nate Boss 在为 Project:Blu 撰写的文章中指出，爷爷“走投无路时并不那么滑稽，这就是我们在这里所看到的，”而且“笑话有点太少，而且间隔很远”。

column1: Giving the episode a negative review, Ryan Keefer of DVD Talk wrote that it was "borderline painful" and one of the season's "duds".
column2: DVD Talk 的 Ryan Keefer 给了这一集负面评价，他写道，它令人“痛苦到了边缘”，是本季的“哑弹”之一。

column1: Casey Broadwater of Blu-ray.com wrote that the episode "moves at a geriatric pace", and R. L. Shaffer of IGN stated that it "represent[s] some of the worst of The Simpsons." On the other hand, giving the episode a positive review, Ron Martin of 411Mania enjoyed the "poke towards Branson, Missouri, a mecca for old people everywhere," and Jennifer Malkowski of DVD Verdict gave the episode a B rating.
column2: Blu-ray.com 的 Casey Broadwater 写道，这一集“以老年人的速度发展”，IGN 的 R. L. Shaffer 说，它“代表《辛普森一家》中最糟糕的一些内容”。另一方面， 411Mania 的 Ron Martin 对这一集给予了肯定的评价，他喜欢“对密苏里州 Branson 的嘲弄，那里是各地老人的圣地，”DVD Verdict 的 Jennifer Malkowski 对这一集的评级是 B。

column1: Colin Jacobsson of DVD Movie Guide wrote that, even though Grampa is "essentially a one-joke personality," "those gags tend to be pretty fun." He concluded his review by writing that the episode was "a likable program."
column2: 《DVD 电影指南》的 Colin Jacobsson 写道，尽管爷爷“本质上是个爱开玩笑的人，”“那些插科打诨往往非常有趣。”他在评论的最后写道，这一集是“一个讨人喜欢的节目。”

column1: Despite the mixed responses, the episode features one of the "most used little clips" of the series.
column2: 尽管反应不一，但它是该系列中“使用最多小片段”的一集。

column1: The scene shows Grampa getting his driver's license.
column2: 这一幕显示爷爷拿到了他的驾照。

column1: Instead of taking a photo for the license on the spot, Grampa suggests that Selma, who works in the facility, use a photo of him from a newspaper headline that reads "Old man yells at cloud." Selma agrees, and Grampa, holding his newly acquired license, goes up to a window and yells "Who's laughing now?" at a cloud.
column2: 爷爷没有当场为驾照拍照，而是建议在爱该机构工作的 Selma 用一张报纸头条上的照片，上面写着“老头子骂云”。Selma 同意了，爷爷拿着他新获得的执照，走到窗前对着一朵云大喊“现在谁在笑？”。

column1: A still from the scene has been used several times on The Daily Show.
column2: 这一幕的剧照在《每日秀》中多次使用。

column1: Both Malkowski of DVD Verdict and Jacobsson of DVD Movie Guide considered it to be the best part of the episode.
column2: DVD Verdict 的 Both Malkowski 和《DVD 电影指南》的 Jacobsson 都认为这是这一集最好的部分。

column1: After Clint Eastwood's speech at the 2012 Republican National Convention, which featured Eastwood talking to an empty chair representing President Barack Obama, a modified version of the image with the caption, "Old man yells at chair", was used in an internet meme.
column2: 在克林特伊斯特伍德在 2012 年共和党全国代表大会上的演讲中，伊斯特伍德对着一张代表巴拉克奥巴马总统的空椅子说话，之后，这张图片的修改版和标题“老头子骂椅子”被用于网络模因。

column1: The story crosses the paths of characters from various social and ethnic groups in Los Angeles.
column2: 在这个故事中，来自洛杉矶不同社会和种族群体的人物交织在一起。

column1: Forty of the ensemble cast have significant speaking roles, but none takes the part of a main protagonist.
column2: 40 名群戏演员有重要的演讲角色，但无一人担任主角。

column1: The story takes place in 1989, against the backdrop of the city's racial tensions of the era and the US invasion of Panama.
column2: 故事发生在 1989 年，背景是当时城市的种族紧张局势和美国入侵巴拿马。

column1: At the nominal center is a punk band called Love and Rockets, which shares its name with the English band; the punk band complains stole the name from them (the real-life band formed in 1985 and took its name from the Hernandez's comic book). The band is slated to appear at a party at the bass player's upper-class mother's home, but the performance never takes place in the story.
column2: 名义中心是一支叫做“爱与火箭”的朋克乐队，该乐队与英国乐队同名；该朋克乐队抱怨盗用了他们的名字（现实生活中的这支乐队成立于 1985 年，其名称来自 Hernandez 的漫画书）。乐队被安排在贝斯手上流社会母亲家的一次派对上出现，但故事中从未有过表演。

column1: Rather, the story quickly transitions from character to character, revealing details of each one's personality traits and ethnic, class, sexual, and subcultural backgrounds.
column2: 相反，故事迅速从一个人物过渡到另一个人物，揭示了每个人的个性特征和种族、阶层、性别和亚文化背景的细节。

column1: The story builds in complexity to a chaotic alcohol- and drug-fueled party in which someone almost gets killed; the turbulent narrative then calms and slows into a sequence of wordless panels that pan out into the cosmos.
column2: 这个故事走向复杂，在一个混乱的酒精和毒品派对中有人差点被杀；然后动荡的叙事平静下来，放慢速度，进入一连串的无字板，向宇宙延伸。

column1: On its release, reviewer Anne Rubenstein praised Love and Rockets X for expanding the "aesthetic possibilities of graphic narrative"; she recommended it as a starting point for new Love and Rockets readers daunted by the complexity of the earlier stories, and called it "as essential as the rest of the Hernandez canon".
column2: 在发行时，评论家 Anne Rubenstein 称赞“爱与火箭 X”拓展了“图形叙事的美学可能性”；她建议将其作为新的“爱与火箭”读者的起点，因为他们对早期故事的复杂性感到望而却步，并称其“与 Hernadez 的其余作品一样重要”。

column1: Comics critic R. Fiore placed Love and Rockets X 7th on his list of best English non-strip comics of the 1990s.
column2: 漫画评论家 R. Fiore 将“爱与火箭 X”排在 20 世纪 90 年代最佳英文非连载漫画榜单中的第 7 位。

column1: He calls it "a comics equivalent of a Victor Hugo-style social novel" and praises Hernandez for successfully interweaving so many of the quasi-isolated ethnic social milieus of Los Angeles into one narrative, though he found weakness in Hernandez's grasp of their various speech patterns and suggested actual South Americans would have been more appropriate to the real political background than the fictional Palomarians.
column2: 他称其为“一部相当于维克多雨果式的社会小说的漫画”，并称赞 Hernandez 成功地将洛杉矶如此之多的准孤立种族社会环境交织在一起进行叙述，尽管他发现 Hernandez 对他们的各种语言模式和把握存在弱点，并指出真正的南美人会比虚构的帕洛利亚人更适合真实的政治背景。

column1: Reviewer Tom Knapp considered the work "confusing" and "one of the low points" in the Love and Rockets series.
column2: 评论家 Tom Knapp 认为这部作品“令人困惑”，是《爱与火箭》系列的低谷之一。

column1: Douglas Wolk called Love and Rockets X "the prime example of Gilbert's fascinations as a storyteller". F. Vance Neill saw it as an early example of Hernandez's concern with "the values of trust, loyalty, honesty, and community" and "the consequences of failing to adhere to these values" that he explored later in works such as Speak of the Devil (2008) and The Troublemakers (2009).
column2: Douglas Wolk 称“爱与火箭 X”是“Gilbert 热衷于讲故事的典型例子”。F. Vance Neill 认为这是 Hernandez 关注“信任、忠诚和社区价值观”以及“未能遵守这些价值观的后果”的早期例子，他后来在“恶魔讲述” (2008) 和“麻烦制造者” (2009) 中探讨了这个问题。

column1: The story's Los Angeles setting anticipated that of Hernandez's post-Palomar stories featuring Luba and her family.
column2: 这个故事的洛杉矶背景预示着 Hernandez 在帕洛玛之后以 Luba 和她的家庭为主角的故事。

column1: Zeisler and Becker first described a syndrome with multiple lentigines, hypertelorism, pectus carinatum (protruding breastbone) and prognathism (protrusion of lower jaw) in 1936.
column2: 1936 年，Zeisler 和 Becker 首次描述了一种带有多发性色斑、眼距过宽、高眼压、鸡胸（胸骨突出）和前突（下颌突出）的综合征。

column1: Sporadic descriptions were added through the years.
column2: 这些年来增加了零星的描述。

column1: In 1962, cardiac abnormalities and short stature were first associated with the condition.
column2: 1962 年，心脏异常和身材矮小首次与此病相关。

column1: In 1966, three familial cases were added, a mother, her son and daughter.
column2: 1966 年，增加了三个家族性病例，一个母亲、她的儿子和女儿。

column1: Another case of mother to two separate children, with different paternity of the two children, was added in 1968.
column2: 1968 年，又增加了一个母亲与两个同母异父孩子的病例。

column1: It was believed as late as 2002 that Noonan Syndrome with Multiple Lentigines (NSML) was related to neurofibromatosis type I (von Recklinghausen syndrome).
column2: 直到 2002 年，人们还认为 Noonan 多斑痣综合征 (NSML) 与 I 型神经纤维瘤病（von Recklinghausen 综合征）有关。

column1: In fact, since both ICD9 and ICD10 lack a specific diagnosis code for NSML, the diagnosis code for NF1 is still sometimes used for diagnostic purposes, although it has been shown that the gene is not linked to the NF1 locus.
column2: 事实上，由于 ICD9 和 ICD10 都缺乏 NSML 的具体诊断代码，因此有时仍然使用 NF1 的诊断代码进行诊断，尽管已经证明该基因与 NF1 基因座没有联系。

column1: Hutchison married Mary Kaiakonui, a local resident of Kalaupapa, in 1881, in a ceremony blessed by Father Damien.
column2: 1881 年，哈奇森在神父达米恩的祝福下，与卡劳帕帕当地居民玛丽•凯阿科努伊结婚。

column1: According to historian John Tayman, Mary may have also contracted leprosy and they had a daughter who did not suffer the same infection as her parents.
column2: 根据史学家约翰•泰曼的说法，玛丽可能也感染了麻风病，他们有一个女儿，但她没有像她的父母一样受到感染。

column1: Other sources claimed they were childless.
column2: 另有消息称他们没有孩子。

column1: They lived at Hutchison's house, in a part of the settlement called Makanalua.
column2: 他们居住在哈奇森的房子中，位于名为马卡纳卢阿的定居点。

column1: Kaiakonui cared for her husband as his mea kōkua (caregiver) until her death on May 16, 1905, at the age of forty-seven.
column2: 凯阿科努伊一直照料她的丈夫，作为他的 mea kōkua（照料者），她于 1905 年 5 月 16 日去世，享年 47 岁。

column1: She was buried in the Catholic section of Papaloa Cemetery and a white bronze grave monument marks her final resting place.
column2: 她被安葬在 Papaloa 公墓的天主教区，一块白色的青铜墓碑标志着她的最后长眠之地。

column1: His brother's descendants believe that he could be buried next to his wife.
column2: 他哥哥的后人认为，他可能安葬在他妻子的旁边。

column1: Members of his family were present at the 2009 canonization of Father Damien in Rome.
column2: 2009 年，他的家人出席了在罗马举行的达米恩神父封圣仪式。

column1: In his incomplete will, Hutchison expressed his love for his mother, his wife and the dwindling Hawaiian race:
column2: 在他不完整的遗嘱中，哈奇森表达了他对母亲、妻子以及日益减少的夏威夷族人的爱：

column1: For the love and affection I hold for my mother, Maria Mo-a, and Maria Kaiakonui, my wife (deceased), who were of the pure Hawaiian aboriginal ancestry, from whom sprung from and hold dear and my heart longing desire to perpetuate their race from extinction which forecasting shadow of time forbode their doom, which only the power of a mercifull and all loving God can stay, from the evident fate which await them and leaving firm faith in the love and mercy of God, who alone can save and perpetuate and multiply from being effaced from the land, which, by His grace he gave to their forefathers and foremothers and their descendants as a heritage forever and to this end and purpose, I consecrate my worldly estate both real, personal or mixed.
column2: 出于对我的母亲 Maria Mo-a 和妻子 Maria Kaiakonui（已故）的爱和感情，她们是纯正的夏威夷原住民血统，从她们身上孕育出我的内心对延续他们种族的珍视与渴望，使她们的民族免遭灭绝，预测的时间光影预示着他们的厄运，只有仁慈博爱的上帝才能阻止，远离等待他们的显而易见的命运，坚定地相信上帝的爱和怜悯，只有上帝才能拯救，使之永存，使之繁衍，不至从这片土地上消失，这片土地是上帝赐给他们祖先和他们后代的永远遗产，因此，我奉献我的世俗财产，无论是真实的、个人的还是混合的。

column1: Described as a "dapper young man with a moustache waxed into long points", he made for a "dynamic figure with a penetrating voice", and was noted for riding his Douglas motorcycle through the 1920s and 30s in his khaki overalls as he traveled between his professional practice, teaching duties and home life.
column2: 被描绘为“蓄着长胡须的精致青年”的他塑造了一种“声音犀利且活力十足的人物形象”，他游走在专业实践、教学职责和家庭生活之间，以穿着卡其色工装并身骑道格拉斯摩托车穿越过 20 世纪 20 年代和 30 年代而闻名。

column1: On the home front, Louis Laybourne Smith married Frances Maude Davies, the daughter of Edward Davies to whom he had been articled, on 9 April 1903.
column2: 在家庭方面，路易斯·莱伯恩·史密斯于 1903 年 4 月 9 日与爱德华·戴维斯之女弗朗西丝·莫德·戴维斯成婚。

column1: They had three daughters and a son, Gordon Laybourne Smith, who ultimately followed his father into architecture.
column2: 他们有三女一子，儿子戈登·莱伯恩·史密斯最终跟随父亲进入了建筑行业。

column1: Laybourne Smith "consistently overworked"; architecture was said to be both his profession and his obsession.
column2: 莱伯恩·史密斯“一直超负荷工作”；据说建筑既是他的职业，也是他的痴迷。

column1: When his firm announced a retirement scheme he declared that he had no intention of retiring, and such proved to be the case—he died at his desk on 13 September 1965 at the age of 85.
column2: 他的公司宣布退休计划时，他却声明自己无意退休，事实证明确实如此——他于 1965 年 9 月 13 日在办公桌前去世，享年 85 岁。

column1: Despite enjoying her career in the adult film industry, Samson had other ambitions.
column2: 萨姆森尽管很喜欢成人电影业的职业，但她还有其它雄心。

column1: In 2005, while on vacation in Tuscany, Italy, she decided she could "leave a mark on this world" by making wine.
column2: 2005 年，在意大利托斯卡纳区，她决心通过酿酒“在世界上留下印记”。

column1: Then married to a wine merchant,she had frequently traveled to Italy and France, and often fantasized about owning her own vineyard.
column2: 后来她嫁给了一位酒商，经常到意大利和法国旅行，幻想拥有自己的葡萄庄园。

column1: When she was a child, she had helped her family make wine in the basement of their house in Watertown, New York.
column2: 孩提时，她家住在纽约沃特敦，那时她曾帮助家里在地下室酿酒。

column1: She formed the company, Savanna Samson Wines, and asked Italian winemaker and consultant Roberto Cipresso to help find a blend of grapes local to Tuscany that would produce her ideal flavor.
column2: 她创办了一家公司，名为 Savanna Samson Wines，然后请意大利酿酒师罗博特-奇普罗索做顾问，帮助她在托斯卡纳地区寻找能酿出理想风味红酒的当地葡萄混合品种。

column1: They eventually chose a mixture of 70 percent Cesanese, 20 percent Sangiovese and 10 percent Montepulciano, which produced a red wine that she named Sogno Uno, meaning 'Dream One.' Its label played on Samson's notoriety as a porn star, featuring a side view of her wearing only a see-through gown and high heels.
column2: 他们最终选择混合 70% 的 Cesanese、20% 的 Sangiovese 和 10% 的 Montepulciano，酿出了一款红酒，她称之为 Sogno Uno，意思是“梦想一号”。其标签展现了臭名昭著的色情明星萨姆森穿着透明睡衣和高跟鞋的侧面。

column1: Wine critic James Suckling gave Sogno Uno a rating of 75 out of 100, and described it as "barely drinkable".
column2: 葡萄酒评论家詹姆斯-萨克林给 Sogno Uno 的评分为 75 分（满分是 100），将其描述为“勉强能喝”。

column1: A gala launch was held for the wine at a Manhattan restaurant on February 27, 2006.
column2: 2006 年 2 月 27 日，在曼哈顿的一家餐厅为该酒举办了一场庆祝午宴。

column1: By June 2007, her company had produced two more wines.
column2: 到 2007 年 6 月，她的公司又生产了两款葡萄酒。

column1: A limited edition of MCMXC a.D. was released on 4 November 1991 with four remixed tracks.
column2: MCMXC a.D. 限量版在 1991 年 11 月 4 日发行，有四首混音的曲目。

column1: The original part of the album blends into the first of the four additional tracks, and each of the additional tracks also blend into each other.
column2: 专辑原来的部分混合到另外四首曲目的第一首，其他曲目每首也互相混合。

column1: This gives the album a sense of continuation from start to finish.
column2: 这给专辑提供一种自始至终的连续感。

column1: One of the remixes, The Returning Silence of The Rivers of Belief, does not appear on any of the singles.
column2: 在重新混合后，The Returning Silence of The Rivers of Belief 不会出现在任何单曲中。

column1: The November 1999 reissue includes six remixed tracks on a second disc.
column2: 1999 年 11 月，重新发行的专辑在第二张唱碟上包含六首重新混音的曲目。

column1: In March 2016 a numbered Limited Edition was released on Hybrid SACD in Hong Kong.
column2: 2016 年 3 月，在香港发行了关于 Hybrid SACD 的限量版。

column1: Janet B. Blundell, in Library Journal, finds Angelou's poetry lacking in comparison to her prose, and states, "The reader is jarred by stilted, 'poetic' language and stilted, sing-song, school-girlish rhyme".
column2: 珍妮特·B·布伦德尔在《图书馆杂志》中发现，与安吉洛的散文相比，她的诗有些欠缺，同时指出：“读者会被生硬的、‘诗意’的语言和不自然的、歌唱式的、女学生式的韵律所震撼。”

column1: She finds the best poems in Shaker are the ones that are structured like blues music.
column2: 她发现夏克尔最好的诗是那些结构像蓝调音乐一样的作品。

column1: Mary S. Cosgrove, in Horn Book Magazine, calls the poems in Shaker "a lyrical outpouring of seasoned feelings from the heart and mind", and calls Angelou "musical, rhythmical, and enchanting".  J.T.
column2: 玛丽·S·科斯格罗夫在《号角书评》杂志上称夏克尔的诗歌是“心灵和头脑中成熟情感的抒发流露”，并称安吉洛“富有音乐感、节奏感和魅力”。J.T.

column1: Keefe, in World Literature Today, says about Shaker": "Deceptively light and graceful, Maya Angelou's poems are lyrical, emotional, melancholy".
column2: 基夫在《今日世界文学》中这样评价夏克尔：“玛娅·安杰洛的诗看似轻松优雅，却充满了抒情、情感和忧郁。”

column1: Keefe compares Angelou's poems to music, especially the music of French singer Édith Piaf, and also states, "These poems are full of shining hurt as, like curving scimitars, they skillfully pierce the hearts of their readers".
column2: 基夫把安杰洛的诗比作音乐，特别是法国歌手伊迪丝·琵雅芙的音乐，还指出：“这些诗充满了耀眼的伤害，彷如一把弯刀，巧妙地深入到读者的内心中”。

column1: In a commentary made for the 1980 anthology, The Golden Man, Philip K. Dick briefly touched on several themes of the story, including the Christian allegory of the "suffering servant", manifested in the character of Bors.
column2: 在 1980 年的选集《黄金人》的评论中，菲利普·K·迪克简要地谈到了故事的几个主题，包括基督教“受苦的仆人”的寓言，这体现在鲍斯这一角色上。

column1: This was touched upon in the Dick biography Divine Invasions, by memoirist and biographer Lawrence Sutin.
column2: 回忆录作者和传记作家劳伦斯·苏廷在迪克的传记《神圣入侵》中也提到了这一点。

column1: Drawing on Dick's commentary, Sutin sees Bors as part of a religious pattern in Dick's stories as a "Christ-like robot", and likens the robot to characters in other stories by Dick who suffer from illness.
column2: 根据迪克的评论，苏廷认为鲍斯是迪克故事中宗教模式的一部分，即他是一个“像基督一样的机器人”，并将这个机器人与其他故事中患病的角色进行了比较。

column1: At age 11, Madden joined PACE Youth Theatre to help overcome his shyness.
column2: 11 岁时，为帮助克服羞涩，麦登加入了 PACE 青年剧院。

column1: He was soon cast as young Andy in the film adaptation of Iain Banks's Complicity; he was then cast in the lead role of Sebastian in the children's television series Barmy Aunt Boomerang, for which he filmed six episodes that aired from 1999 until 2000.
column2: 他很快就在根据伊恩班克斯的《同谋》改编的电影中饰演年轻的 Andy；之后在儿童电视连续剧《巴米阿姨回旋镖》中饰演主角 Sebastian，他为 1999 到 2000 年播出的该部剧集拍摄了六集。

column1: He attended the Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama (RSAMD) in Glasgow, from where he graduated in 2007. While at RSAMD, he worked with The Arches and Glasgow Repertory Company, followed by Franz Xaver Kroetz's play Tom Fool at the Citizens' Theatre, which was so well received that it transferred to London, where Madden was spotted by a team from Shakespeare's Globe.
column2: 他在格拉斯哥的苏格兰皇家音乐学院 (RSAMD) 就读，并于 2007 年毕业。在入读 RSAMD 期间，他曾与 Arches and Glasgow Repertory Company 合作，随后在 Citizens 剧院演出 Franz Xaver Kroetz 的戏剧《汤姆傻瓜》，由于该剧广受好评继而又转到伦敦演出，在那里麦登被莎士比亚环球剧院的一个团队相中。

column1: In his final year with RSAMD, he was cast as Romeo in a production of Romeo and Juliet at the modern Globe Theatre which, after an initial run in London, made a tour of open-air stages during the summer of 2007, this being the Globe's first tour.
column2: 在他入读 ARAMD 的最后一年，他在现代环球剧院的《罗密欧与朱丽叶》中饰演罗密欧，该剧在伦敦首次演出后，于 2007 年夏天进行了露天舞台巡演，这是环球剧院的首次巡演。

column1: He played Callum McGregor in the stage production of Malorie Blackman's Noughts & Crosses in 2008.
column2: 2008 年，他在 Malorie Blackman 的《圈与叉》舞台剧中饰演 Callum McGregor。

column1: He later gained the lead role of Dean McKenzie in the 2009 BBC comedy-drama series Hope Springs, followed by his roles as Ripley in the 2010 film Chatroom, and as Theatre of Hate singer Kirk Brandon in the 2010 film Worried About The Boy.
column2: 后来，他在 2009 年 BBC 喜剧剧集《春天的希望》中担任 Dean McKenzie 的主角，随后在 2010 年的电影《聊天弑》中饰演 Ripley，并在 2010 年的电影《乔治男孩》中饰演 Theatre of Hate 的歌手 Kirk Brandon。

column1: From 2011 to 2013, he starred as Robb Stark in the HBO series Game of Thrones, based upon the series of novels, A Song of Ice and Fire, by George R. R. Martin.
column2: 从 2011 年到 2013 年，他在 HBO 剧集《权力的游戏》中饰演罗柏史塔克，该剧改编自乔治 R.R. 马丁的连载小说《冰与火之歌》。

column1: Speaking in September 2018, Madden claimed that he was not paid much for his role in Game of Thrones.
column2: 在 2018 年 9 月的一次发言中，麦登声称他在《权力的游戏》中的角色并未得到多少报酬。

column1: During this period, Madden also starred in the Channel 4 comedy-drama series Sirens,and in the BBC drama series Birdsong.
column2: 在此期间，麦登还出演了第 4 频道的喜剧剧集《急救警情》，以及 BBC 的剧集《鸟鸣》。

column1: In May 2013, Madden was chosen to portray the prince in the live action Disney film Cinderella.
column2: 2013 年 5 月，麦登被选中在迪士尼真人电影《灰姑娘》中饰演王子。

column1: The film was released in March 2015.
column2: 该片于 2015 年 3 月上映。

column1: Madden first obtained his Screen Actors Guild (SAG) card for the 2014 miniseries Klondike, in which he plays Bill Haskell.
column2: 麦登在 2014 年的迷你剧《克朗哈代》中首次获得了演员工会 (SAG) 卡，在该剧中他饰演 Bill Haskell。

column1: Between 12 May and 13 August 2016, Madden appeared on stage in London's West End playing the part of Romeo in Romeo and Juliet, where he was reunited with his Cinderella costar Lily James, who played Juliet, and director Kenneth Branagh.
column2: 2016 年 5 月 12 日至 8 月 13 日，麦登亮相伦敦西区舞台，在《罗密欧与朱丽叶》中饰演罗密欧一角，与饰演朱丽叶的灰姑娘演员莉莉詹姆斯和导演肯尼斯布拉纳重聚。

column1: Richard was replaced as Romeo in July 2016, after suffering an ankle injury.
column2: 2016 年 7 月，理查德在脚踝受伤后被替换掉罗密欧一角。

column1: In 2016, he played the leading role of Cosimo de' Medici, the son of the founder of the Medici Bank during the Italian Renaissance, in the Italian-British television drama series, Medici: Masters of Florence.
column2: 2016 年，他在意大利-英国电视连续剧《美第奇家族：翡冷翠名门》中饰演主角 Cosimo De' Medici，此人是意大利文艺复兴时期美第奇银行创始人之子。

column1: In the same year he played American pickpocket Michael Mason in the 2016 action movie Bastille Day, starring alongside Idris Elba.
column2: 同年，他在 2016 年的动作片《巴黎危机》中饰演美国扒手 Michael Mason，与伊德瑞斯艾尔巴共同主演。

column1: In 2018, Madden garnered widespread critical acclaim and wider recognition for his role as Sergeant David Budd in the BBC thriller series Bodyguard.
column2: 2018 年，麦登凭借在 BBC 惊悚剧集《保镖》中饰演 David Budd 中士一角而获得广泛好评和广泛认可。

column1: After achieving high levels of popularity in the UK, the show was released to a worldwide audience on Netflix in October 2018.
column2: 在英国获得高人气后，该剧于 2018 年 10 月在 Netflix 向全球观众发布。

column1: His performance earned him a Golden Globe Award for Best Actor – Television Series Drama.
column2: 他的表演为他赢得了金球奖最佳男演员 - 电视剧剧情奖。

column1: Bodyguard went on to be nominated for the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Drama Series.
column2: 《保镖》接着被提名为黄金时段艾美奖最佳戏剧类影集。

column1: Jolie first witnessed the effects of a humanitarian crisis while filming Lara Croft: Tomb Raider (2001) in war-torn Cambodia, an experience she later credited with having brought her a greater understanding of the world.
column2: 朱莉在饱受战争蹂躏的柬埔寨拍摄《古墓丽影》（2001 年）时，第一次目睹了人道主义危机的影响，她后来认为这段经历让她对世界有了更深入的了解。

column1: Upon her return home, Jolie contacted the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR) for information on international trouble spots.
column2: 回国后，朱莉与联合国难民事务高级专员署 (UNHCR) 联系，了解国际上不安定地区的信息。

column1: To learn more about the conditions in these areas, she began visiting refugee camps around the world.
column2: 为进一步了解这些地区的情况，她开始访问世界各地的难民营。

column1: In February 2001, she went on her first field visit, an 18-day mission to Sierra Leone and Tanzania; she later expressed her shock at what she had witnessed.
column2: 2001 年 2 月，她进行了第一次实地考察，对塞拉利昂和坦桑尼亚进行了为期 18 天的访问，她后来表示对所目睹的情况感到震惊。

column1: In the following months, Jolie returned to Cambodia for two weeks and met with Afghan refugees in Pakistan, where she donated $1 million in response to an international UNHCR emergency appeal, the largest donation UNHCR had ever received from a private individual.
column2: 在接下来的几个月里，朱莉返回柬埔寨两周，在巴基斯坦会见了阿富汗难民，在那里，她应联合国难民署的国际紧急呼吁，捐赠了 100 万美元，这是联合国难民署有史以来收到的一笔最大金额的私人捐款。

column1: She covered all costs related to her missions and shared the same rudimentary working and living conditions as UNHCR field staff on all of her visits.
column2: 她承担了与她的任务有关的所有费用，在她的所有访问中，她的工作和生活条件与联合国难民署的现场工作人员一样简陋。

column1: Jolie was named a UNHCR Goodwill Ambassador at UNHCR headquarters in Geneva on August 27, 2001.
column2: 2001 年 8 月 27 日，朱莉在联合国难民署日内瓦总部被任命为联合国难民署亲善大使。

column1: Over the next decade, she went on more than 40 field missions, meeting with refugees and internally displaced persons in over 30 countries.
column2: 在接下来的十年里，她进行了 40 多次实地考察，与 30 多个国家的难民和国内流离失所者会面。

column1: In 2002, when asked what she hoped to accomplish, she stated, "Awareness of the plight of these people.
column2: 2002 年，在被问及她希望实现什么目标时，她说道，“意识到这些人的困境。

column1: I think they should be commended for what they have survived, not looked down upon." To that end, her 2001–02 field visits were chronicled in her book Notes from My Travels, which was published in October 2003 in conjunction with the release of her humanitarian drama Beyond Borders.
column2: 我认为他们能活下来值得称赞，不应该看不起他们。”为此，她在《我的旅行笔记》一书中记录了她在 2001-02 年的实地访问，该书于 2003 年 10 月与她的人道主义戏剧《超越边界》同时发布。

column1: Jolie aimed to visit what she termed "forgotten emergencies," crises that media attention had shifted away from.
column2: 朱莉的目标是访问她口中的“被遗忘的紧急局势”，即媒体不再关注的危机。

column1: She became noted for traveling to war zones, such as Sudan's Darfur region during the Darfur conflict, the Syrian-Iraqi border during the Second Gulf War, where she met privately with U.S. troops and other multi-national forces, and the Afghan capital Kabul during the war in Afghanistan, where three aid workers were murdered in the midst of her first visit.
column2: 她也因前往战区而受到关注，例如在达尔富尔冲突期间前往苏丹的达尔富尔地区，在第二次海湾战争期间前往叙利亚-伊拉克边境，在那里她与美军和其它多国部队进行了私下会晤，在阿富汗战争期间前往阿富汗首都喀布尔，在她第一次访问期间有三名援助人员被杀。

column1: To aid her travels, she began taking flying lessons in 2004 with the aim of ferrying aid workers and food supplies around the world; she now holds a private pilot license with instrument rating and owns a Cirrus SR22 and Cessna 208 Caravan single-engine aircraft.
column2: 为出行之便，她于 2004 年开始参加飞行课程，目的是在世界各地运送援助人员和食品物资；她现在拥有仪表级别的私人飞行执照，并拥有一架 Cirrus SR22 和 Cessna 208 Caravan 单引擎飞机。

column1: On April 17, 2012, after more than a decade of service as a UNHCR Goodwill Ambassador, Jolie was promoted to the rank of Special Envoy to High Commissioner António Guterres, the first to take on such a position within the organization.
column2: 2012 年 4 月 17 日，在担任联合国难民署亲善大使十多年后，朱莉被提名为高级专员安东尼奥古特雷斯的特使，成为该组织内第一个担任此类职务的人。

column1: In her expanded role, she was given authority to represent Guterres and UNHCR at the diplomatic level, with a focus on major refugee crises.
column2: 在她的角色扩大之后，她被授权在外交层面代表古特雷斯和联合国难民署，重点关注重大难民危机。

column1: In the months following her promotion, she made her first visit as Special Envoy—her third over all—to Ecuador, where she met with Colombian refugees, and she accompanied Guterres on a week-long tour of Jordan, Lebanon, Turkey, and Iraq, to assess the situation of refugees from neighboring Syria.
column2: 在晋升后的几个月里，她作为特使首次出访厄瓜多尔，这是她第三次访问厄瓜多尔，在那里她会见了哥伦比亚难民，她还陪同古特雷斯对约旦、黎巴嫩、土耳其和伊拉克进行了为期一周的访问，以评估来自邻国叙利亚的难民的状况。

column1: Since then, Jolie has gone on over a dozen field missions around the world to meet with refugees and undertake advocacy on their behalf.
column2: 此后，朱莉在世界各地进行了十多次实地考察，与难民会面并代表他们进行宣传。

column1: In an effort to connect her Cambodian-born adopted son with his heritage, Jolie purchased a house in his country of birth in 2003.
column2: 为了让她的柬埔寨出生的养子与他的传统建立联系，朱莉于 2003 年在他的出生国购买了一幢房子。

column1: The traditional home sat on 39 hectares in the northwestern province Battambang, adjacent to Samlout national park in the Cardamom mountains, which had become infiltrated with poachers who threatened endangered species.
column2: 这幢传统住宅位于马德望省西北部的 39 公顷土地上，毗邻 Cardamom 山的 Samlout 国家公园，危及濒危物种的偷猎者已渗入该公园。

column1: She purchased the park's 60,000 hectares and turned the area into a wildlife reserve named for her son, the Maddox Jolie Project.
column2: 她购买了该公园的 6 万公顷土地，并将该地区变成了一个以她的儿子命名的野生动物保护区，即马多克斯朱莉项目。

column1: Released as a single in July 1969, "Space Oddity" was a largely acoustic number augmented by the eerie tones of the composer's Stylophone, a pocket electronic organ.
column2: “太空怪谈”于 1969 年 7 月作为单曲发行，它在很大程度上是由作曲家的 Stylophone，一种袖珍电子琴发出的怪诞音调增强的原声数字音乐。

column1: The title and subject matter were inspired by Stanley Kubrick's 2001: A Space Odyssey and introduced the character of Major Tom.
column2: 标题和主题的灵感来自 Stanley Kubrick 的《2001 太空漫游》，并引入了 Major Tome 这个人物。

column1: The song dates back as early as February 1969.
column2: 这首歌最早可以追溯到 1969 年 2 月。

column1: It was written for a promotional video named "Love You till Tuesday".
column2: 它是为一段叫做“爱你到星期二”的宣传片写的。

column1: The video's intent was to sell Bowie to a new label as he had been dropped from Deram Records in April 1968.
column2: 这段视频的目的是将鲍伊卖给一家新的唱片公司，因为他在 1968 年 4 月退出了 Deram Records。

column1: He was urged by his manager Kenneth Pitt to record some new material and so "Space Oddity" was born.
column2: 他的经纪人 Kenneth Pitt 力劝他录制一些新素材，于是“太空怪谈”就诞生了。

column1: Some commentators have also seen the song as a metaphor for heroin use, citing the opening countdown as analogous to the drug's passage down the needle prior to the euphoric 'hit', and noting Bowie's admission of a "silly flirtation with smack" in 1968.
column2: 一些批评家认为这首歌是对使用海洛因的隐喻，认为开头的倒计时类似于毒品在兴奋的“撞击”之前顺着针头穿行而下的过程，并指出鲍伊在 1968 年承认“一时兴起愚蠢吸食海洛因”。

column1: His 1980 hit "Ashes to Ashes" declared "We know Major Tom's a junkie".
column2: 他在 1980 年的主打歌“灰烬归灰烬”中宣称“我们知道 Major Tom 是个瘾君子”。

column1: Unwashed and Somewhat Slightly Dazed reflected a strong Bob Dylan influence, with its harmonica, edgy guitar sound and snarling vocal.
column2: “脏兮兮的还有点头晕”体现出鲍勃迪伦的强大影响，其中含有口琴、前卫的吉他声和咆哮的嗓音。

column1: Letter to Hermione was a farewell ballad to Bowie's former girlfriend, Hermione Farthingale, who was also the subject of "An Occasional Dream", a gentle folk tune reminiscent of the singer's 1967 debut album.
column2: “给赫敏的信”是一首向鲍伊的前女友 Hermione Farthinggale 告别的民谣，她也是“偶尔的梦”的主题，这是一首温和的民谣，让人想起这位歌手 1967 年的首张专辑。

column1: God Knows I'm Good, Bowie's observational tale of a shoplifter's plight, also recalled his earlier style.
column2: 在“上帝知道我的好”中，鲍伊吟唱了他目睹的一个商店行窃者处境的故事，也让人想起他早期的风格。

column1: Cygnet Committee has been called Bowie's "first true masterpiece".
column2: “小天鹅委员会”被称为鲍伊“第一首真正的杰作”。

column1: Commonly regarded as the album track most indicative of the composer's future direction, its lead character is a messianic figure "who breaks down barriers for his younger followers, but finds that he has only provided them with the means to reject and destroy him".
column2: 他的主角是一个救世主式的人物，“他为他的年轻追随者打破了障碍，但却发现他只是为他们提供了拒绝和摧毁他的手段”，通常被认为是最能表明作曲家未来方向的专辑曲目。

column1: Bowie himself described it at the time as a put down of hippies who seemed ready to follow any charismatic leader.
column2: 鲍伊本人当时将它描述为对似乎随时追随任何魅力领袖的嬉皮士的贬低。

column1: Another track cited as foreshadowing themes to which Bowie would return in the 1970s, in this case the fracturing of personality, was "Janine", which featured the words "But if you took an axe to me, you'd kill another man not me at all".
column2: 另一首被认为预示着鲍伊在 20 世纪 70 年代回归的主题曲是“珍妮”，体现出人格分裂，其中含有歌词“但如果你拿斧头砍我，你会杀死另一个人而不是我”。

column1: The Buddhism-influenced "Wild Eyed Boy from Freecloud" was presented in a heavily expanded form compared to the original guitar-and-cello version on the B-side of the "Space Oddity" single; the album cut featured a 50-piece orchestra.
column2: 与“太空怪谈”单曲B面的原始吉他和大提琴版本相比，“来自 Freecloud 的野眼男孩”以极度膨胀的形式呈现；专辑剪辑呈现出一支50人的管弦乐队。

column1: Memory of a Free Festival was Bowie's reminiscence of an arts festival he had organised in August 1969.
column2: “自由节日的记忆”是鲍伊对他在1969 年 8 月组织的艺术节的追忆。

column1: Its drawn-out fade/chorus ("The Sun Machine is coming down / And we're gonna have a party") was compared to The Beatles' "Hey Jude"; the song has also been interpreted as a derisive comment on the counterculture it was ostensibly celebrating.
column2: 它拖长的淡化/副歌（“太阳就要落下 / 派对即将开始”）被比作披头士的“嘿，朱迪”；这首歌也被解读为对它表面上所庆祝的反主流文化的嘲讽。

column1: The background vocals for the crowd finale featured Bob Harris, his wife Sue, Tony Woollcott and Marc Bolan among other people.
column2: 尾声为 Bob Harris、他的妻子 Sue、Tony Woollcott 和 Marc Bolan 等人在人群中的背景式演唱。

column1: In 1970 Bowie cut the tune in half for the A- and B-sides of a more rock-oriented version featuring the band that would accompany him on The Man Who Sold the World later that year: Mick Ronson, Tony Visconti and Mick Woodmansey – an embryonic form of Ziggy Stardust's Spiders From Mars.
column2: 1970 年，鲍伊将这首曲子一分为二，作为更注重摇滚的版本的 A 面和 B 面，这支乐队将在同年晚些时候为他的“出卖世界的人”伴奏：Mick Ronson、Tony Visconti 和 Mick Woodmansey - 来自火星的 Ziggy Stardust 的雏形。

column1: NY 215 began at a three-way intersection with NY 360 east of the hamlet of Morton in the town of Hamlin.
column2: NY 215 始于 Hamlin 镇 Morton 村以东与 NY 360 的一个三岔路口。

column1: NY 360 turned off Redman Road here to follow Morton Road west to the hamlet of Morton while NY 215 headed north on Redman Road.
column2: NY 360 在这里转出 Redman 路，沿着 Morton 路到达 Morton 村，而NY 215 则沿着 Redman 路向北。

column1: It passed by open, cultivated fields and small pockets of residences as it proceeded through rural northwestern Monroe County.
column2: 在穿过 Monroe 县西北部农村时，会经过开阔的耕地和小片的住宅。

column1: After 1.5 miles (2.4 km), NY 215 intersected Moscow Road, a local highway connecting NY 215 to the then-western end of the Lake Ontario State Parkway.
column2: 1.5 英里（2.4 公里）后，NY 215 与莫斯科路交汇，这是一条连接 NY 215 和当时安大略湖州立公园路西端的地方公路。

column1: North of Moscow Road, the fields on the highway's east side slowly gave way to forested areas as the route approached Hamlin Beach State Park and intersected Cook Road.
column2: 在莫斯科路以北，随着路线接近 Hamlin Beach 州立公园并与 Cook 路交汇，公路东侧的田地逐渐让位给森林地带。

column1: The route terminated 500 feet (150 m) north of Cook Road at the southern boundary of Hamlin Beach State Park.
column2: 这条路线在 Hamlin Beach 州立公园南部边界的 Cook 路以北 500 英尺（150 米）处终止。

column1: The physical roadway continued into the park and to nearby Lake Ontario as a local highway.
column2: 实体道路继续进入公园，并作为地方公路通往附近的安大略湖。

column1: The portion of Redman Road north of modern NY 360 in Hamlin was a state highway as early as 1920; however, it was not assigned a designation until the early 1940s, when it became NY 215.
column2: Hamlin 现代化的 NY 360 以北的 Redman 路部分早在 1920 年就是一条州立公路；然而，直到 20 世纪 40 年代初，它才被指定为 NY 215。

column1: At the time, it was the primary highway to and from Hamlin Beach State Park on the Lake Ontario shoreline, as no continuous east–west lakeside roadway existed at the time.
column2: 当时，它是往返于安大略湖岸边的 Hamlin Beach 州立公园的主要公路，因为当时没有连续的东西向湖滨公路。

column1: This changed in the late 1940s and early 1950s following the construction of the Lake Ontario State Parkway, a lakeshore highway connecting the park to NY 261 in Greece.
column2: 在 20 世纪 40 年代末和 50 年代初，这种情况随着安大略湖州立公园路的建设而改变，这条湖滨公路连接公园和希腊的 NY 261。

column1: The parkway began east of NY 215 at Moscow Road and provided a direct connection to Hamlin Beach State Park from Greece, and eventually Rochester.
column2: 这条公园路在莫斯科路的 NY 215 路以东开始，从希腊直接连接到 Harmlin Beach 州立公园，并最终连接到罗切斯特。

column1: As a result, NY 215 became merely an alternate route to the park.
column2: 因此，NY 215 仅仅成为通往该公园的一条备用路线。

column1: In the early 1970s, the Lake Ontario State Parkway was extended westward across Monroe and Orleans counties to Lakeside Beach State Park in Carlton.
column2: 在 20 世纪 70 年代初，安大略湖州立公园路向西延伸，穿过 Monroe 和 Orleans 县，到达 Carlton 的 Lakeside Beach 州立公园。

column1: NY 215's connection to Hamlin Beach State Park was severed as part of the construction.
column2: 在建设中，NY 215 与 Harmlin Beach 州立公园的连接被切断。

column1: As a result, the remaining portion of NY 215 from NY 360 to Cook Road lost its signed route status and was redesignated NY 941P, an unsigned reference route.
column2: 因此，NY 215 从 NY 360 到 Cook 路的剩余部分失去了标示路线地位，被重新指定为一条无标示的参考路线 NY941P。

column1: The highway remained state maintained until 2007, when ownership and maintenance of it was transferred from the state of New York to Monroe County as part of a highway maintenance swap between the two levels of government.
column2: 直到 2007 年，这条公路一直由州政府维护，作为两级政府之间公路维护交换的一部分，该公路的所有权和维护从纽约州移交给 Monroe 县。

column1: A bill (S4856, 2007) to enact the swap was introduced in the New York State Senate on April 23 and passed by both the Senate and the New York State Assembly on June 20.
column2: 4 月 23 日，纽约州参议院提出了一项关于交换的法案（S4856，2007），并在 6 月 20 日获得参议院和纽约州议会通过。

column1: The act was signed into law by Governor Eliot Spitzer on August 28. Under the terms of the act, it took effect 90 days after it was signed into law; thus, the maintenance swap officially took place on November 26, 2007. The former routing of NY 941P is now part of CR 236.
column2: 该法案于 8 月 28 日由州长 Eliot Sitzer 签署成为法律。根据法案条款，它在签署成为法律 90 天后生效；因此，维护交换于 2007 年 11 月 26 日正式进行。NY 941P 以前的路线现在成为 CR 236 的一部分。

column1: Like all species in the genus Lactarius, L. subflammeus is mycorrhizal, forming mutualistic associations with trees.
column2: 与乳菇属的所有物种一样，L.subflammeus 是菌根，与树木形成共生关系。

column1: The fungus and the plant forms structures called ectomycorrhizae, a specialized sheath of hyphae on the surface of the root from which hyphae extend into the soil and into the outer cortical cells of the root.
column2: 真菌和植物形成叫做外生菌根的结构，这是根部表面上的一种专门的菌丝鞘，菌丝从这里延伸到土壤中，进入根部的外部皮质细胞。

column1: The fruit bodies of L. subflammeus grow scattered to grouped under conifers or in mixed conifer-hardwood forests near pine and spruce, from August to December.
column2: 从 8 月到 12 月，L.subflammeus 的子实体分散生长在针叶树下或松树和云杉附近的针叶-硬木混交林中。

column1: The fungus is widely distributed in the Pacific Northwest, where it is very common in conifer forests.
column2: 该真菌广泛分布在西北太平洋地区，在针叶林中很常见。

column1: The habitat of the type location was coastal sand dunes under pine.
column2: 生境位置类型为松树下的沿海沙丘。

column1: States from which the fungus has been collected include Washington, Idaho, Oregon, California, and Colorado.
column2: 采集到这种真菌的州包括华盛顿、爱达荷、俄勒冈、加利福利亚和科罗拉多。

column1: The mushroom's range extends north into Canada, where it has been found near Victoria, British Columbia in coastal forests dominated by Douglas-fir (Pseudotsuga menziesii).
column2: 这种蘑菇的分布范围向北延伸到加拿大，在不列颠哥伦比亚省维多利亚附近以花旗松 (Pseudotsuga menziesii) 为主的沿海森林中发现了它的身影。

column1: Brooks left St.
column2: Brooks 离开了 St.

column1: Ives and moved to Paris.
column2: lves 并搬到巴黎。

column1: Poor young painters such as Pablo Picasso and Henri Matisse were creating new art in the Bohemian districts of Montparnasse and Montmartre.
column2: 贫穷的年轻画家如巴勃罗毕加索和亨利马蒂斯正在蒙巴纳斯和蒙马特的波西米亚区创造新艺术。

column1: In contrast, Brooks took an apartment in the fashionable 16th arrondissement, mingled in elite social circles, and painted portraits of wealthy and titled women.
column2: 相比之下，布鲁克斯在时尚的第 16 区租了一套公寓，混迹于精英社交圈，并为有爵位的富有女性绘制肖像。

column1: These included her current lover, the Princess de Polignac.
column2: 这些人中包括她的现任情人 de Polignac 公主。

column1: In 1910 Brooks had her first solo show at the prestigious Gallery Durand-Ruel, displaying thirteen paintings, almost all of women or young girls.
column2: 1910 年，布鲁克斯在著名的 Durand-Ruel 画廊举办了她的首场个人展，展出了 13 幅几乎都为妇女或年轻女孩的画作。

column1: Some were portraits; others showed anonymous models in interior scenes or against tonal backgrounds, often with pensive or withdrawn expressions.
column2: 有些是肖像画；其他的则是在室内场景或色调背景下的无名模特，她们往往带着沉思或孤僻的表情。

column1: The paintings were generally naturalistic, showing an attentive eye for the details of Belle Époque fashion, with parasols, veils, and elaborate bonnets on display.
column2: 这些画作通常透露出自然主义，展现出对美好年代时尚细节的关注，展示了遮阳伞、面纱和精致的帽子。

column1: Brooks included two nude studies in this first exhibition—a provocative choice for a woman artist in 1910.
column2: 布鲁克斯的首场展览中包含两幅裸体研究，这对 1910 年的女艺术家来说是一种挑衅的选择。

column1: In The Red Jacket, a young woman stands in front of a large folding screen, wearing only a small open jacket, with her hands behind her back.
column2: 在“红夹克”中，一名年轻女子站在一块大折叠屏风前，只穿着一件敞开的小外套，双手背在身后。

column1: She is so frail, and her downcast face looks so forlorn that one contemporary reviewer referred to her as a consumptive; Brooks described her simply as "a poor girl who was cold".
column2: 她如此虚弱，她低垂的脸看起来如此悲凉，以至于一位当代评论家称她是痨病患者；布鲁克斯对她的描述只是“一个寒冷的可怜女孩”。

column1: The other, White Azaleas, is a more sexually charged nude study of a woman reclining on a couch.
column2: 在另一幅“白色杜鹃花”中，则对斜倚沙发的一名女子进行了更具性感色彩的裸体研究。

column1: Contemporary reviews compared it to Francisco de Goya's La maja desnuda and Édouard Manet's Olympia.
column2: 当代评论将其与弗朗西斯科戈雅的“裸体的马哈”和爱德华马奈的“奥林匹亚”相提并论。

column1: Unlike the women in those paintings, the subject of White Azaleas looks away from the viewer; in the background above her is a series of Japanese prints which Brooks loved.
column2: 与这些画中的女人不同，“白色杜鹃花”的对象把目光从观众身上移开；她上方的背景是布鲁克斯喜欢的一系列日本版画。

column1: The exhibition established Brooks' reputation as an artist.
column2: 这次展览奠定了布鲁克斯作为艺术家的声誉。

column1: Reviews were effusive, and the poet Robert de Montesquiou wrote an appreciation calling her "the thief of souls." The restrained, almost monochromatic decor of her home also attracted attention; she was often asked to give advice on interior design, and sometimes did, though she did not relish the role of decorator.
column2: 人们对她赞不绝口，诗人罗贝尔德孟德斯鸠写了一篇评论，称她是“灵魂窃贼”。她家几乎是单色的朴素装饰也吸引了人们的注意；经常有人要她提供室内设计方面的建议，虽然有时她会这样做，但她并不喜欢装饰师的角色。

column1: Brooks became increasingly disillusioned with Parisian high society, finding the conversation dull, and feeling that people were whispering about her.
column2: 布鲁克斯对巴黎上流社会越来越失望，发现谈吐乏味，觉得充满流言蜚语。

column1: Despite her artistic success, she described herself as a lapidée—literally, a victim of stoning.
column2: 尽管她在艺术上取得了成功，但她仍将自己描述为 lapidée — 字面意思就是石刑的受害者。

column1: In 1909 Brooks met Gabriele D'Annunzio, an Italian writer and politician who had come to France to escape his debts.
column2: 1909 年，布鲁克斯遇到了一位为了躲债来到法国的意大利作家和政治家加布里埃尔邓南遮。

column1: She saw him as a martyred artist, another lapidé; he wrote poems based on her works and called her "the most profound and wise orchestrator of grays in modern painting".
column2: 她视他为一名殉道的艺术家，另一个 lapidé；他根据她的作品写诗，称她为“现代绘画中最深刻、最睿智的灰色协调者”。

column1: Astrocytes form gap junctions and are closely associated with the vasculature and its basal lamina in the adult SVZ and subsequently in the RMS.
column2: 星形胶质细胞形成间隙连接，并与成体 SVZ 以及后续 RMS 中的血管及其基底层密切相关。

column1: They may serve as an interface to modulate influences of endothelial and circulation-derived factors as well as the availability of cytokines and growth factors in this system.
column2: 它们可能作为一个接口来调节内皮和循环源性因素的影响以及该系统中细胞因子和生长因子的可用性。

column1: In addition, astrocytes derived from the neurogenic hippocampus and SVZ, but not from the non-neurogenic spinal cord, promote proliferation and neuronal fate commitment of multipotent adult neural stem cells in culture, suggesting a role in the RMS.
column2: 此外，来自神经源性海马和 SVZ 的星形胶质细胞，而不是来自非神经源性脊髓的星形胶质细胞，在培养中能促进多能成体神经干细胞的增殖和神经元命运决定，表明了它在 RMS 中的作用。

column1: Astrocytes express a number of secreted and membrane-attached factors both in vitro and in vivo that are known to regulate proliferation and fate specification of adult neural precursors as well as neuronal migration, maturation, and synapse formation.
column2: 星形胶质细胞在体外和体内都表达一些分泌和膜附着的因子，这些因子已知可调节成体神经前体的增殖和命运规范，以及神经元迁移、成熟和突触的形成。

column1: In the adult SVZ, astrocytes express Robo receptors and regulate the rapid migration of SLIT1-expressing neuroblasts through the RMS.
column2: 在成体 SVZ 中，星形胶质细胞表达 Robo 受体并调节表达 SLIT1 的神经母细胞通过 RMS 的快速迁移。

column1: Additionally, it has been proposed that the neuroblasts themselves play a role in modulating the astrocytes through Slit-Robo interactions.
column2: 此外，有人提出，神经母细胞本身通过 Slit-Robo 相互作用在调节星形胶质细胞方面起作用。

column1: In the absence of Slit, astrocytic processes do not align correctly, or create the "tubes", instead running across the migrating neurons.
column2: 在没有 Slit 的情况下，星形胶质细胞过程不能正确对齐，也不能形成“管道”，而是穿过迁移的神经元。

column1: Adult SVZ astrocytes also appear to release glutamate to regulate the survival of neuroblasts.
column2: 成体 SVZ 星形胶质细胞似乎也释放谷氨酸来调节神经母细胞的生存。

column1: Unique to the adult SVZ, ependymal cells lining the ventricular wall are in close association with neural precursors and their progeny, acting like a shield to protect the "neurogenic niche", a zone in which stem cells are retained after embryonic development for the production of new cells of the nervous system.
column2: 成体 SVZ 的独特之处在于，心室壁内的室管膜细胞与神经前体及其后代密切相关，就像是一个保护“神经原性生态位”的盾牌，该区域的干细胞在胚胎发育后被保留下来，用于制造神经系统的新细胞。

column1: Ependymal cells actively regulate neuronal fate specification of adult neural precursors through release of Noggin.
column2: 室管膜细胞通过释放 Noggin 积极调节成体神经前体的神经元命运规范。

column1: Beating of the cilia of ependymal cells appears to set up concentration gradients of guidance molecules, such as cytokines TNF-α (tumor necrosis factor) and IGF-1 (insulin-like growth factor), to direct migration of neuroblasts, such as in the RMS.
column2: 室管膜细胞的纤毛跳动似乎建立了引导分子的浓度梯度，如神经因子TNF-α（肿瘤坏死因子）和 IGF-1（胰岛素样生长因子），以指导 RMS 等中的神经母细胞迁移 。

column1: Microglia also actively regulate adult neurogenesis.
column2: 小胶质细胞也积极调节成体神经发生。

column1: Under basal conditions, apoptotic corpses of newly generated neurons are rapidly phagocytosed from the niche by unactivated microglia in the adult SGZ.
column2: 在基础条件下，成体 SGZ 中未激活的小胶质细胞会迅速吞噬新生神经元的凋亡尸体。

column1: Under inflammatory conditions, reactivated microglia can have both beneficial and detrimental effects on different aspects of adult neurogenesis, depending on the balance between secreted molecules with pro- and anti-inflammatory action.
column2: 在炎症条件下，重新激活的小胶质细胞可以对成体神经发生的不同方面产生有益和有害的影响，具体取决于具有促炎和抗炎作用的分泌分子的平衡。

column1: In one study, the activation of microglia and recruitment of T cells were suggested to be required for enriched environment-induced SGZ neurogenesis, suggesting a possible role in the RMS.
column2: 在一项研究中，小胶质细胞激活和 T 细胞募集表明对丰富的环境诱导的 SGZ 神经发生必不可少，这说明在 RMS 中可能有作用。

column1: Cells in the RMS are believed to move by "chain migration".
column2: RMS 中的细胞被认为是通过“链式迁移”移动的。

column1: These neuroblasts are connected by membrane specializations including gap junctions and adherens junctions, moving along each other towards the olfactory bulb through glial tubes.
column2: 这些神经母细胞通过膜特化连接，包括间隙连接和粘附连接，通过胶质管彼此朝嗅球移动。

column1: The pathway and mechanisms behind this movement are a ventriculo-olfactory neurogenic system (VONS), a glial framework, and a chemotaxic cell signalling system.
column2: 这种运动背后的途径和机制是脑室-嗅觉神经源系统 (VONS)、胶质框架和趋化细胞信号传导系统。

column1: The olfactory system is made up in part of the RMS which stretches from the subventricular zone in the wall of the lateral ventricle, through the basal forebrain, to the olfactory bulb (OB).
column2: 嗅觉系统部分由 RMS 组成，RMS 从侧脑室壁的脑室下区延伸到基底前脑，再到嗅球 (OB)。

column1: VONS is the name given to this pathway, and it consists of the subventricular zone, the RMS, the olfactory tract and the olfactory bulb.
column2: VONS 是这个通路的名称，它由脑室下区、RMS、嗅道和嗅球组成。

column1: On January 21, 2007, the Regional Specialized Meteorological Centre in Nadi, Fiji identified a tropical depression, which was given the number 08F, about 435 km (270 mi) west-northwest of Savai'i island in Samoa.
column2: 2007 年 1 月 21 日，斐济纳迪的区域专业气象中心在萨摩亚萨瓦伊岛西北偏西约 435 公里（270 英里）处发现一个热带低气压，其编号为08F。

column1: The depression slowly traveled towards the east-southeast for several days as the overall structure of the storm fluctuated due to diurnal variations and strong wind shear.
column2: 该气压在几天内缓慢地向东-东南方向移动，因为风暴的整体结构因昼夜变化和强风切变而波动。

column1: Around 1700 UTC on January 22, the Joint Typhoon Warning Center (JTWC) issued a Tropical Cyclone Formation Alert for the depression.
column2: 1 月 22 日 UTC 时间 17 时左右，联合台风警报中心 (JTWC) 对该低气压发布了热带气旋形成警报。

column1: The system developed a large banding feature in the northern portion of the circulation and deep convection formed around the center of circulation.
column2: 该系统在环流北部形成一处大型带状特征，环流中心周围形成深层对流。

column1: The depression had moved into an area of weak to moderate wind shear with favorable diffulence aloft.
column2: 该低气压已进入一个弱到中等风切变区域，高处扩散良好。

column1: Later that day, gale warnings were issued for the northeastern quadrant of the system.
column2: 当天晚些时候，该系统的东北部地区发布大风警报。

column1: Tropical Depression 08F continued to develop as an anticyclone developed above the system, enhancing the environment around it.
column2: 热带低气压 08F 继续发展，因为该系统上方一个反气旋加强了它周围的环境。

column1: A mid-latitude trough located north of the depression was steering it towards the east.
column2: 位于低气压北部的一个中纬槽将其引向东部。

column1: Early on January 24, the system became better organized and strengthened into a cyclone at 0600 UTC.
column2: 1 月 24 日早些时候，该系统变得更有组织性，并在 UTC 时间 6 时加强成气旋。

column1: The storm, which was named Arthur by the RSMC Nadi, began to undergo rapid intensification as the structure improved significantly.
column2: 这个被 RSMC Nadi 命名为亚瑟的风暴，随着结构明显改善而开始迅速增强。

column1: Deep convection developed around the center with strong outflow towards the north.
column2: 中心周围形成了深层对流，向北流出强烈。

column1: Several hours after becoming a cyclone, the JTWC issued their first advisory on Tropical Cyclone 09P as it traveled quickly towards the east-southeast.
column2: 在成为气旋后的几个小时，由于热带气旋 09P 迅速向东南方移动，JTWC 对它发布了第一个警告。

column1: The quick movement was due to the influences of subtropical ridge to the north and a trough to the south.
column2: 这种快速移动是由于北部的副热带脊和南部的低谷影响。

column1: Later that day, a banding eye feature began to develop as the storm intensified into a Category 2 cyclone on the Australian intensity scale.
column2: 当天晚些时候，随着风暴加强为澳大利亚强度等级为 2 类的气旋，开始形成带状眼特征。

column1: At 1800 UTC, the JTWC assessed Arthur to have reached its peak intensity with winds of 120 km/h (75 mph 1-minute winds), the equivalent of a minimal Category 1 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale.
column2: 在 UTC 时间 18 时，JTWC 评估亚瑟达到了它的峰值强度，风速为 120 公里/小时（1 分钟 75 英里的风速），相当于 Saffir-Simpson 飓风等级中的最小 1 类飓风。

column1: Early on January 25, Arthur reached its peak intensity with winds of 110 km/h (70 mph 10-minute winds) with a minimum pressure of 975 hPa (mbar) while located about 635 km (350 mi) north-northwest of Rarotonga.
column2: 1 月 25 日早些时候，在 Rarotonga 西北方向约 635 公里（350 英里）处，亚瑟达到峰值强度，风速为 110 公里/小时（10 分钟 70 英里的风速），最低气压为 975 hPa (mbar)。

column1: Shortly after peaking in intensity, Arthur began to undergo an extratropical transition and rapidly deteriorated due to strong wind shear.
column2: 在强度达到顶峰后不久，亚瑟开始经历外热带的转变，并由于强风切变而迅速恶化。

column1: The storm also began to merge with a low-level frontal boundary associated with the remnants of Tropical Cyclone Zita.
column2: 风暴也开始与与热带气旋 Zita 残余势力有关的低层锋面边界合并。

column1: The strong shear left the center of circulation partially exposed, with deep convection persisting in only the southeastern quadrant.
column2: 强烈的切变使得环流中心部分暴露，只有东南方向的深层对流持续存在。

column1: In addition to the shear, dry air began to enter the system, causing it to weaken further.
column2: 除了切变之外，干燥空气开始进入系统，导致它进一步减弱。

column1: The olm is a symbol of Slovenian natural heritage.
column2: 人鱼是斯洛文尼亚自然遗产的一种象征。

column1: The enthusiasm of scientists and the broader public about this inhabitant of Slovenian caves is still strong 300 years after its discovery.
column2: 在它被发现的 300 年后，科学家和广大公众对斯洛文尼亚洞穴这一栖息动物的热情仍然很强烈。

column1: Postojna Cave is one of the birthplaces of speleobiology due to the olm and other rare cave inhabitants, such as the blind cave beetle.
column2: 由于人鱼和盲螈等其他罕见的洞穴栖息动物，波斯托伊纳洞穴成为洞穴生物学的诞生地之一。

column1: The image of the olm contributes significantly to the fame of Postojna Cave, which Slovenia successfully utilizes for the promotion of ecotourism in Postojna and other parts of Slovenian karst.
column2: 人鱼形象极大促进了波斯托伊纳洞穴的名气，斯洛文尼亚成功地利用它来促进波斯托伊纳和斯洛文尼亚其他喀斯特地区的生态旅游。

column1: Tours of Postojna Cave also include a tour around the speleobiological station – the Proteus vivarium, showing different aspects of the cave environment.
column2: 波斯托伊纳洞穴旅游还包括参观洞穴生物学站 - Proteus 动物园，展示洞穴环境的不同方面。

column1: The olm was also depicted on one of the Slovenian tolar coins, and was the namesake of Proteus, the oldest Slovenian popular science magazine, first published in 1933.
column2: 人鱼也被描绘在斯洛文尼亚的一枚托拉尔硬币上，并且与斯洛文尼亚最古老的科普杂志，于 1933 年首次出版的《Proteus》同名。

column1: Heavy rains from the storm affected the Philippines, causing flooding that forced 3,500 people to evacuate their houses.
column2: 风暴带来的大雨影响了菲律宾，引发洪水，迫使 3,500 人撤离家园。

column1: This occurred after a month of heavy rainfall from several tropical cyclones in July.
column2: 这发生在七月份几个热带气旋带来一个月的强降雨之后。

column1: Officials closed schools and advised small boats to remain at port.
column2: 官员们关闭了学校，并建议将小型船只停泊在港口。

column1: A vessel capsized offshore Antique Province, and its crew of 15 was rescued.
column2: 一艘船在安蒂克省近海倾覆，船上 15 名船员获救。

column1: At least six people died due to electrocution, after downed power lines touched floodwaters.
column2: 倾倒的电线接触洪水，至少有六人因触电而死亡。

column1: The storm spawned a tornado and caused landslides in Negros Oriental.
column2: 这场风暴在东内格罗省引发了一场龙卷风，并造成山体滑坡。

column1: The storm killed 35 people in the country and injured 22 others.
column2: 这场风暴造成全国 35 人死亡，22 人受伤。

column1: Damage was estimated at $3.3 million (₱172 million 2002 PHP).
column2: 损失估计为 330 万美元（2002 年 1.72 亿菲律宾比索）。

column1: Milenyo was the final storm to be named by PAGASA during 2002.
column2: Milenyo 是 PAGASA 命名的 2002 年最后一场风暴。

column1: On August 17, the Hong Kong Observatory (HKO) issued standby signal number 1 due to the storm's reformation in the South China Sea.
column2: 8 月 17 日，由于该风暴在中国南海进行了重整，香港天文台 (HKO) 发出了 1 号待命信号。

column1: Vongfong made landfall west of the territory, although its outer rainbands spread across the region.
column2: Vongfong 在该地区西部登陆，不过它的外围雨带遍布整个地区。

column1: Slick roads contributed to a traffic accident in Sai Kung in which one person was killed.
column2: 道路湿滑导致西贡发生一起交通事故，其中一人死亡。

column1: Rainfall in Hong Kong reached 133 mm (5.2 in) in the town of Kwai Chung.
column2: 香港葵涌的降雨量达到 133 毫米（5.2 英寸）。

column1: The rainbands also produced gusty winds; sustained winds peaked at 75 km/h (47 mph), with gusts to 110 km/h (68 mph) at the mountain peak of Tai Mo Shan.
column2: 雨带也产生了狂风；持续风速最高达到 75 公里/小时（47 英里/小时），大帽山山顶的阵风达到 110 公里/小时（68 英里/小时）。

column1: While moving ashore, Vongfong produced a storm surge of 0.48 m (1.6 ft) in Shek Pik.
column2: 上岸后，Vongfong 在石壁产生了 0.48 米（1.6 英尺）的风暴潮。

column1: The storm downed a few trees across the territory, and a fallen branch injured one man.
column2: 风暴吹倒了该地区的几棵树，一根倒下来的树枝伤到了一名男子。

column1: Another person was injured by a damaged awning.
column2: 另一人被损坏的遮阳棚砸伤。

column1: In Hainan, the threat from Vongfong prompted officials to close the primary airport and to restrict sea traffic with Guangdong.
column2: 在海南，来自 Vongfong 的威胁促使官员关闭主要机场，并限制与广东的海上交通。

column1: As a result, 113 flights were delayed, stranding more than 3,000 people.
column2: 结果，113 个航班延误，3,000 多人被困。

column1: On the island, rainfall reached as high as 240 mm (9.4 in) in Haikou over a three-day period.
column2: 在岛上，海口三天内的教育量高达 240 毫米（9.4 英寸）。

column1: On 3 February, the head of the State Emergency Service (SES) and then-Premier Joh Bjelke-Petersen toured northern Queensland to inspect damage.
column2: 2 月 3 日，州紧急服务处 (SES) 处长和时任总理 Joh Bjelke-Petersen 巡视昆士兰北部检查受损情况。

column1: The government of Australia vowed to assist by providing financial and emergency services, also offering to provide aid to banana and sugar cane farmers who suffered losses as a result of Winifred.
column2: 澳大利亚政府立誓要通过提供财政和紧急服务来予以协助，还提出要向因 Winifred 而遭受损失的香蕉和甘蔗种植者提供援助。

column1: Two government helicopters were sent shortly thereafter, assessing the severity of damage, evacuating residents, and delivering food.
column2: 此后不久派出了两架政府直升机，评估损失严重程度，疏散居民，并运送食物。

column1: Bjelke-Petersen later expressed anger at the federal government for having increased the threshold for disaster relief before raising loans, and also stated that the Federal Minister for Primary Industry, John Kerin, had no right to accompany him on his visit to northern Queensland, only offering to discuss an offer provided that the federal government was willing to provide financial assistance.
column2: Bjelke-Petersen 后来对联邦政府在筹款前提高救灾门槛表示愤怒，还表示联邦初级产业部长 John Kerin 无权陪同他访问昆士兰北部，只提出讨论提议，前提是联邦政府愿意提供财政援助。

column1: Approximately 500 volunteers for the SES were deployed the same day, reinstating electrical and other essential services, evacuating regional citizens, delivering bread to numerous towns, and sending 700 tarpaulins to shield roofless houses.
column2: 同一天出动了大约 500 名 SES 志愿者，恢复了电力和其他基本服务，疏散了当地民众，向许多城镇运送面包，并送去了 700 张防水油布用以遮挡没有屋顶的房屋。

column1: Rescue and relief work was hindered by high traffic on telephone networks, forcing Telecom to cease calls between Townsville and Ingham.
column2: 电话网络的流量高企阻碍了抢险救灾工作，迫使电信公司停止了汤斯维尔和英厄姆之间的通信。

column1: Emergency crews of the government's Department of Social Security (DSS) visited locations throughout the region, receiving damage claims, requests for monetary aid, and filings for unemployment benefits.
column2: 政府社会保障部 (DSS) 的应急人员访问了整个地区的各个地点，接受损失索赔、经济援助请求和失业福利申请。

column1: The Commonwealth pledged to provide $150 million in relief over a three-year period to the government of Queensland in exchange for deregulation; however, its offer was initially rejected.
column2: 联邦承诺在三年内向昆士兰政府提供 1.5 亿美元救济，以换取解除管制；不过，其提议最初遭到拒绝。

column1: Planes flew claims adjusters and other officials to Innisfail, establishing an insurance emergency service in the city hall, while the Insurance Council of Queensland deployed its special emergency service employees for the first time.
column2: 理赔人员和其他官员飞往 Innisfail，在市政厅建立了保险应急服务，同时昆士兰保险委员会首次部署了特别应急服务员工。

column1: As a result of severe damage, a disaster declaration for northern regions was issued by Queensland Government on 4 February.
column2: 由于损坏严重，昆士兰政府于 2 月 4 日发布了北部地区灾难声明。

column1: The first $10 million in aid from the state government, paid by the federal government, was supplied the same day.
column2: 由联邦政府支付的州政府第一笔 1000 万美元的援助款，也在同一天提供。

column1: Meanwhile, the SES continued its cleanup efforts, removing debris and repairing structures.
column2: 同时，SES 继续进行清理工作，清除残骸并修复结构。

column1: Looters took advantage of confusion in the days following the cyclone, striking residences throughout Innisfail.
column2: 在气旋过后的几天里，掠夺者利用混乱局面袭击了整个 Innisfail 的住宅。

column1: By the end of the day, 2200 tarpaulins had been distributed; however, the previously-smooth relief efforts were impeded by thunderstorms in Cairns.
column2: 到当天结束时，分发了 2200 张防水油布；然而，先前顺利的救援工作因 Cairns 的雷暴而受阻。

column1: The Bureau of Meteorology (BoM) was subject to scrutiny in the aftermath of Winifred, and was criticized for its lack of advance warning.
column2: 在发生 Winifred 之后气象局 (BoM) 受到审查，并因其缺乏预警而受到批评。

column1: Advices and warnings were received by regional television and radio stations up to 15 minutes late following issuance.
column2: 直到发布后 15 分钟，地区电视台和广播电台才收到通知和警告。

column1: Winifred's sudden and unexpected turn was little-anticipated by BoM meteorologists, with employees unable to verify the cyclone's centre from the Cairns radar until only about 9:30 a.m. on 1 February, with radar error of up to 44 km (27 mi) observed.
column2: Winifred 出现出乎意料的突然转变，让 BoM 的气象学家始料未及，直到 2 月 1 日上午 9:30，员工才从 Cairns 的雷达上确认气旋中心，并观察到雷达误差高达 44 公里（27 英里）。

column1: However, a Flash Tropical Cyclone Advice was immediately issued shortly thereafter, reaching media outlets near noon that day.
column2: 然而，此后不久就立即发布了闪电热带气旋通知，在当天中午时分透露给媒体。

column1: Media outlets went suggested the creation of a new Tropical Cyclone Warning Centre (TCWC) in Townsville as a result, but the suggestion was dismissed, with a centre already established in Brisbane.
column2: 媒体建议在汤斯维尔建立新的热带气旋预警中心 (TCWC)，但这个建议被驳回，因为布里斯班已建立一处中心。

column1: A spokesman for the SES stated that no warning was given by the BoM at 9 a.m., with the storm's alarming approach; the Service had initially been anticipating the storm's recurvature out to sea, only to receive a flash warning hours later.
column2: SES 的一位发言人表示，上午 9 时风暴令人震惊的逼近，但 BoM 没有发出任何警告；服务局最初预计风暴会再次卷入大海，几小时后才受到闪光警告。

column1: Rowan Kaiser of The A.V. Club gave a positive review, praising the intersecting storylines and the references to the previous season.
column2: A.V. 俱乐部的 Rowan Kaiser 给出了正面评论，赞扬了交叉的故事情节和对上一季的提及。

column1:
More generally, [the plot lines] show that Veronica Mars has created a strong enough world that it can support much higher levels.	“更广泛地说，[这些情节线]表明 Veronica Mars 已经创造了一个足够强大到可以支持更高水平的世界。
I have been, and still somewhat am, dubious about the pace at which this season is moving.	我一直并且仍然有些怀疑本季的推进速度。
But this was a great episode, even with all its density and the fact that it was essentially all setup.	但即使它的密度很大，而且基本上都是设定好的，但这一集很不错。
And it was great because it was attached to the history of the show so far. Television Without Pity gave the episode an "A".
column2: 之所以不错，是因为它与这个节目迄今为止的历史相联系。”Television Without Pity 给这一集的评级是“A”。

column1: Price Peterson, writing for TV.com, wrote in his episode verdict that "This episode was great, if way more grim than usual.
column2: 为 TV.com 撰稿的 Price Peterson 在他的剧集评论中写道：“尽管比平时更阴森，但这一集很不错。

column1: Between Abel's offscreen cancer death to Amelia's icy resting place…there was a real whiff of death in this episode." Complex ranked Kim Stolz's cameo on its list of "the 25 worst cameos in TV history." BuzzFeed ranked the episode forty-fifth on its list of the best Veronica Mars episodes, criticizing the Clarence Wiedman plot while writing that "we get to see some prime banter between Logan and Cliff, two of the show’s funniest characters."
column2: 从 Abel 画外死于癌症到 Amelia 冰冷的安息之所......这一集弥漫着浓烈的死亡气息。”Complex 将 Kim Stolz 的客串列入“电视史上 25 个最糟糕的客串”榜单。BuzzFeed 将这一集列为《美眉校探》最佳剧集名单的第 45 位，批评了 Clarence Wiedman 的情节，同时写道：“我们看到 Logan 和 Cliff 之间妙趣横生，这是剧中最有趣的两个角色。”

column1: The peoples known to us as the Angles, Saxons, Jutes and Frisians, began to arrive in Britain in the 5th century.
column2: 我们所知的盎格鲁人、撒克逊人、朱特人和弗里斯兰人，在 5 世纪开始来到不列颠。

column1: By 600, a number of kingdoms had begun to form in southern and eastern Britain, and by the beginning of the seventh century, southern England was almost entirely under their control.
column2: 到 600 年，不列颠南部和东部开始形成一些王国，到七世纪初，英格兰南部几乎完全在他们的控制之下。

column1: Tytila was a member of the Wuffingas family, the ruling dynasty of the Kingdom of the East Angles that was named after his father Wuffa.
column2: Tytila 是 Wuffingas 家族的成员，该家族是以其父亲 Wuffa 的名字命名的东盎格鲁王国的统治王朝。

column1: The Wuffingas may have been descendants of an earlier Scandinavian dynasty.
column2: Wuffingas 可能是早期斯堪的纳维亚王朝的后裔。

column1: Both he and his father are semi-historical figures.
column2: 他和他父亲都是半历史性的人物。

column1: The Victorian ethnologist John Beddoe noted the similarity between the name Tytila and that of Totila, an Ostrogoth king.
column2: 维多利亚时代的民族学家 John Beddoe 注意到 Tytila 这个名字与 Ostrogoth 国王 Totila 的很相似。

column1: Tytila is included in a number of different tallies.
column2: Tytila 记载在许多不同的符木中。

column1: The 9th century Welsh monk Nennius, in his Historia Brittonum, also lists Tytila, naming him as the father of Eni of East Anglia: '...Uffa, who begat Tytillus, who begat Eni,...' whilst relating the origin of the kings of East Anglia.
column2: 9 世纪的威尔士僧侣 Nennius 在他的《英国历史》中也记载了 Tytila，称他是 Eni of East Anglia 之父：‘...Uffa 生了 Tytillus，Tytillus 生了 Eni，...’，同时介绍了东盎格利亚国王的起源。

column1: Tytila is included in an East Anglian royal tally that lists the ancestors of Ælfwald and that names many, but not all, of the early East Anglian kings.
column2: Tytila 记载在东盎格利亚王室符木中，其中列出了 Ælfwald 的祖先，也列出了许多但不是所有早期东盎格利亚国王的名字。

column1: The tally, which forms part of the Anglian collection, comes from the 12th century Textus Roffensis.
column2: 该符木是盎格利亚收藏的一部分，来自 12 世纪的《罗切斯特年鉴》。

column1: In October 2016, Marvel confirmed that main cast members Clark Gregg as Phil Coulson, Ming-Na Wen as Melinda May, Chloe Bennet as Daisy Johnson / Quake, Iain De Caestecker as Leo Fitz, Elizabeth Henstridge as Jemma Simmons, Henry Simmons as Alphonso "Mack" MacKenzie, and John Hannah as Holden Radcliffe would be starring in the episode.
column2: 2016 年 10 月，漫威确认这一集中的主演克拉克格雷格饰演 Phil Coulson，温明娜饰演 Melinda May，汪可盈饰演 Daisy Johnson / Quake，伊恩德卡斯泰克饰演 Leo Fitz，伊丽莎白韩斯翠奇饰演 Jemma Simmons，亨利西蒙斯饰演 Alphonso “Mack” MacKenzie，约翰汉纳饰演 Holden Radcliffe。

column1: Also revealed was the guest cast for the episode, including Jason O'Mara as Director Jeffrey Mace, Gabriel Luna as Robbie Reyes, Parminder Nagra as Senator Nadeer, Maximilian Osinski as Agent Davis, Patrick Cavanaugh as Burrows, Jose Zuniga as Eli Morrow, Kerr Smith as Joseph Bauer, James Edson as Warden Green, Ricardo Walker as Agent Prince, Sky Soleil as corrections officer, Rolando Molina as Santino, Brandon Keener as Harlan, Jermaine Jacox as ferocious watchdog, Lilli Birdsell as Lucy Bauer, Ward Roberts as Hugo, Usman Ally as Vincent and Devin Barry as producer.
column2: 另外还透露了这一集的客串阵容，包括 Jason O'Mara 饰演 Jeffrey Mace 局长，Gabriel Luna 饰演 Robbie Reyes，Parminder Nagra 饰演 Senator Nadeer，Maximilian Osinski 饰演 Agent Davis，Patrick Cavanaugh 饰演 Burrows，Jose Zuniga 饰演 Eli Morrow，Kerr Smith 饰演 Joseph Bauer，James Edson 饰演 Warden Green，Ricardo Walker 饰演 Agent Prince，Sky Soleil 饰演惩戒官，Rolando Molina 饰演 Santino，Brandon Keener 饰演 Harlan，Jermaine Jacox 饰演凶猛的看门狗，Lilli Birdsell 饰演 Lucy Bauer，Ward Roberts 饰演 Hugo， Usman Ally 饰演 Vincent，制片人为 Devin Barry。

column1: O'Mara, Luna, Nagra, Osinski, Cavanaugh, Zuniga, Smith, Walker, Birdsell, Roberts, and Ally reprise their roles from earlier in the series.
column2: O'Mara、Luna, Nagra、Osinski、Cavanaugh、Zuniga、Smith、Walker、Birdsell、Roberts 和 Ally 重新扮演他们在该系列早期的角色。

column1: George Stephanopolous also appears in the episode, as himself.
column2: George Stephanopolous 也以自己的身份在这一集中亮相。

column1: The episode's prison setting was realized with a mixture of location filming at a real prison, and constructed sets.
column2: 该集的监狱环境是在真实的监狱中进行外景拍摄和搭建场景来混合实现的。

column1: The first scene shot for the episode was the heart-to-heart between Johnson and May.
column2: 这一集拍摄的第一场戏是 Johnson 和 May 之间推心置腹的对话。

column1: As big fans of Stephen King, the writers had the character Santino read a Spanish version of King's book Pet Sematary while in his jail cell.
column2: 作为斯蒂芬金的忠实粉丝，编剧让 Santino 这个角色在牢房里阅读金的西班牙语版《宠物坟场》。

column1: For the prop of the Darkhold, introduced in this episode, Lilla suggested that the book's cover should feature the word "Darkhold" as an ambigram, with the series' props department designing a new font to achieve this.
column2: 对于这一集中介绍的《黑暗神书》道具，Lilla 建议书的封面上应当将“黑暗神书”一词作为对称字，为此剧组的道具部门设计了一种新字体。

column1: The prop department had two weeks to create the book before it was needed for filming the episode, with the final book assembled by a bookbinder using aged, vellum pages that were filled with text and illustrations inspired by Leonardo DaVinci's Vitruvian Man.
column2: 在这一集开拍前，道具部门有两周时间制作这本书，最后的书由装订工用陈旧的牛皮纸页组装而成，里面的文字和插图的灵感来自达芬奇的 《维特鲁威人》。

column1: The episode reveals that Mace became a public hero after the bombing of a United Nations meeting in Vienna, an event depicted in Captain America: Civil War.
column2: 这一集中透露，Mace 在维也纳的一次联合国会议遭到轰炸后成为公众英雄，《美国队长：内战》中描述了这一件事。

column1: Mace was one of the many diplomats at the meeting, and was photographed saving another's life.
column2: Mace 是众多出席会议的外交官之一，被拍到救了另一人的命。

column1: However, the episode does indicate that Mace may not be telling the truth about this.
column2: 然而，这一集表明 Mace 在这一点上可能没有说实话。

column1: Lockup was first aired in the United States on ABC on October 25, 2016.
column2: 《牢狱之灾》于 2016 年 10 月 25 日在美国 ABC 首播。

column1: It began streaming on Netflix, along with the rest of the fourth season, on June 15, 2017.
column2: 2017 年 6 月 15 日，它连同第四季的其余部分一起开始在 Netflix 播放。

column1: In the United States the episode received a 0.8/3 percent share among adults between the ages of 18 and 49, meaning that it was seen by 0.8 percent of all households, and 3 percent of all of those watching television at the time of the broadcast.
column2: 在美国，这一集在 18 至 49 岁的成年人中获得了 0.8/3% 的收视率，这意味着播出时有 0.8% 的家庭和 3% 的人在收看。

column1: It was watched by 2.30 million viewers.
column2: 230 万观众观看了它。

column1: Within a week of its release, "Lockup" had been watched by 4.55 million U.S. viewers, just above the season average of 4.22 million.
column2: 上映一周内，有 455 万美国观众观看了《牢狱之灾》，略高于本季 422 万的平均水平。

column1: Writing for The A.V. Club, Alex McCown-Levy graded the episode a 'B+', calling it "a fast-moving and fun adventure, the kind of race-against-time scenario that remains the series’ strong suit [which] played to the show’s strengths on numerous levels".
column2: 在为 A.V. 俱乐部撰写的文章中，Alex McCown-Levy 给这一集打出了“B+”的分数，称其为“一段快节奏的有趣冒险，与时间赛跑的场景仍是该系列的强项，[它]在许多方面发挥了该剧的优势。”

column1: He highlighted Johnson's fight against the prisoners, and Woods' direction of that scene, as well as the heart-to-heart between Johnson and May.
column2: 他强调了 Johnson 与囚犯的斗争，以及 Woods 对该场景的指导，还有 Johnson 和 May 之间的惺惺相惜。

column1: McCown-Levy also felt "the show is having the most narratively efficient season yet, effectively balancing mission-of-the-week adventures with the longer plots", but was critical of Lucy and the low stokes of the villains.
column2: McCown-Levy 还认为，“该剧是迄今为止叙事效率最高的一季，有效地平衡了每周冒险任务和较长的情节”，但他对 Lucy 和反派的低调持批评态度。

column1: Most of the skeleton is preserved, the bones still attached to each other in their original anatomical position.
column2: 大部分骨架保留了下来，骨头仍然按照原来的解剖位置彼此连接。

column1: The tail, hind feet, and hind portion of the pelvis had eroded away before the mummy was discovered.
column2: 在木乃伊被发现之前，尾巴、后脚和骨盆的后部已经腐蚀。

column1: Fossils often become flattened during fossilization, but AMNH 5060 is preserved three-dimensionally, without significant deformation.
column2: 化石在化石化过程中往往会变平，但 AMNH 5060 进行了三维保存，没有明显变形。

column1: The specimen was found lying on its back, with head and neck twisted upwards, backwards, and to the right side of the body.
column2: 该标本被发现时呈仰卧，头和脖子向上、向后，扭向身体右侧。

column1: Both knees are drawn forwards, while the forelimbs are outstretched.
column2: 双膝前拉，前肢伸出。
