column1: Although the tail curves upwards and forwards over the body in many dinosaur skeletons, it was probably straight in the mummy as movement would have been restricted by ossified tendons.
column2: 在许多恐龙骨架中，虽然尾巴向上和向前弯曲，但在这具木乃伊中它可能是笔直的，因为活动会受到骨化肌腱的限制。

column1: Almost two-thirds of the total skin area is preserved, often with excellent preservation.
column2: 几乎三分之二的皮肤总面积得以保存，通常保存完好。

column1: The skin impressions are pressed tightly onto the bones, and are partially drawn into the body in between the bones.
column2: 皮肤印痕紧压在骨头上，部分被拉到骨头之间的身体里。

column1: When discovered, skin impressions probably encased the whole skeleton, but were partially destroyed while freeing it from the surrounding rocks.
column2: 在被发现时，皮肤印痕可能包裹了整个骨架，但在从周围的岩石中挖出时遭到部分破坏。

column1: Skin impressions are preserved on the forelimbs, neck and throat, and the chest, as well as on the right side of the trunk.
column2: 前肢、颈部和喉咙、胸部以及躯干右侧保留了皮肤印痕。

column1: As well as the skin impressions, Sternberg noted the preservation of muscle impressions.
column2: 除了皮肤印痕，Sternberg 还注意到保存的肌肉印痕。

column1: In 2007, paleontologist Kenneth Carpenter suggested that even impressions of inner organs are possibly preserved; this cannot be evaluated without detailed computer tomography and x-ray analyses.
column2: 2007 年，古生物学家 Kenneth Carpenter 提出，即便内脏器官印痕也可能保存下来；如果没有详细的计算机断层扫描和 x 射线分析，就无法对其进行评估。

column1: The skin was thin and delicate in relation to the size of the animal.
column2: 与动物的体型相比，皮肤又薄又脆弱。

column1: As typical for dinosaurs, the skin consisted of non-overlapping scales called tubercles.
column2: 对于恐龙，皮肤通常由称为结节的非重叠鳞片组成。

column1: Two sorts of tubercles can be distinguished.
column2: 可以区分两种结节。

column1: Evenly distributed on the skin were the "ground tubercles", which were small, rounded scales between 1 and 3 mm (0.039 and 0.118 in) in diameter.
column2: 均匀分布在皮肤上的是“基底结节”，它们是直径 1 到 3 毫米（0.039 到 0.118 英寸）之间的圆形小鳞片。

column1: The larger "pavement tubercles", less than 5 mm (0.20 in) in diameter, were pentagonal in shape, raised relative to the ground tubercles, and arranged in irregular clusters interrupting the surface formed by the lower ground tubercles.
column2: 较大的“铺面结节”直径小于 5 毫米（0.20 英寸），呈五边形，相对于基底结节呈凸起状，并以不规则的簇状排列，阻断了下部基底结节形成的表面。

column1: These clusters consisted of between twenty and several hundred individual pavement tubercles, and were bordered by intermediate tubercles which mediated in size and shape between ground and pavement tubercles.
column2: 这些簇由 20 到几百个单独的铺面结节组成，以中间结节为界，其大小和形状介于基底结节和铺面结节之间。

column1: In the chest and abdominal region, clusters were small, oval in shape and arranged in irregular longitudinal lines.
column2: 胸部和腹部区域的簇很小，呈椭圆形并排列成不规则的纵向线。

column1: They became larger towards the sides of the trunk, where they reached 5 to 10 cm (2.0 to 3.9 in) in diameter; their shape became more irregular.
column2: 它们在躯干两侧变大，直径达到 5 至 10 厘米（2.0 至 3.9 英寸）；形状变得更加不规则。

column1: A cold front's location is at the leading edge of the temperature drop-off, which in an isotherm analysis shows up as the leading edge of the isotherm gradient, and it normally lies within a sharp surface trough.
column2: 冷锋位置在温度下降前缘，在等温线分析中显示为等温线梯度前缘，它通常位于尖锐的表面低压槽内。

column1: Cold fronts can move up to twice as fast as warm fronts and produce sharper changes in weather, since cold air is denser than warm air and rapidly lifts the warm air as the cold air moves in.
column2: 冷锋的移动速度可以达到暖锋的两倍，并且会产生更剧烈的天气变化，因为冷空气的密度比暖空气大，冷空气移动时会迅速抬升暖空气。

column1: Cold fronts are typically accompanied by a narrow band of showers and thunderstorms.
column2: 冷锋通常伴随狭窄的阵雨和雷暴带。

column1: On a weather map, the surface position of the cold front is marked with the symbol of a blue line of triangles/spikes (pips) pointing in the direction of travel, at the leading edge of the cooler air mass.
column2: 在气象图上，冷锋的表面位置被标记为蓝色三角形/尖峰（吸气峰压）的符号，指向行进方向，位于较冷气团的前缘。

column1: Warm fronts mark the position on the Earth's surface where a relatively warm body of air has displaced colder air.
column2: 暖锋标志着地球表面上相对温暖的气体取代较冷空气的位置。

column1: The temperature increase is located on the equatorward edge of the gradient in isotherms, and lies within broader low pressure troughs than is the case with cold fronts.
column2: 温度上升位于等温线梯度的赤道边缘，并且位于比冷锋更宽的低压槽内。

column1: Warm fronts move more slowly than do the cold fronts because cold air is denser, and harder to displace from the Earth's surface.
column2: 暖锋移动速度比冷锋慢，因为冷空气密度较大，更难从地球表面移开。

column1: This causes temperature differences across warm fronts to be broader in scale.
column2: 这导致暖锋之间的温差规模更大。

column1: The warm air mass overrides the cold air mass and temperature changes occur at higher altitudes before those at the surface.
column2: 暖气团覆盖冷气团，温度变化发生在高海拔地区，之后它们才到达表面。

column1: Clouds ahead of the warm front are mostly stratiform and rainfall gradually increases as the front approaches.
column2: 暖锋前方的云层大多呈层状，随着暖锋临近，降雨量逐渐增加。

column1: Fog can also occur preceding a warm front passage.
column2: 暖锋通过前也会出现大雾。

column1: Clearing and warming is usually rapid after the passage of a warm front.
column2: 暖锋通过后，通常会迅速放晴和变暖。

column1: If the warm air mass is unstable, mixing of the warm moist air will produce thunderstorms that are embedded among the stratiform clouds ahead of the front, and after frontal passage, thundershowers may continue.
column2: 如果暖气团不稳定，暖湿空气混合将产生雷暴，这些雷暴嵌入锋前方的层状云中，锋面通过后，雷阵雨可能会继续。

column1: On weather maps, the surface location of a warm front is marked with a red line of half circles pointing in the direction of travel.
column2: 在气象图上，暖锋的表面位置用半圆红线标记，指向行进方向。

column1: An occluded front is formed during the process of cyclogenesis when a cold front overtakes a warm front.
column2: 在气旋形成过程中，当冷锋超过暖锋时，就会形成锢囚锋。

column1: The cold and warm fronts curve naturally poleward into the point of occlusion, which is also known as the triple point in meteorology.
column2: 冷锋和暖锋自然而然地极向弯曲进入锢囚点，这在气象学上也被称为三相点。

column1: It lies within a sharp trough, but the air mass behind the boundary can be either warm or cold.
column2: 它位于尖锐的低压槽内，但边界后面的气团可以是暖气团或冷气团。

column1: In a cold occlusion, the air mass overtaking the warm front is cooler than the cool air ahead of the warm front, and plows under both air masses.
column2: 在冷锢囚锋中，超越暖锋的气团比暖锋前面的冷空气更冷，并在这两个气团下犁过。

column1: In a warm occlusion, the air mass overtaking the warm front is not as cool as the cold air ahead of the warm front, and rides over the colder air mass while lifting the warm air.
column2: 在暖锢囚锋中，超越暖锋的气团不像暖锋前面的冷空气那样冷，而是骑在较冷的气团上，同时抬升暖空气。

column1: A wide variety of weather can be found along an occluded front, with thunderstorms possible, but usually their passage is associated with a drying of the air mass.
column2: 沿锢囚锋可以发现各种各样的天气，可能有雷暴，但其通过一般与气团干燥有关。

column1: Though silvertip sharks are quite mobile, they exhibit fidelity to certain areas, with reports of territorial behavior.
column2: 虽然银鳍鲨行动灵活，但它们对某些区域表现出忠诚度，并有领土行为的报道。

column1: They are usually encountered alone or in pairs.
column2: 它们通常单独或成对出现。

column1: Small groups of adult females have been seen in deep water.
column2: 有人在深水域中曾看到过一小群成年雌性。

column1: Individual silvertip sharks behave very aggressively towards one another, and many are heavily scarred.
column2: 个别银鳍鲨彼此的行为很有攻击性，许多银鳍鲨身上伤痕累累。

column1: They are also reported to dominate Galapagos sharks (C. galapagensis) and blacktip sharks (C.
column2: 据报道，在争夺食物时，它们还会支配同等体型的加拉帕戈斯鲨 (C. galapagensis) 和黑鳍鲨 (C.

column1: limbatus) of equal size when competing for food.
column2: limbatus)。

column1: This shark sometimes forms mixed-species aggregations with grey reef sharks.
column2: 这种鲨鱼有时会与灰礁鲨形成混合物种聚集体。

column1: Rainbow runners (Elagatis bipinnulata) have been observed rubbing against silvertip sharks, using the sharks' rough skin to scrape off parasites.
column2: 已经观察到纺綞鰤 (Elagatis bipinnulata) 与银鳍鲨摩擦，利用鲨鱼粗糙的皮肤刮掉寄生虫。

column1: They sometimes follow marine mammals such as bottlenose dolphins (Tursiops sp.) in open water, and are themselves followed by pilot fish (Naucrates ductor).
column2: 它们有时会在开阔水域跟随宽吻海豚 (Tursiops sp.) 等海洋哺乳动物，领航鱼 (Naucrates ductor) 也会跟随它们。

column1: Like the grey reef shark, the silvertip shark sometimes perform a stereotypical threat display if pursued by divers, warning that it is prepared to attack.
column2: 像灰礁鲨一样，银鳍鲨被潜水员追赶时有时会做出典型的威胁展示，警告它准备攻击。

column1: The display begins with the shark accelerating away to a distance of 15 m (49 ft), before turning and charging towards the perceived threat.
column2: 展示开始时，银鳍鲨加速离开 15 米（49 英尺）远，然后转向并冲向所感知到的威胁。

column1: At a distance of two body lengths, the shark brakes, turns broadside, drops its pectoral fins, gapes its jaws, lowers the posterior two-thirds of its body, and "shivers".
column2: 在两个体长的距离处，银鳍鲨刹住，转向宽侧，放下胸鳍，张开下巴，降低身体后补的三分之二，并“颤抖”。

column1: The last two elements of this display are unique to this species; the "shivering" may serve to emphasize its white fin markings.
column2: 这种展示的最后两个元素系该物种独有；“颤抖”可能是为了强调其白色的鳍部标记。

column1: If the diver persists, the shark may rapidly close in and slash with its upper teeth.
column2: 如果潜水员还坚持，鲨鱼可能会迅速靠近并用它的上牙劈砍。

column1: The diet of the silvertip shark consists primarily of bony fishes, such as grouper, mackerel, tuna, escolars, lanternfish, flyingfish, wrasses, and soles.
column2: 银鳍鲨的食物主要包括硬骨鱼，如石斑鱼、鲭鱼、金枪鱼、河豚、油鱼、灯笼鱼、飞鱼、隆头鱼和鳎鱼。

column1: Eagle rays, smaller sharks, and octopus are occasionally taken.
column2: 鹰鳐、小鲨鱼和章鱼偶尔也会被捕获。

column1: Larger sharks tend to be more sluggish and take more benthic prey.
column2: 体型较大的鲨鱼往往更迟钝，猎捕更多的底栖猎物。

column1: The differently shaped dentition in their upper and lower jaws allows them to tackle large prey, gripping and sawing off chunks of flesh with violent twists and turns.
column2: 上下颚不同形状的齿状物能够让它们对付大型猎物，用猛烈的扭动来夹住和锯掉大块的肉。

column1: Silvertip sharks have been observed swimming around the periphery of groups of feeding sharks of other species, occasionally dashing in to steal food.
column2: 人们观察到银鳍鲨在其他物种的觅食鲨鱼群周围游动，偶尔会冲进去偷食。

column1: This species often approaches ships, as they are attracted to certain artificial, low-frequency sounds.
column2: 这个物种经常接近船只，因为它们被某些人造的低频声音所吸引。

column1: From the 1990s onward an increasing amount of literature on Canadian comics has appeared, in both official languages.
column2: 从 20 世纪 90 年代开始，越来越多关于加拿大漫画的文献以两种官方语言出现。

column1: Books such as Guardians of the North (1992) and Invaders from the North (2006) appeared by comics historian John Bell, who became senior archivist at Library and Archives Canada in Ottawa.
column2: 漫画历史学家约翰贝尔出版了《北方的守护者》(1992) 和《北方入侵者》(2006) 等书籍，他成为加拿大渥太华图书馆和档案馆的高级档案管理员。

column1: American magazine Alter Ego ran a special issue on Canadian comics in 2004.
column2: 美国杂志《Alter Ego》在 2004 年出版了一期加拿大漫画特刊。

column1: Bart Beaty and Jeet Heer have been writing about comics academically and professionally, and regularly have articles educating the public on comics published in newspapers such as the National Post and the Boston Globe, as well as comics and literary magazines.
column2: Bart Beaty 和 Jeet Heer 一直撰写关于漫画的学术和专业文章，并经常在《国家邮报》和《波士顿环球报》等报纸以及漫画和文学杂志上发表教育公众的漫画文章。

column1: Canadian feminist scholars such as Mary Louise Adams, Mona Gleason, and Janice Dickin McGinnis have done research into the anti-crime comics campaigns of the late 1940s and 1950s, from the point of view of the moral panic and social and legal history of the era, and the sociology of sexuality.
column2: 加拿大女权主义学者如 Mary Louise Adams、Mona Gleason 和 Janice Dickin McGinnis 从那个时代的道德恐慌和社会、法律史以及性社会学的角度，对 20 世纪 40 年代末和 50 年代的反犯罪漫画运动进行了研究。

column1: There are ten nursery schools, sixteen primary schools, and two secondary schools in Ashton-under-Lyne as of 2019.
column2: 截至 2019 年，Ashton-under-Lyne 有 10 所幼儿园，16 所小学，2 所中学。

column1: In 2006, the council began a scheme to develop education in the borough by opening six new secondary schools.
column2: 2006 年，委员会开始实施一项计划，通过开设 6 所新中学来发展该区的教育。

column1: Among the changes proposed as part of the £160 million scheme was the closure of Hartshead Sports College and Stamford Community High School, to be replaced by a 1,350-pupil academy with 300 sixth-form members.
column2: 作为 1.6 亿英镑计划的一部分，提议的变更包括关闭 Hartshead 体育学院和斯坦福社区高中，取而代之的是一所有 1,350 名小学生和 300 名六年级学生的学院。

column1: In 2007, Hartshead Sports College was placed on "special measures" after it failed to achieve its targets for General Certificate of Secondary Education results and was criticised by Ofsted for its teaching standard.
column2: 2007 年，Hartshead 体育学院因未能实现其普通中等教育证书成绩目标而受到“特殊措施”处理，并因其教学标准而受到 Ofsted 的批评。

column1: The new academy opened in September 2008, a year ahead of schedule.
column2: 新学院于 2008 年 9 月开业，比计划提前一年。

column1: It was named New Charter Academy (now Great Academy Ashton) after its sponsor, the New Charter Housing Trust.
column2: 它被命名为 New Charter 学院（现在的 Great Academy Ashton），以其赞助商 New Charter Housing Trust 的名字来命名。

column1: The other secondary school in the town is St Damian's RC Science College, which was founded in 1963, and provides education for 800 pupils aged 11–16.
column2: 该镇的另一所中学是 St Damian's RC 科学学院，该学院成立于 1963 年，为 800 名 11–16 岁的学生提供教育。

column1: As part of the Building Schools for the Future project, a replacement school building was built by Carillion and opened in May 2011.
column2: 作为“建设面向未来的学校”项目的一部分，Carillion 建造了一座替代性的教学楼，并于 2011 年 5 月开放。

column1: Dale Grove School has 60 pupils and offers education for pupils aged 5–16 with special needs.
column2: Dale Grove 学校有 60 名学生，为 5–16 岁有特殊需要的学生提供教育。

column1: Ashton Sixth Form College is a centre for further education with 1,650 pupils aged 16–18.
column2: Ashton 六年制学院是一个继续教育中心，有 1,650 名 16–18 岁的学生。

column1: Tameside College also provides opportunities for further education and operates in Ashton-under-Lyne, Droylsden, and Hyde.
column2: Tameside 学院也提供继续教育机会，并在 Ashton-under-Lyne、Droylsden 和 Hyde 运营。

column1: Founded in 1954 and expanded in 1957 and 1964, it was originally called Ashton College.
column2: 它成立于 1954 年，并在 1957 年和 1964 年进行了扩建，最初称为 Ashton 学院。

column1: In the early 19th century, Ashton-under-Lyne's growth made it necessary to find a new water supply.
column2: 在 19 世纪初，Ashton-under-Lyne 的发展使得有必要寻找新水源。

column1: Before the introduction of piped water the town's inhabitants drew water from wells and the nearby River Tame.
column2: 在引入自来水之前，该镇的居民从水井和附近的 Tame 河取水。

column1: Industrial processes had, however, polluted the river and the wells could not sustain a rapidly expanding population.
column2: 然而，工业过程污染了河流，水井无法维持快速增长的人口。

column1: From 1825, a private company was responsible for piping water from reservoirs, but there were still many homes without proper drainage or water supply.
column2: 从 1825 年起，一家私人公司负责输送水库中的水，但仍有许多家庭没有适当的排水或供水。

column1: Waste management is now co-ordinated by the local authority via the Greater Manchester Waste Disposal Authority.
column2: 废物管理现在由地方当局通过大曼切斯特废物处理局进行协调。

column1: The first power station in Tameside was built in 1899, providing power for the area.
column2: Tameside 的第一座发电站建于 1899 年，为该地区供电。

column1: Ashton's Distribution Network Operator for electricity is United Utilities; there are no power stations in the town.
column2: Ashton 配电网络运营商是 United  Utilities；该镇没有发电站。

column1: United Utilities also manages the drinking and waste water.
column2: United Utilities 还管理饮用水和废水。

column1: In 1999, the Minneapolis Library Board issued a report entitled Outlook Twenty Ten identifying the changing needs of each of the system's libraries.
column2: 1999 年，明尼阿波利斯图书馆委员会发布了一份题为《展望 2010》的报告，确定了该系统各图书馆不断变化的需求。

column1: Deeming Nokomis crowded and outdated, the report proposed three options.
column2: 该报告认为 Nokomis 很拥挤而且过时，因此提出了三种方案。

column1: Option A proposed combining Nokomis with the nearby Roosevelt Community Library in a 25,000-square-foot (2,323 m²) space and closing both Nokomis and Roosevelt.
column2: 方案 A 建议将 Nokomis 与附近的 Roosevelt 社区图书馆合并为一个 25,000 平方英尺（2,323 平方米）的空间，并关闭 Nokomis 和 Roosevelt。

column1: This would have allowed the library to operate out of a state-of-the-art building at an undecided location.
column2: 这样该图书馆将在一栋最先进的建筑中运作，地点未定。

column1: Option B recommended moving Nokomis to a different site without moving Roosevelt.
column2: 方案 B 建议在不搬迁 Roosevelt 的情况下将 Nokomis 搬到另一个地方。

column1: The new library there would have been 18,000 square feet (1,672 m²).
column2: 那里的新图书馆有 18,000 平方英尺（1,672 平方米）。

column1: Option C included capital improvements to Nokomis, such as replacing carpeting, signs, and the roof.
column2: 方案 C 包括对 Nokomis 进行资本改进，如更换地毯、标志和屋顶。

column1: A 2003 update to the report identified a project start date of 2007, with full closure in 2008 and a reopening in 2009.
column2: 2003 年更新的报告确定了项目开始日期为 2007 年，2008 年全面关闭，2009 年重新开放。

column1: In 2007, the Minneapolis City Council appropriated a portion of its $1.35 billion 2008 budget for improvements to Nokomis and Northeast Community Library. $5.2 million of the $7 million project came from the city; Hennepin County put forward $1.8 million for environmental additions to the library and other features.
column2: 2007 年，明尼阿波利斯市议会从 2008 年 13.5 亿美元的预算中拨出一部分资金用于改善 Nokomis 和东北社区图书馆。在 700 万美元的项目中，有 520 万美元来自该市；Hennepin 县提出了 180 万美元用于图书馆的环境增设和其他功能。

column1: The new building was designed by KKE Architects with significant input from a citizen advisory committee.
column2: 这栋新建筑由 KKE Architects 设计，并征求了市民咨询委员会的大量意见。

column1: Ebert, Inc. was hired as the general contractor.
column2: Ebert, Inc. 受雇成为总承包商。

column1: The old building's last day of operation was September 12, 2009, at which time it was reported in the Longfellow/Nokomis Messenger that the renovated library was expected to reopen sometime in the fall of the next year.
column2: 旧楼的最后运营日期是 2009 年 9 月 12 日，当时 Longfellow/Nokomis Messenger 报道说，翻新后的图书馆预计于明年秋天的某个时候重新开放。

column1: During the construction, patrons were encouraged to make use of nearby libraries including East Lake, Roosevelt, Washburn, and Southdale.
column2: 施工期间鼓励顾客使用附近的图书馆，包括 East Lake、Roosevelt、Washburn 和 Southdale。

column1: The renovation included expanding the size of the library about 4,300 square feet (399 m²) to a total size of 17,340 square feet (1,611 m²).
column2: 翻修包括将图书馆面积扩大到大约 4,300 平方英尺（399 平方米），总面积为 17,340 平方英尺（1,611 平方米）。

column1: A new lighting system that automatically adjusts based on the levels of light within the building was installed, along with a geothermal heating apparatus.
column2: 安装了一个新的照明系统，该系统可以根据建筑物内的光线水平自动调节，同时还安装了地热供暖设备。

column1: Other environmentally friendly interior features included carpeting constructed from recycled fibers and low-flow faucets.
column2: 其他环保内饰包括由回收纤维制成的地毯和低流量的水龙头。

column1: A stormwater management system and native planting were utilized on the building's exterior.
column2: 大楼外部使用了雨水管理系统和本地植物。

column1: The library once again incorporated materials from Mankato Kasota Stone, making the difference between the old and new exterior surfaces virtually indistinguishable.
column2: 该图书馆再次采用了来自 Mankato Kasota Stone 的材料，几乎无法区分新旧外墙表面的区别。

column1: The teen section was significantly expanded and a new ground-floor meeting room was built.
column2: 青少年区得到了极大扩展，并新建了一个底层会议室。

column1: The children's section was also subject to improvements, gaining new nature-inspired design elements including bird light fixtures.
column2: 儿童区也得到改进，获得了新的自然灵感设计元素，包括鸟类灯具。

column1: Orthogenesis, also known as orthogenetic evolution, progressive evolution, evolutionary progress, or progressionism, is the biological hypothesis that organisms have an innate tendency to evolve in a definite direction towards some goal (teleology) due to some internal mechanism or "driving force".
column2: 直生论，又称定向演化、渐进演化、进化性进步或进步主义，是一种生物学假说，即生物体由于某种内在机制或“驱动力”而具有向某个目标（目的论）的明确方向演化的先天倾向。

column1: According to the theory, the largest-scale trends in evolution have an absolute goal such as increasing biological complexity.
column2: 根据该理论，演化中最大规模的趋势有绝对目标，如增加生物复杂性。

column1: Prominent historical figures who have championed some form of evolutionary progress include Jean-Baptiste Lamarck, Pierre Teilhard de Chardin, and Henri Bergson.
column2: 拥护某种形式演化过程的知名历史人物包括 Jean-Baptiste Lamarck、Pierre Teilhard de Chardin 和 Henri Bergson。

column1: The term orthogenesis was introduced by Wilhelm Haacke in 1893 and popularized by Theodor Eimer five years later.
column2: 直生论由 Wilhelm Haacke 于 1893 年提出，五年后由 Theodor Eimer 推广。

column1: Proponents of orthogenesis had rejected the theory of natural selection as the organizing mechanism in evolution for a rectilinear model of directed evolution.
column2: 直生论的支持者拒绝将自然选择理论作为定向演化直线模式的演化组织机制。

column1: With the emergence of the modern synthesis, in which genetics was integrated with evolution, orthogenesis and other alternatives to Darwinism were largely abandoned by biologists, but the notion that evolution represents progress is still widely shared.
column2: 随着现代综合论的出现，其中遗传学与演化相结合，直生论与其他替代达尔文主义的方法在很大程度上被生物学家放弃，但演化代表进步的概念依然得到广泛认同。

column1: The evolutionary biologist Ernst Mayr made the term effectively taboo in the journal Nature in 1948, by stating that it implied "some supernatural force".
column2: 进化论生物学家 Ernst Mayr 于 1948 年在《自然》杂志上指出，这个词暗示“某种超自然的力量”，从而使得这个词成为禁忌。

column1: The American paleontologist George Gaylord Simpson (1953) attacked orthogenesis, linking it with vitalism by describing it as "the mysterious inner force".
column2: 美国古生物学家 George Gaylord Simpson (1953) 抨击了直生论，将其与活力论联系起来，称其为“神秘的内在力量”。

column1: Modern supporters include E. O.
column2: 现代支持者包括 E. O.

column1: Wilson and Simon Conway Morris, while museum displays and textbook illustrations continue to give the impression of progress in evolution.
column2: Wilson 和 Simon Conway Morris，而博物馆展览和教科书插图继续给人以演化进步的印象。

column1: The philosopher of biology Michael Ruse notes that in popular culture evolution and progress are synonyms, while the unintentionally misleading image of the March of Progress, from apes to modern humans, has been widely imitated.
column2: 生物学哲学家 Michael Ruse 指出，在流行文化中，演化和进步是同义词，而从猿猴到现代人类的进步进行曲这一无意中误导的形象被广泛模仿。

column1: The term orthogenesis (from Ancient Greek ὀρθός orthós, "straight", and γένεσις génesis, "origin") was first used by the biologist Wilhelm Haacke in 1893.
column2: 生物学家 Wilhelm Haacke 在 1893 年首次使用了直生论（来自古希腊语 Greek ὀρθός orthós “直”和 γένεσις génesis “起源”）一词。

column1: Theodor Eimer was the first to give the word a definition; he defined orthogenesis as "the general law according to which evolutionary development takes place in a noticeable direction, above all in specialized groups".
column2: Theodor Eimer 是第一个给该词下定义的人；他将直生学定义为“某个明显的方向出现演化发展的一般规律，首先是在特定群体中发生”。

column1: In 1922, the zoologist Michael F. Guyer wrote:
column2: 1922 年，动物学家 Michael F. Guyer 写道：

column1: [Orthogenesis] has meant many different things to many different people, ranging from a mystical inner perfecting principle, to merely a general trend in development due to the natural constitutional restrictions of the germinal materials, or to the physical limitations imposed by a narrow environment.
column2: [直生论]对许多不同的人来说有许多不同的含义，从神秘的内在完善原则，到仅仅由于生发材料的自然构成限制，或由于狭隘的环境所造成的物理限制而产生的一般发展趋势。

column1: In most modern statements of the theory, the idea of continuous and progressive change in one or more characters, due according to some to internal factors, according to others to external causes-evolution in a "straight line" seems to be the central idea.
column2: 在该理论的大多数现代陈述中，一个或多个特征连续和渐进变化的观点，一些人说是由于内部因素，另一些人则说是外部原因 - “直线”演化似乎是中心思想。

column1: According to Susan R. Schrepfer in 1983:
column2: 根据 Susan R. Schrepfer 在 1983 的说法：

column1: Orthogenesis meant literally "straight origins", or "straight line evolution".
column2: 直生论的字面意思是“直接起源”或“直线演化”。

column1: The term varied in meaning from the overtly vitalistic and theological to the mechanical.
column2: 从公然的活力论和神学到机械，这个词有不同的含义。

column1: It ranged from theories of mystical forces to mere descriptions of a general trend in development due to natural limitations of either the germinal material or the environment ...
column2: 它的范围包括神秘力量理论到仅仅描述由于生发材料或环境的自然限制而导致的发展总趋势...

column1: Few details are known about Smart's time at St Luke's Hospital for Lunatics.
column2: 关于 Smart 在 St Luke 精神病院的时间，其细节鲜为人知。

column1: He was admitted to St Luke's on 6 May 1757 as a "Curable Patient".
column2: 他于 1757 年 5 月 6 日作为一名“可治愈的病人”进入 St Luke。

column1: It is possible that Smart was confined at Newbery's behest over old debts and a poor relationship that existed between the two; Newbery had previously mocked Smart's immorality in A Collection of Pretty Poems for the Amusement of Children six Foot High.
column2: 可能是由于旧债和两人之间存在的恶劣关系，Smart 在 Newbery 的授意下被关进了医院；Newbery 之前在《供六英尺高儿童娱乐的精美诗歌集》中嘲笑了 Smart 不道德的行为。

column1: Regardless of Newbery's exact reasons, there is evidence suggesting that Newbery's admittance of Smart into the mental asylum was not based on madness.
column2: 不管 Newbery 的确切理由是什么，有证据表明 Newbery 将 Smart 送进精神病院并不是因为疯魔。

column1: To have Smart admitted, Newbery probably provided a small bribe, although bribes were against St Luke's policy.
column2: 为了让 Smart 入院，Newbery 可能提供了一小笔贿赂，尽管贿赂有违 St Luke 政策。

column1: There is little information about Smart's condition during his stay at St Luke's, possibly because Battie's denied his patients from being visited, including by their own family members.
column2: 关于 Smart 在 St Luke 期间的病情信息少之又少，可能是因为 Battie 拒绝外人探视他的病人，包括他们自己的家人。

column1: One of the few records that survive of Smart's time at St Luke's was an entry in St Luke's Minute Book, which read:
column2: 关于 Smart 在 St Luke 的时间，现存的少数记录之一是 St Luke 记录簿中的一条记录，内容是：

column1: Dr. Battie having acquainted this Committee that Christopher Smart (who was admitted on the 6th day of May 1757) continues disordered in his Senses notwithstanding he has been admitted into this Hospital above 12 Calendar Months and from the present Circumstances of his Case there is not Suffit.
column2: Battie 医生通知本委员会，Christopher Smart（1757 年 5 月 6 日入院）尽管已经入院 12 个月以上，但他的感官仍然失常，从他目前的情况来看，没有足够的

column1: reason to expect his speedy Recovery And he being brought up and examined.
column2: 理由期望他快速康复和接受照管与检查。

column1: Ordered.
column2: 已下达命令。

column1: That he be discharged and that Notice be sent to his Securities to take him away.
column2: 让他出院并向他的安保发出通知，让他们把他带走。

column1: During Smart's confinement at St Luke's, not even other doctors were allowed to see Smart unless they had received personal permission from Battie.
column2: 在 Smart 被关在 St Luke 期间，甚至其他医生也不被允许见 Smart，除非他们得到 Battie 的亲自许可。

column1: It was improbable that Smart could have left the asylum without being released by Battie.
column2: 在没有得到 Battie 释放的情况下，Smart 是不可能离开这家精神病院的。

column1: Even if Smart would have attempted to obtain release via legal means, the rules for subpoenaing release would have been almost impossible to follow based on the system that Battie had in place, which isolated the individual from all contact.
column2: 即便 Smart 试图通过法律手段获释，根据 Battie 制定的隔绝个人一切联系的制度，传唤释放的规则也几乎不可能被遵守。

column1: Eventually, Smart was deemed "incurable" and would not have been released by the hospital but for its lack of funds.
column2: 最终，Smart 被认为“无法治愈”，如果不是因为缺乏资金，医院不会将其释放。

column1: There is little information about how and why Smart was released from asylum, but his daughter claimed: "He grew better, and some misjudging friends who misconstrued Mr Newbery's great kindness in placing him under necessary & salutary restriction which might possibly have eventually wrought a cure, invited him to dinner and he returned to his confinement no more." What is known about the actual events is that John Sherratt, Christopher Smart's friend, believed that Smart's confinement was unfair and wanted to negotiate Smart's release.
column2: 关于 Smart 如何以及为何从精神病院放出来的信息少之又少，但他的女儿声称：”他逐渐好转，一些判断错误的朋友误解了 Newbery 对他进行必要且有益的限制的好意，邀请他共进晚餐，他也不再回到禁闭室。”对于实际事件，已知的信息是 Christopher Smart 的朋友 John Sherratt 认为对 Smart 的监禁不公，并希望就释放 Smart 进行协商。

column1: In January 1763, he met with a parliamentary committee to discuss the issue of individuals falsely imprisoned and abuses that they would receive in asylums.
column2: 1763 年 1 月，他会见了议会委员会, 讨论个人被错误监禁以及他们在精神病院会遭受虐待的问题。

column1: In particular, Sherratt argued that many were admitted for habitual intoxication, which undermined Battie's and other asylum keeper's reputations.
column2: 特别是，Sherratt 认为许多人是因习惯性醉酒而被入院，这破坏了 Battie 和精神病院其他守卫的声誉。

column1: A finding by the parliamentary committee released 27 January 1763 bolstered Sherratt's chances to release Smart.
column2: 1763 年 1 月 27 日公布的议会委员会的调查结果支持了 Sherratt 释放 Smart 的可能性。

column1: Carl Michael Bellman is the central figure in Swedish song, known for his 1790 Fredman's Epistles and his 1791 Fredman's Songs.
column2: Carl Michael Bellman 是瑞典歌界的核心人物，以 1790 年的《弗里曼书信》和 1791 年的《弗里曼之歌》而闻名。

column1: He played the cittern, accompanying himself as he performed his songs at the royal court.
column2: 他在皇家宫廷演奏他的歌曲时，会弹奏西特琴，为自己伴奏。

column1: Jean Fredman is a fictional character and the supposed narrator in Bellman's epistles and songs, based on a real watchmaker of Bellman's Stockholm.
column2: Jean Fredman 是一个虚构人物，也是 Bellman 的书信和歌曲中的所谓叙述者，其原型就是 Bellman 在斯德哥尔摩的一个真实的钟表匠。

column1: The epistles paint a picture of the demimonde life of the city during the eighteenth century, where strong drink and beautiful "nymphs" like Ulla Winblad create a rococo picture of life, blending classical allusion and pastoral description with harsh reality.
column2: 书信描绘了十八世纪城市的暗娼阶层生活，那里的烈酒和像 Ulla Winblad 这样美丽的“仙女”营造了一幅洛可可式的生活画面，将古典典故和田园描述与残酷的现实融为一体。

column1: Epistle 82 has been recorded by Fred Åkerström, where it forms the title track of his third album of Bellman interpretations, as well as by Sven-Bertil Taube.
column2: 82 号书信由 Fred Åkerström 和 Sven-Bertil Taube 录制，成为他第三章 Bellman 演绎专辑的主打曲目。

column1: It has been translated into English by Eva Toller.
column2: 它已被 Eva Toller 翻译成英文。

column1: The song has featured in at least 16 Swedish films from 1929 onwards.
column2: 从 1929 年起，这首歌至少在 16 部瑞典电影中出现过。

column1: Lars Lönnroth, writing in Svenska Dagbladet, suggests that the "spring" in the Epistle was in fact not a stream in summer meadows but a fashionable spa, perhaps Djurgårsbrunn on what was in Bellman's time the edge of Stockholm.
column2: Lars Lönnroth 在 Svenska Dagbladet 中写道，书信中的“春天”其实不是夏天草地上的溪流，而是时尚的 spa，也许是 Bellman 时代斯德哥尔摩边缘的 Djurgårsbrunn。

column1: Henrik Mickos, in the 2011 Bellman lecture, discussed what the "pimpinella" of the first verse might be, concluding that salad burnet (Sanguisorba minor) was quite likely, given it was known at the time as pimpinella, and was more common in Sweden then than it is now.
column2: Henrik Mickos 在 2011 年的 Bellman 讲座中讨论了第一节的“pimpinella”可能是什么，结论是很可能是小地榆 (Sanguisorba minor) ，因为当时它被称为 pimpinella，而且那时在瑞典比现在更常见。

column1: Mickos dismisses the possibility that it was aniseed (Pimpinella anisum), which was used to flavour brännvin but not as the song has it ("red wine and pimpinella") a wine-based punch.
column2: Mickos 否定了这是八角茴香 (Pimpinella anisum) 的可能性，茴香是用来给 brännvin 调味的，但不是像歌曲中所说的那样（“红酒和茴香”）是一种葡萄酒潘趣。

column1: Writing for The Boston Globe, Michael Andor Brodeur argued that while the show may feel like an advertisement for emoji, "the most satisfying part is watching self-proclaimed enthusiasts of the form stumble through their symbols once the difficulty is ever-so-slightly notched up....watching so much get lost in translation feels like a win.
column2: Michael Andor Brodeur 为《波士顿环球报》撰文指出，虽然该节目可能感觉像是表情符号的广告，但“最令人满意的部分是看着自称为该形式的爱好者，一旦难度稍微提高，就只能勉强完成他们的符号...看到转换过程中失去了这么多信息，感觉是一种胜利。

column1: In terms of ratings, the series' first two episodes debuted to 336,000 and 322,000 respective viewers, with a 0.10 and 0.09 18–49 rating respectively.
column2: 在收视率方面，该系列前两集的观众分别为 336,000 和 322,000 人，18–49 岁人群中的收视率分别为 0.10 和 0.09。

column1: The episode followed up on the plot introduced in the final instalment of the second season in which a probe from an unknown alien race attacks Earth.
column2: 这一集延续了第二季最后一集介绍的情节，其中一个来自未知外星种族的探测器袭击了地球。

column1: A number of new sets and costumes were required, with preparations beginning for some departments up to three weeks before filming began.
column2: 需要一些新的布景和服装，一些部门在开拍前三周就开始进行准备。

column1: One change which was made was a new outfit for T'Pol, with costume tests taking place a week before filming began.
column2: 其中一个变化是为 T'Pol 换了新装，在开拍前一周进行了服装测试。

column1: The redesign was because of studio executives wanting the show to appeal more to the 18–49 male demographic.
column2: 重新设计的原因是制片厂高层希望该剧能够更多地吸引 18-49 岁的男性人群。

column1: The production team looked to the mid-series boost that the introduction of Seven of Nine provided on Star Trek: Voyager and sought for Enterprise to appeal to that demographic in the same manner.
column2: 制作团队参考了《星际迷航：航海家号》中引入九之七所带来的中期系列推进，并寻求企业号以同样的方式吸引该人群。

column1: Kate O'Hara of New York Magazine later joked in reference to the change, "Women of the future will certainly choose to wear tight, uncomfortable, skin-tight catsuits!"
column2: 纽约杂志的 Kate O'Hara 后来在谈到这一变化时开玩笑说：“未来的女性肯定会选择穿紧身、不舒服的连体衣。”

column1: The Xindi was seen as a new pilot by executive producers Brannon Braga and Rick Berman, who also wrote the episode.
column2: “新地”被执行制片人 Brannon Braga 和 Rick Berman 看做是新试播集，他们也是这一集的编剧。

column1: Braga said "We were re-establishing an Enterprise that was going to be a little bit different this year, so we had to think of it in those terms." They felt the best way to do this was to immediately reveal the Xindi to the audience, and to give the MACOs something to do in order to introduce them as well.
column2: Braga 说：“我们正在重建企业号，今年会有点不同，所以我们必须从这些方面考虑。”他们认为做到这一点的最好方法就是立即向观众展示新地，给 MACO 安排一些事情做以便引入他们。

column1: He called it a "big episode" as they sought to set up the rest of season.
column2: 他称这是一个“大集”，因为他们要为该季的其余部分做准备。

column1: The shoot began on June 26, 2003, with the expectation that it would take nine days (as opposed to the usual seven) to complete.
column2: 拍摄于 2003 年 6 月 26 日开始，预计需要 9 天（而不是通常的 7 天）才能完成。

column1: One of the special effects on the episode used ground Styrofoam which had been painted blue and processed through a wood chipper.
column2: 这一集的特效之一是使用了被涂成蓝色并通过碎木机处理过的聚苯乙烯泡沫塑料。

column1: It was used to represent the mineral Trellium-D within the mine.
column2: 它被用来代表矿井中的矿物 Trellium-D。

column1: However, the ground Styrofoam stuck to the actors' shoes and costumes and ended up being spread throughout the Paramount lot where the series was filmed.
column2: 然而，地面上的泡沫塑料粘在了演员的鞋服上，最后散落在拍摄该剧的派拉蒙摄制场。

column1: It would turn up in unexpected places on set for the rest of the series, and was found in among the sets as they were being dismantled after the end of season four.
column2: 它会在该系列的其余部分出现在片场意想不到的地方，并在第四季结束后被拆除时在片场发现。

column1: The Xindi featured several actors who would go on to recur in their roles throughout the third season of Enterprise.
column2: “新地”中有几位演员，他们将在《企业号》第三季继续扮演其角色。

column1: These included the MACO marines under the command of Major Hayes, played by Steven Culp.
column2: 其中包括由 Steven Culp 饰演的海斯少校指挥的 MACO 海军陆战队。

column1: At the time of his appearance in "The Xindi", he felt that he did not have any characterisation to work with.
column2: 在出演“新地”时，他觉得自己没有任何角色刻画可言。

column1: During the production of his second episode, "The Shipment", Culp read an article in the Los Angeles Times about a troubled youth who joined the military and in serving in the Iraq War had found himself.
column2: 在制作第二集“战舰”时，Culp 读到了《洛杉矶时报》上的一篇文章，其中讲述了一名问题青年参军并在伊拉克战争中服役时找到自我。

column1: After discussing it with the director, this became the basis for the character.
column2: 在与导演讨论后，这成为了这个角色的基础。

column1: Daniel Dae Kim made his first of three appearances in "The Xindi" as Corporal Chang; he had previously appeared as Gotana-Retz in the Voyager episode "Blink of an Eye".
column2: Daniel Dae Kim 在“新地”中首次出场，饰演张下士；他曾在《航海家号》的“眨眼”这一集中饰演 Gotana-Retz。

column1: The band were afforded more time to record than previous endeavors, and were listening to music such as Jawbreaker, Bad Religion and Lagwagon, which influenced the album.
column2: 与以前的努力相比，乐队获得了更多的时间来录音，并聆听了对专辑产生影响的 Jawbreaker、Bad Religion 和 Lagwagon 等音乐。

column1: For production duties, the band worked with Mark Trombino, who provided additional piano and keyboards on Dude Ranch.
column2: 在制作方面，乐队与 Mark Trombino 合作，他在“观光牧场”中提供了额外的钢琴和键盘。

column1: The trio picked him based on his work he had done on Jimmy Eat World's Static Prevails (1996). The group spent time trying to amuse Trombino, to no avail.
column2: 这个三人组是根据他为 Jimmy Eat World 的“静占上风”(1996) 所做的工作而挑选了他。该小组花了一些时间试图逗乐 Trombino，但无济于事。

column1: Hoppus' sister, Anne Hoppus, described Trombino as very quiet during the sessions.
column2: Hoppus 的妹妹 Anne Hoppus 描述说，Trombino 在会议期间非常安静。

column1: Trombino, in a retrospective piece about the album, mentioned that he was "excited, but also nervous and intimidated.
column2: Trombino 在关于这张专辑的回顾文章中提到，他“很兴奋，但也很紧张和害怕。

column1: I felt weird that there were these guys who had sold way more records than I had ever sold and I'm sitting in the producer’s chair telling them what to do." Dude Ranch was recorded Big Fish Studios in Rancho Santa Fe, California in December 1996.
column2: 我觉得很奇怪，这些人的唱片销量远超于我，而我却坐在制片人的椅子上告诉他们该怎么做。”“观光牧场”于 1996 年 12 月在加州 Rancho Santa Fe 的大鱼录音棚录制。

column1: Big Fish was a converted guesthouse which had just survived a wildfire months before.
column2: 大鱼是一间经过改造的宾馆，几个月前刚从一场野火中幸存下来。

column1: However, the gloomy atmosphere did not faze Blink-182 at all, and what was a tragedy to local individuals became fodder for jokes for the group.
column2: 然而，阴暗的气氛丝毫没有让 Blink-182 感到害怕，对当地人来说是一场悲剧，但对这个团体来说却成了笑料的素材。

column1: Bassist Mark Hoppus had just bought a new video camera and he filmed stunts with guitarist Tom DeLonge on the burnt landscape in spare time.
column2: 贝斯手 Mark Hoppus 刚刚买了一台新摄像机，他在业余时间与吉他手Tom DeLonge 在被烧毁的景观上拍摄了特技表演。

column1: Despite this, Trombino was impressed by their work ethic: "They were the most business-centric band I'd ever seen at that point.
column2: 尽管如此，Trombino 对他们的工作态度印象深刻：“他们是我在那时见过的最以商业为中心的乐队。

column1: They had their shit together."
column2: 他们很振作。”

column1: Despite the creative boom while writing lyrics for the album, all three members of Blink-182 faced setbacks while recording Dude Ranch.
column2: 尽管在为专辑创作歌词时创意澎湃，但 Blink-182 的三位成员在录制“观光牧场”时都面临挫折。

column1: DeLonge was having vocal problems and spent much time recording and re-recording vocal tracks, and Hoppus realized he too was having difficulty singing after losing his voice during a one-off Christmas concert.
column2: DeLonge 的嗓子出了问题，花了很多时间录制和重录人声曲目，Hoppus 在一场一次性的圣诞音乐会上失声后，发现他也出现了歌唱困难。

column1: Hoppus realized the magnitude of the situation and cancelled the final week of recording in December 1996.
column2: Hoppus 意识到情况的严重，取消了 1996 年 12 月最后一周的录音。

column1: He quit smoking in order to take care of his voice, which was stressed due to lack of vocal warm-ups, full days of vocal tracks, and the strain of singing for "Dammit", which was accidentally written just outside his vocal range.
column2: 为照顾他的嗓子，他戒了烟，由于缺乏声乐热身、成天的声乐曲目以及歌唱“Dammit”的压力，这首歌意外地写在他的音域之外。

column1: Meanwhile, Raynor had to record his drum tracks while still in his wheelchair, the result of injuries sustained at the signing party.
column2: 同时，由于 Raynor 在签名会上受伤，他不得不在轮椅上录制鼓音轨。

column1: He would wheelchair up to the drum set and scoot onto the drum throne and play," remembered Trombino in a later interview.
column2: 在后来的采访中，Trombino 回忆道：“他坐着轮椅来到架子鼓前，溜到鼓座上演奏。

column1: I got the sense that [the band] were bummed. Aside from the recording, the band spent time playing Crash Bandicoot and "reading the articles from the shelves and shelves of Playboys that the studio had thoughtfully provided." The group ate lunch nearly each day at Sombrero, a local Mexican restaurant namedropped in "Josie", and Chinese for dinner from Encinitas' Pick Up Stix.
column2: “我感觉到[乐队]很沮丧。”除了录音之外，乐队还花时间演奏 Crash Bandicoot，并“阅读录音棚贴心提供的《花花公子》书架上的文章。” 这群人几乎每天都在“乔西”中提到的当地墨西哥餐厅 Sombrero 用午餐，晚餐则是在 Encinitas 的 Pick Up Stix 用中餐。

column1: It would be January 1997 until the band would be able to wrap up sessions for Dude Ranch, eventually amounting to five weeks of recording.
column2: 直到 1997 年 1 月，乐队才得以结束“观光牧场”的录音，最终录制了五周时间。

column1: For the final touches, Unwritten Law frontman Scott Russo donated a few vocal tracks to "Josie", and Trombino let Blink-182 record a couple of jokes between songs using a sound-effects machine he owned.
column2: 在最后的润色中，Unwritten Law 的主唱 Scott Russo 为“乔西”献出了几首人声曲目，Trombino 让 Blink-182 用他的一台音效机在歌曲之间录制了几个笑话。

column1: Plunketts Creek is in the West Branch Susquehanna River drainage basin, the earliest recorded inhabitants of which were the Susquehannocks.
column2: 普朗克提溪位于萨斯奎哈纳河流域的西支流，那里有记录的最早居民是萨斯奎汉诺克人。

column1: Their numbers were greatly reduced by disease and warfare with the Five Nations of the Iroquois, and by 1675 they had died out, moved away, or been assimilated into other tribes.
column2: 由于疾病和与易洛魁五部落联盟的战争，他们的人数极大减少，到 1675 年，他们已经灭绝、迁往别处或被其他部落同化。

column1: The West Branch Susquehanna River valley was subsequently under the nominal control of the Iroquois, who invited displaced tribes, including the Lenape (Delaware) and Shawnee to live in the lands vacated by the Susquehannocks.
column2: 萨斯奎哈纳河谷西支流后来名义上由易洛魁人控制，他们邀请包括德拉瓦族（特拉华）和肖尼族在内无家可归的部落在萨斯奎哈诺克人腾出的土地上生活。

column1: The French and Indian War (1754–1763) led to the migration of many Native Americans westward to the Ohio River basin.
column2: 法国印第安人战争 (1754–1763) 导致许多美洲原住民向西迁徙至俄亥俄河流域。

column1: On November 5, 1768, the British acquired the New Purchase from the Iroquois in the Treaty of Fort Stanwix, including what is now Plunketts Creek.
column2: 1768 年 11 月 5 日，英国人签订斯坦维克斯堡条约，从易洛魁人手中买下这片土地，包括现在的普朗克提溪。

column1: The first settlement along the creek by European colonists took place between 1770 and 1776.
column2: 1770 年至 1776 年，欧洲殖民者沿着这条小溪建立了第一个定居点。

column1: Plunketts Creek is named for Colonel William Plunkett, a physician, who was the first president judge of Northumberland County after it was formed in 1772.
column2: 普朗克提溪是以科洛内尔•威廉•普朗克提医生命名的，他是 1772 年诺森伯兰县成立后的首任主审法官。

column1: During conflicts with Native Americans, he treated wounded settlers and fought the natives.
column2: 在与美洲原住民的冲突中，他救治了受伤的殖民者并与原住民战斗。

column1: Plunkett led a Pennsylvania expedition in the Pennamite-Yankee War to forcibly remove settlers from Connecticut, who had claimed and settled on lands in the Wyoming Valley also claimed by Pennsylvania.
column2: 普朗克提在宾那迈与扬基之战中领导一支宾夕法尼亚探险队，将殖民者从康涅狄格州强行驱离，这些殖民者曾声称拥有怀俄明山谷的土地并定居在那里，而宾夕法尼亚州同样声称拥有那片土地。

column1: For his services, Plunkett was granted six tracts of land that totaled 1,978 acres (800 ha) on November 14, 1776, although the land was not actually surveyed until September 1783.
column2: 为了表彰他的贡献，1776 年 11 月 14 日，普朗克提获得六块总共 1,978 英亩（800 公顷）的土地，但直到 1783 年 9 月才对这片土地进行实际测量。

column1: Plunkett's land included the creek's mouth, so Plunketts Creek was given his name.
column2: 普朗克提的土地中包含这条小溪的河口，因此普朗克提溪以他的名字命名。

column1: He died in 1791, aged about 100, and was buried in Northumberland without a grave marker or monument (except for the creek that bears his name).
column2: 他于 1791 年去世，享年 100 岁左右，安葬于诺森伯兰县，没有墓碑或纪念碑（除了以他的名字命名的小溪）。

column1: Lycoming County was formed from Northumberland County in 1795.
column2: 莱康明县于 1795 年由诺森伯兰县成立。

column1: When Plunketts Creek Township was formed in Lycoming County in 1838, the original name proposed was "Plunkett Township", but Plunkett's lack of active support for the American Revolution some years earlier had led some to believe his loyalty lay with the British Empire.
column2: 1838 年，普朗克提溪镇在莱康明县成立时，最初提议的名称是“普朗克提镇”，但几年前普朗克提没有对美国独立战争提供积极的支持，导致有些人认为他效忠于大英帝国。

column1: The lingering suspicion of his loyalist sympathies led to the proposed name being rejected.
column2: 由于仍然怀疑他是否支持他所效忠的人，因此该提议名称被拒绝。

column1: Naming the township for the creek rather than its namesake was seen as an acceptable compromise.
column2: 用这条小溪而不是同名之人的名字命名该镇被认为是一种可以接受的折中方案。

column1: In 1832, John Barbour built a sawmill on Loyalsock Creek near the mouth of Plunketts Creek.
column2: 1832 年，约翰•巴伯在普朗克提溪河口附近的洛亚尔索克溪上建了一座锯木厂。

column1: This developed into the village of Barbours Mills, today known as Barbours.
column2: 这就发展形成了巴伯米尔斯村，如今称为巴伯斯。

column1: In the 19th century, Barbours had several blacksmiths, a temperance hotel, post office, many sawmills, a school, store and wagon maker.
column2: 在 19 世纪，巴伯斯有几个铁匠、一家禁酒旅馆、邮局、许多锯木厂、一所学校、商店和马车制造商。

column1: In 1840, a road was built north from Barbours along Plunketts Creek, crossing it several times.
column2: 1840 年，从巴伯斯向北沿着普朗克提溪修建了一条马路，这条马路多次穿过小溪。

column1: Rubidium was discovered in 1861 by Robert Bunsen and Gustav Kirchhoff, in Heidelberg, Germany, in the mineral lepidolite through flame spectroscopy.
column2: 1861 年，罗伯特•本生和古斯塔夫•基尔霍夫于德国海德堡通过火焰光谱法在矿物锂云母中发现铷。

column1: Because of the bright red lines in its emission spectrum, they chose a name derived from the Latin word rubidus, meaning "deep red".
column2: 由于其发射光谱中有明亮的红色线条，他们选择了一个源自拉丁语 rubidus 的名字，意为“深红色”。

column1: Rubidium is a minor component in lepidolite.
column2: 铷是锂云母中的微量成分。

column1: Kirchhoff and Bunsen processed 150 kg of a lepidolite containing only 0.24% rubidium oxide (Rb₂O).
column2: 基尔霍夫和本生处理了 150 kg 的锂云母，其中仅含 0.24% 的一氧化铷 (Rb₂O)。

column1: Both potassium and rubidium form insoluble salts with chloroplatinic acid, but those salts show a slight difference in solubility in hot water.
column2: 钾和铷均与氯铂酸形成不溶性盐，但这些盐在热水中的溶解度略有不同。

column1: Therefore, the less soluble rubidium hexachloroplatinate (Rb₂PtCl₆) could be obtained by fractional crystallization.
column2: 因此，溶解度更低的六氯铂酸铷 (Rb₂PtCl₆) 可以通过分离结晶方法获得。

column1: After reduction of the hexachloroplatinate with hydrogen, the process yielded 0.51 grams of rubidium chloride for further studies.
column2: 用氢还原六氯铂酸铷后，该过程产生 0.51 克氯化铷供进一步研究。

column1: Bunsen and Kirchhoff began their first large-scale isolation of caesium and rubidium compounds with 44,000 litres (12,000 US gal) of mineral water, which yielded 7.3 grams of caesium chloride and 9.2 grams of rubidium chloride.
column2: 本生和基尔霍夫开始用 44,000 升（12,000 美制加仑）矿泉水，首次大规模分离铯和铷成分，产生 7.3 克氯化铯和 9.2 克氯化铷。

column1: Rubidium was the second element, shortly after caesium, to be discovered by spectroscopy, just one year after the invention of the spectroscope by Bunsen and Kirchhoff.
column2: 铷是继发现铯后不久，通过光谱学发现的第二个元素，而这仅发生在本生和基尔霍夫发明光谱仪一年后。

column1: The two scientists used the rubidium chloride to estimate that the atomic weight of the new element was 85.36 (the currently accepted value is 85.47).
column2: 两位科学家利用氯化铷估算出新元素的原子量为 85.36（目前的公认值为 85.47）。

column1: They tried to generate elemental rubidium by electrolysis of molten rubidium chloride, but instead of a metal, they obtained a blue homogeneous substance, which "neither under the naked eye nor under the microscope showed the slightest trace of metallic substance".
column2: 他们试图通过电解熔化的氯化铷生成铷元素，但他们得到的不是金属，而是蓝色的均质物质，这种物质“无论用肉眼还是显微镜观察，都丝毫没有表现出金属物质的痕迹”。

column1: They presumed that it was a subchloride (Rb
column2: 他们推测它是一种低氯化物 (Rb

column1: ₂Cl); however, the product was probably a colloidal mixture of the metal and rubidium chloride.
column2: ₂Cl)；但是，这个产物很可能是金属与氯化铷的胶体混合物。

column1: In a second attempt to produce metallic rubidium, Bunsen was able to reduce rubidium by heating charred rubidium tartrate.
column2: 在第二次尝试生成金属铷时，本生能够通过加热焦化的酒石酸降低铷的含量。

column1: Although the distilled rubidium was pyrophoric, they were able to determine the density and the melting point.
column2: 虽然蒸馏出的铷会自燃，但他们能够确定密度和熔点。

column1: The quality of this research in the 1860s can be appraised by the fact that their determined density differs by less than 0.1 g/cm³ and the melting point by less than 1 °C from the presently accepted values.
column2: 19 世纪 60 年代的这项研究的质量值得肯定：因为他们确定的密度与目前的公认值相差小于 0.1 g/cm³，而熔点则相差小于 1 °C。

column1: The slight radioactivity of rubidium was discovered in 1908, but that was before the theory of isotopes was established in 1910, and the low level of activity (half-life greater than 10¹⁰ years) made interpretation complicated.
column2: 铷的轻微放射性是在 1908 年发现的，但这是在 1910 年同位素理论建立之前，而且其低水平的活性（半衰期大于 10¹⁰ 年）导致解释起来相当复杂。

column1: The now proven decay of ⁸⁷Rb to stable ⁸⁷Sr through beta decay was still under discussion in the late 1940s.
column2: 现在已经证实的 ⁸⁷Rb 通过贝塔衰变，衰变到稳定的 ⁸⁷Sr 的过程在 20 世纪 40 年代后期仍在讨论中。

column1: Rubidium had minimal industrial value before the 1920s.
column2: 在 20 世纪 20 年代以前，铷的工业价值很小。

column1: Since then, the most important use of rubidium is research and development, primarily in chemical and electronic applications.
column2: 从那以后，铷的最重要用途是研究和开发，主要用于化学和电子应用。

column1: The history of the tea processing corresponds intimately with the role that tea played in Chinese society and the preferred methods of its consumption in ancient Chinese society.
column2: 茶叶的加工史与茶叶在中国社会扮演的角色以及中国古代社会偏好的茶叶消费方式密切相关。

column1: Variations of these processing techniques are still used in modern tea processing albeit being far more mechanized.
column2: 这些加工技术的变型在现代茶叶加工中仍旧使用，只是机械化程度更高。

column1: The ancient Chinese society first encountered the tea plant in what is now southern China and processed it as another medicinal herb for use in Chinese herbology.
column2: 中国古代社会最先在现在的中国南方发现茶树，并将其加工成另一种草药，用于中草药学。

column1: The processing technique used to process fresh tea leaves was to immediately steam the fresh tea leaves and dry them for preservation, which is likely the most ancient Chinese form of tea leaf processing.
column2: 用于加工鲜茶叶的加工技术是，立即将鲜茶叶蒸青并烘干以便保存，这可能是中国最古老的茶叶加工方式。

column1: This processing method was perfected near the end of the Han Dynasty (206 BCE-220 CE) and produced a dried tea that would be classified today as "green tea" and quite similar to modern Japanese sencha.
column2: 这种加工方法在汉朝末期（公元前 206 年至公元 220 年）得到完善，制成了今天归类为“绿茶”的干茶，它与现代的日本煎茶很相似。

column1: For consumption, dried tea leaves were either decocted with water around with other herbs, or ground into a powder to be taken straight, or in a liquid in the manner of matcha.
column2: 食用时，干茶叶或用水与其他草药一同煎煮，或磨成粉末直接服用，或以抹茶的方式加入液体中。

column1: With the increase of tea's use in Chinese herbology, production methods changed, where the processed green tea leaves were not immediately dried after steaming.
column2: 随着茶叶在中草药学中使用量的增加，制作方法发生改变，加工后的绿茶叶在蒸青后不会立即烘干。

column1: Rather the steamed tea leaves were first pulverized into a paste form, with the paste then formed in moulds and slowly dried into brick tea, a technique well described by Lu Yu in his work The Classic of Tea.
column2: 蒸青后的茶叶先磨成糊状，然后将糊状物在模具中定型并缓慢烘干成茶砖，这项技术在陆羽所著的《茶经》中进行了详细介绍。

column1: Tender leaves and leaf buds were generally not used, as older mature tea leaves were preferred for tea production.
column2: 嫩叶和叶芽一般不会使用，因为较老的成熟茶叶更适合制茶。

column1: Some tea bricks were also produced from mature whole leaves, which typically required the use of a cooked rice slurry (米湯) to bind the tea brick together.
column2: 一些茶砖也由成熟的整片叶子制成，这通常需要使用煮熟的米汤将茶砖粘合在一起。

column1: The preference of producing tea in brick form possibly stems from the fact that it can be more easily transported and stored.
column2: 人们喜欢将茶叶制成茶砖可能是因为它更容易运输和储存。

column1: The use of steam in fixation (殺青) of tea leaf enzymes is an important step in processing tea, with the leaves quickly cooled down and then undergoing further processing.
column2: 利用蒸汽对茶叶酶进行杀青是加工茶叶的重要步骤，在这个步骤中，茶叶迅速冷却，然后进行进一步加工。

column1: The less tightly controlled methods of it in the past resulted in the creation of "yellow tea" when the tea leaves were over-steamed for fixation or were not quickly spread out, doused with water and cooled.
column2: 过去这种控制不太严格的方法导致在茶叶过度蒸煮以杀青或未迅速散开、浇水和冷却时会形成“黄茶”。

column1: Although green tea was the most popular in Lu Yu's time, he personally considered yellow tea to be superior to green.
column2: 虽然在陆羽时代，最受欢迎的是绿茶，但他个人认为黄茶要优于绿茶。

column1: Even when the leaves were quickly cooled, if they are left in piles (渥堆) for too long before processing, the leaves will begin to undergo microbial fermentation to produce "post-fermented tea".
column2: 即使在茶叶迅速冷却后，如果在加工前渥堆时间过久，茶叶也会开始进行微生物发酵，产生“后发酵茶”。

column1: This technique is somewhat similar to composting, albeit tightly controlled, and still used in the production of Liu'an tea (安徽六安籃茶) and was more recently introduced for the production of the "ripe" type pu-erh tea.
column2: 这种技术有点类似于堆肥，虽然受到严格控制，但仍被用于生产安徽六安篮茶，最近则被用于生产属于“熟茶”类型的普洱茶。

column1: The production of tea in brick forms and their storage also resulted in another type of post-fermented tea, which was produced by aging.
column2: 茶砖在生产及储存过程中还能够演变成另一种类型的后发酵茶，它是通过陈化生产的。

column1: The long transport and storage times of the day unwittingly allowed the tea bricks to undergo prolonged exposure to the elements and to various microflora, which resulted in the aging, oxidation, and fermentation of green brick teas.
column2: 一天中漫长的运输和储存会不知不觉地使茶砖长时间暴露在各种元素和各种微生物区系中，从而导致绿茶茶砖发生陈化、氧化和发酵。

column1: A brick of green tea that had been stored and aged into post-fermented tea was charred over charcoal to rid it of the layer of detritus, dust, and shiny multicoloured growths before being broken down into a powder, cooked, and then consumed.
column2: 将经储存并陈化制成的后发酵茶的绿茶茶砖放在木炭上烧焦，以去除碎屑、灰尘和闪亮多彩的杂质，然后即可将其拆成粉末、烹煮并饮用。

column1: By the end of Tang Dynasty (618-907CE) green, yellow, and post-fermented tea was commonly used in China and moved from purely being used in herbology to becoming a beverage drunk for pleasure.
column2: 唐朝末年（公元 618-907 年），绿茶、黄茶和后发酵茶在中国受到普遍使用，并从纯粹用作草药转变为休闲饮品。

column1: New Directions' director Will Schuester (Matthew Morrison) suspects that cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester (Jane Lynch) has been colluding with rival glee clubs, and visits the Jane Addams Academy for girls recently released from juvenile detention.
column2: 新方向主管威尔·舒斯特（马修·莫里森饰）怀疑啦啦队教练苏·西尔维斯特（简·林奇饰）与竞争对手的欢乐合唱团勾结，并到简·亚当斯学院探访了最近从少年拘留所获释的女孩们。

column1: When their club director Grace Hitchens (Eve) reveals the extent of the school's under-funding, Will invites her club to perform in the McKinley High auditorium.
column2: 当他们的合唱团主管格蕾丝·希钦斯（伊芙饰）透露学校资金不足的程度时，威尔邀请她的合唱团在麦金利高中礼堂演出。

column1: Will is intimidated by their opposition, but Rachel (Lea Michele) assures him that the girls are using the power of "hairography"—frequent, dramatic hair-tossing—to distract from the fact their singing and dancing ability is limited. Will purchases wigs for New Directions and has them utilize hairography themselves, performing a mash-up of "Hair" and "Crazy in Love".
column2: 威尔被她们的反对声吓到了，但瑞秋（莉亚·米歇尔饰）向他保证，女孩们将动用“发型”的力量（频繁、夸张地甩头发）来转移人们对她们唱歌和跳舞能力有限这一事实的注意力。威尔为新方向购买了假发，并让他们自己能够利用起发型，完成了《Hair》与《Crazy in Love》的混音表演。

column1: Dalton Rumba (Michael Hitchcock), glee club director at Haverbrook School for the Deaf, feels slighted by the invitation Will extended to the Jane Addams Academy, and arranges for his own club to also perform at McKinley High.
column2: 哈维布鲁克聋哑学校的欢乐合唱团主管道尔顿·伦巴（迈克尔·希区柯克饰）因威尔向简·亚当斯学院发出邀请而感觉受到轻视，并安排他自己的合唱团也前往麦金利高中进行演出。

column1: His club duets with New Directions on John Lennon's "Imagine", and Will realizes that the new mash-up and hairography routine is not working.
column2: 他的合唱团与新方向合唱了约翰·列侬的《Imagine》，威尔意识到新的混音和发型这种惯用做法将不起作用。

column1: He removes it from the club's set-list, replacing it with a performance of "True Colors".
column2: 他将它从合唱团的演出曲目中删除，取而代之的是表演了一首《True Colors》。

column1: Unbeknownst to Will, Sue reveals two songs from New Directions' line-up for sectionals to Grace and Dalton, suggesting they have their own clubs perform them to gain an edge in the competition.
column2: 威尔不知道的是，苏向格蕾丝和道尔顿透露了新方向节目阵容中的两首歌曲，建议他们让自己的合唱团表演这些歌曲以在比赛中获得优势。

column1: Quinn (Dianna Agron) begins to doubt her decision to give her baby to Will's wife Terri (Jessalyn Gilsig), and re-considers her stance on raising the baby with Puck (Mark Salling) instead of Finn (Cory Monteith).
column2: 奎因（黛安娜·阿格隆饰）开始怀疑她将孩子交给威尔的妻子泰瑞（杰萨琳·吉尔西格饰）的决定，并重新考虑了她与帕克（马克·萨林饰）而非芬恩（科里·蒙特斯饰）抚养孩子的立场。

column1: She tells Terri she wants to keep the baby, but in an effort to change her mind, Terri's sister Kendra (Jennifer Aspen) has Quinn babysit her three unruly sons.
column2: 她告诉泰瑞她想留下孩子，但为了改变她的主意，泰瑞的姐姐肯德拉（詹妮弗·阿斯彭饰）让奎因照看她三个任性的儿子。

column1: Quinn invites Puck to babysit with her and the two bond, however when Quinn discovers that Puck spent the evening sexting his ex-girlfriend Santana (Naya Rivera), she re-commits to having the baby adopted, believing her daughter deserves a better father.
column2: 奎因邀请帕克与她一起照看这两个累赘，然而当奎因发现帕克整晚都在给他的前女友桑塔纳（娜雅·里维拉饰）发色情短信时，她认为她的女儿应该有一位更好的父亲，因此重新承诺让孩子被人收养。

column1: Kurt (Chris Colfer) gives Rachel a make-over, ostensibly to help her attract Finn, but in reality attempting to sabotage her chances with him.
column2: 科特（克里斯·柯尔弗饰）给瑞秋化了妆，表面上是为了帮她吸引芬恩，但实际上是在试图破坏她和他在一起的机会。

column1: Finn is unimpressed with Rachel's new look before telling her he remembered having the conversation with Kurt about what he liked in girls.
column2: 芬恩对瑞秋的新面貌无动于衷，然后告诉她他记得曾与科特谈论过他喜欢女孩的哪些特质。

column1: Rachel confronts Kurt, stating that even if he is in love with Finn, she will always have a better chance "because [she's] a girl".
column2: 瑞秋对峙科特，说即使他爱上了芬恩，她的机会也总是更大，“因为[她]是个女孩”。

column1: But Kurt tells her that they are both kidding themselves: Finn is in love with Quinn and nothing will change that.
column2: 但科特告诉她，他们俩都是在自欺欺人：芬恩爱上了奎因，什么也改变不了这一点。

column1: Hairography was written by series creator Ian Brennan, and directed by Bill D'Elia.
column2: 《Hairography》由剧集创作者伊安·布瑞南编写，由比尔·德埃利亚执导。

column1: Recurring characters who appear in the episode are glee club members Brittany (Heather Morris), Santana Lopez (Rivera), Mike Chang (Harry Shum Jr.) and Matt Rutherford (Dijon Talton), Terri's sister Kendra Giardi (Aspen), Kendra's husband Phil (Michael Loeffelholz), and their triplet sons (Aidan, Ethan and Ben Freedman).
column2: 这一集中反复出现的角色为欢乐合唱团成员布列塔尼（海瑟·莫里斯饰）、桑塔纳·洛佩兹（里维拉饰）、张迈克（岑勇康饰）、马特·卢瑟福（迪让·陶顿）、泰瑞的姐姐肯德拉·贾迪（阿斯彭饰）、肯德拉的丈夫菲尔（迈克尔·洛弗霍尔兹饰）和他们的三胞胎儿子（艾丹、伊桑和本·弗里德曼饰）。

column1: Hitchcock guest-stars as rival glee club director Dalton Rumba, and rapper Eve plays another club director, Grace Hitchens.
column2: 希区柯克客串出演了竞争对手欢乐合唱团的主管道尔顿·伦巴，而说唱歌手伊芙则饰演了另一位合唱团主管格蕾丝·希钦斯。

column1: So You Think You Can Dance contestants Katee Shean, Kherington Payne and Comfort Fedoke appear as members of Grace's club.
column2: 《舞魅天下》的参赛者凯蒂·谢恩、科林顿·佩恩和康福特·费达克现身饰演了格蕾丝合唱团的成员。

column1: Eve was contracted to appear in two episodes of Glee, having been offered the role of Grace after Whitney Houston declined to appear.
column2: 在惠特尼·休斯顿拒绝参演后，伊芙签约出演两集《欢乐合唱团》，饰演格蕾丝一角。

column1: Discussing her casting, Eve stated: "I got asked and I'd heard the buzz about the show.
column2: 在谈及她的角色分配时，伊芙说：“有人问过我，我听说了人们关于这个节目的议论。

column1: SH-58 was first commissioned some time between March 1, 1930 and December 1, 1931.
column2: SH-58 于 1930 年 3 月 1 日至 1931 年 12 月 1 日之间的某一时间首次投入使用。

column1: The original extent of the route was much shorter than the present highway.
column2: 这条公路的原始长度比现今的高速公路要短得多。

column1: In 1931, SH-58 was a dirt road extending from SH-8 east of Fairview north to Ringwood.
column2: SH-58 在 1931 年还是一条土路，从费尔维尤北部的 SH-8 东段延伸至灵伍德。

column1: Prior to receiving the SH-58 designation, this section of road was part of US-164 and the first SH-13.
column2: 在被冠以 SH-58 这一名称之前，该路段是 US-164 的部分路段和 SH-13 的起始路段。

column1: On May 29, 1930, AASHO approved an extension of US-60 that replaced US-164.
column2: 1930 年 5 月 29 日，AASHO 批准了延长 US-60，以取代 US-164。

column1: When US-60 replaced US-164 through the area, it was changed to the more westerly route it takes in the present day.
column2: 当 US-60 取代 US-164 贯通该地区时，它变成了如今更加偏西的公路。

column1: The section of old U.S. highway that no longer had a designation became SH-58.
column2: 旧的美国高速公路中不再具备冠名的路段变成了 SH-58。

column1: Throughout the 1930s, SH-58 was expanded in both directions.
column2: 20 世纪 30 年代，SH-58 向两个方向进行了扩建。

column1: The first addition to the highway came during the first half of 1932, when the highway was extended north to Helena.
column2: 高速公路于 1932 年上半年进行了首次增建，向北延伸至海伦娜。

column1: No east–west highway existed at this point yet, leading to a spur end.
column2: 此时还没有东西向高速公路，通往支线尽头。

column1: The highway was extended to the south, replacing SH-44, to Canton on March 29, 1937. SH-58 was extended north to the Kansas state line sometime between April 1937 and April 1938.
column2: 高速公路于 1937 年 3 月 29 日向南延伸至坎顿，取代了 SH-44。SH-58 于 1937 年 4 月至 1938 年 4 月之间的某一时间向北延伸至堪萨斯州州道。

column1: This final extension brought SH-58's northern section to its present-day termini, and no major changes to the northern section have occurred since.
column2: 最后这次扩建将 SH-58 的北路段带到了如今的终点，北路段此后便没有发生过重大变化。

column1: SH-58's southern section was first established on October 16, 1945, when SH-54 was given a new alignment further to the west; its old alignment was redesignated as SH-58.
column2: SH-58 的南段首建于 1945 年 10 月 16 日，当时 SH-54 被分配了更靠西的新路线；它的旧路线被重新冠名为 SH-58。

column1: The original routing of SH-58's southern section began at US-277 in Cyril, continued west through Apache, and turned north at the present-day western intersection of with SH-19.
column2: SH-58 南段的最初路线始于西里尔的 US-277，继续向西穿过阿帕奇，并在如今与 SH-19 西段的交汇处向北转。

column1: SH-58 continued north along its present alignment to Hydro, where it ended at US-66/SH-1.
column2: SH-58 如今的路线继续向北延伸至海德鲁，以 US-66/SH-1 为终点。

column1: In 1955, SH-19 was established through southern Caddo County, taking over the east–west section of SH-58.
column2: SH-19 建于 1955 年，贯穿卡多县南部，接管了 SH-58 的东西段。

column1: Thus, SH-58 was truncated to where it intersected with SH-19 (the present day western end of their concurrency).
column2: 因此，SH-58 在与 SH-19 交汇处（如今为它们的共同西端点）截断。

column1: SH-58 was extended to its present terminus north of Hydro the next year.
column2: 次年，SH-58 延伸至位于海德鲁北部的当前终点。

column1: The highway was further extended in 1964, bringing the southern terminus to its present location near Medicine Park.
column2: 高速公路于 1964 年进一步延长，将南终点带到了如今的医药公园附近位置。

column1: No further routing changes have occurred since then.
column2: 此后没有发生过进一步路线变更。

column1: Live at Wembley was filmed at the London's Wembley Arena show of the Dangerously in Love Tour, Beyoncé's first international solo tour, on November 10, 2003.
column2: 2003 年 11 月 10 日，伦敦温布利体育馆放映的《濒危爱情之旅》中播放了《温布利的生活》，这是碧昂斯的第一次国际独自旅行。

column1: The tour supported her debut solo album, Dangerously in Love (2003).
column2: 这次旅行让她出版了首张专辑《濒危爱情》（2003 年）。

column1: Most of the songs on Live at Wembley originate from that album, but it also contains a medley of past songs by her former group Destiny's Child and two soundtrack singles: "Work It Out" and "Summertime".
column2: 《温布利的生活》中的大多数歌曲都是都源自该专辑，但还包含她前一组 Destiny's Child 中的歌曲以及两首原声单曲：“Work It Out”和“Summertime”。

column1: The second disc of Live at Wembley contains three previously unreleased studio recorded songs, including a cover of Rose Royce's "Wishing on a Star", and one remix each of "Crazy in Love", "Baby Boy" and "Naughty Girl".
column2: 《温布利的生活》的第二张碟包含三首以前在录音棚录制但未发行的歌曲，其中包括罗斯-罗伊斯翻唱的“Wishing on a Star”以及重新合成的“Crazy in Love”、“Baby Boy”和“Naughty Girl”。

column1: Behind-the-scenes footage can be also seen on the DVD.
column2: 在 DVD 上还可以看到幕后花絮。

column1: The concert audio was mixed by Rick Camp, the same engineer who mixed at the concert venues.
column2: 演唱会音频由雷克-坎普合成，他也是负责音乐会现场混音的工程师。

column1: It is uncommon for mix engineers to specialize in both live and recorded mixing.
column2: 在现场和录音混音两方面都擅长的混音工程师很少。

column1: For Camp, "Mixing Beyoncé is a pleasure because she's a real singer and makes it easy.
column2: 对坎普来说，“为碧昂斯混音很愉快，因为她是一个真正的歌手，所以混音很简单。

column1: There is hardly an overdub on this project — it's 95 percent live Beyoncé." He further talked about the collaboration with Beyoncé with Mix magazine, saying: "In my 22 years of mixing, I've never come across anyone who could deliver like she does: vocally and her ability to do a show.
column2: 这个项目几乎没有原带加录 — 95% 都是碧昂斯的现场演唱。”他进一步谈到了与碧昂斯在《Mix》杂志中的合作，说：“在我 22 年的混音生涯中，从来没有遇到这样出色的歌手：她的声音和表演能力令人难以置信。

column1: I've seen this young woman run across a 60-foot stage, hit every note and never miss a thing.
column2: 我看到这位年轻的女士在 60 英尺的舞台上，每一个音准都把握到位，从来没有错过。

column1: And that makes my job so much easier."
column2: 这样我们的工作就变得非常简单。”

column1: On stage, Beyoncé was backed by several male and female dancers performing choreography during the show.
column2: 在舞台上表演时，有几个男女舞蹈演员为碧昂斯伴舞。

column1: DJ Diamond who served as a DJ during the performances and a backing band provided the music.
column2: DJ 戴蒙德在表演时担任 DJ，伴奏乐队提供音乐。

column1: The performance starts with footage of the crowd during the concert cheering before the appearance of Beyoncé.
column2: 表演开始时，是碧昂斯出场前现场观众欢呼的镜头。

column1: The curtains are lifted to reveal the stage and Beyoncé appears in red clothes hanging upside down while being taken to a sofa on the stage with a harness singing "Baby Boy".
column2: 帘幕升起，现出舞台，碧昂斯一袭红衣倒垂，一边唱着“Baby Boy”，一边被安全带引向舞台上的沙发。

column1: She is backed by a big screen and several dancers on stage who perform a choreography around her.
column2: 她背后是一个大屏幕，舞台上有几名舞蹈演员伴舞。

column1: She later starts dancing with them as the song plays and a breakdown towards the end is also featured.
column2: 后来在歌曲播放时，她开始与舞蹈演员共舞，并以跺脚曳步舞一直到结束。

column1: She asks from the girls in the crowd to sing to "Naughty Girl" as she dances with background dancers while the words "Naughty Girl" are displayed on the screen behind her.
column2: 当她与后台舞蹈演员共舞时，观众中有女孩要她唱“Naughty Girl”，同时她身后的屏幕上显示“Naughty Girl”。

column1: Towards the end of the song she performs portions of Vanity 6's song "Nasty Girl" (1982) as a short dance break.
column2: 在歌曲快要结束时，舞蹈之间有一个短暂的休息，她演唱了 Vanity 6 的歌曲“Nasty Girl”(1982) 的一部分。

column1: The lights are turned off and later silhouettes of Beyoncé and her dancers appear performing a choreography in front of the screen which is colored white while a backing track is played.
column2: 灯光熄灭，碧昂斯和伴舞的身影显现，在白色的荧屏前跳舞，同时播放伴奏曲。

column1: Stelmach's policy on health care was highlighted by his removal of the province's health care premiums effective the end of 2008.
column2: 从 2008 年底开始取消省内医疗保险费，突出了施特默对于医疗保健的政策。

column1: Critics had denounced the premiums as being regressive, both because they were the same amount regardless of the payer's income and because people with better-paying jobs often had their premiums covered by their employer.
column2: 批评家谴责保险费是退步，因为无论支付者的收入为何，缴纳的金额都一样，而且工资高的人通常会有雇主给他们支付保险费。

column1: The opposition Liberal and New Democratic parties had long called for their removal.
column2: 对立的自由党和新民党都一直呼吁取消保险费。

column1: This elimination was announced in a throne speech immediately before the dissolution of the legislature for the 2008 election, although it was initially promised to take effect by 2012.
column2: 在 2008 年立法会选举解散之前的施政报告中宣布取消保险费，但最初承诺在 2012 年之前生效。

column1: During this campaign, Stelmach promised to increase the capacity of Alberta universities to train doctors and nurses over four years, eventually resulting in the graduation of 225 more doctors, 350 more registered nurses, and 220 licensed practical nurses.
column2: 在此活动期间，施特默承诺阿尔伯特大学将会扩招，以培训四年制的医生和护士，最终多输送 225 名医生、350 名注册护士和 220 名持证实习护士。

column1: After the registrar of the Alberta College of Physicians and Surgeons called the plan unfeasible, Health Minister Dave Hancock clarified that most of the increase would in fact come from the immigration of foreign doctors to Alberta, rather than from in-province training.
column2: 在阿尔伯特医科大学注册主任表示计划不可行之后，卫生部长戴夫-汉考克澄清，大多数增长实际会来自外籍医生移民到阿尔伯特，而不是省内培训。

column1: Following the election, Stelmach's new Minister of Health, Ron Liepert, released the government's new health plan.
column2: 在选举后，施特默的新任卫生部长润-利伯特发布了政府的新健康计划。

column1: In it, Liepert refused to characterize the problems in the health care system as being the result of doctor shortages, and instead promised structural reforms.
column2: 其中，利伯特拒绝将健康保健系统的问题归为医生短缺的结果，而承诺进行结构性的改革。

column1: He indicated that these may include consolidating health authorities, closing rural hospitals, and de-listing some health services from coverage under the province's public health insurance scheme.
column2: 他表示，这些可能包括合并卫生机构、关闭农村医院，以及从省公共医疗保险方案中删除一些给付的医疗服务。

column1: In May, the government took the first step in implementing these structural reforms by combining the province's nine health authorities into one health "superboard".
column2: 五月，政府将省九个卫生机构合并为一个卫生“超级委员会”，迈出了结构性改革的第一步。

column1: In June 2008, three senior health officials announced that they would be leaving the province's employment at the expiration of their contracts in August.
column2: 2008 年 6 月，三名资深的卫生官员宣布，他们将在八月份合同到期后离开省卫生机构。

column1: Liepert blamed their departures on better offers from other employers, although New Democrat leader Brian Mason speculated that the government's health restructuring may have been to blame.
column2: 利伯特责备他们是因其他雇主提供更好的待遇而辞职，但新民党领导人布莱恩-梅森猜测政府的卫生机构重组可能是罪魁祸首。

column1: Detractors pointed out that the optics of allowing the employees to depart for more money elsewhere soon after the government had approved a substantial pay hike for cabinet ministers were not good.
column2: 恶意批评者指出，在政府批准为内阁大臣加薪后不久又批评雇员离职到其他地方谋求高薪是不道德的。

column1: As the province's fiscal situation worsened in late 2008, the government adapted its health policy.
column2: 在 2008 年后期，随着省财政状况的恶化，政府调整了卫生政策。

column1: In December, Liepert announced a new seniors drug plan that made drugs free for seniors making less than $21,325 but required those making more to pay as much as $7,500 for their drugs.
column2: 十二月，利伯特颁布了新的老年人药物计划，为收入低于 $21,325 的老年人提供免费药物，但收入高的需要为药物支付高达 $7,500。

column1: In response to protests from seniors, he amended the plan in April 2009 to reduce both the income level at which seniors would have to start paying and the amount which those seniors would have to pay.
column2: 为回应老年人的抗议，他在 2009 年 4 月修订了计划，降低了老年人开始支付的收入水平标准，以及这些老年人必须支付的金额。

column1: Liepert said that the plan, $10 million more expensive than the one he had announced in December, would see 60% of seniors pay less than they did under the status quo.
column2: 利伯特说，这个计划比他在十二月份宣布的计划要多支出 1 千万美元，60% 的老年人会比目前支付更少的费用。

column1: The same month, Stelmach's government's budget revealed changes to which medical services it would cover: those de-listed included chiropractic services, at an annual savings of $53 million, and sex change operations, at an annual savings of $700,000.
column2: 当月，施特默的政府预算显示了其涵盖的医疗服务的变化：剔出名单的包括脊椎指压按摩服务，每年可节省 5300 万美元，以及变性手术，每年可节省 70 万美元。

column1: While the Canada Health Act requires the federal government to financially penalize provinces that do not support all "medically necessary" procedures, Liepert maintained that the de-listed services were not "medically necessary" from the perspective of the Act, and said that he anticipated no trouble from the federal government.
column2: 虽然《加拿大卫生法案》要求联邦政府从财政上处罚不支持所有“医疗必需”程序的省份，但利伯特坚称剔出名单的服务从法案的角度来看不是“医疗必需”，并且预计联邦政府不会找麻烦。

column1: During the 2009 H1N1 pandemic, Stelmach initially announced that the government would make the vaccine available to all Albertans, though vaccine shortages resulted in a limited number of clinics, which experienced long lineups.
column2: 2009 年 H1N1 疫情期间，施特默最初宣布，政府将为所有阿尔伯特人提供疫苗，虽然疫苗的短缺导致了诊所不足，人们要排很长的队。

column1: Wright died at home in London of cancer on 15 September 2008, aged 65.
column2: 2008 年 9 月 15 日，怀特因癌症死于伦敦的家中，享年 65 岁。

column1: At the time of his death, he had been working on a new solo album, which was thought to comprise a series of instrumental pieces.
column2: 直到他去世，他一直在致力于新的个人专辑，据说其中包含一系列器乐。

column1: The surviving members of Pink Floyd paid Wright tribute.
column2: 平克-弗洛伊德的其他成员向怀特致敬。

column1: Waters said "it is hard to overstate the importance of his musical voice in the Pink Floyd of the '60s and '70s" and was happy that they had managed to reunite for Live 8. Mason said Wright's contributions to Floyd were under-rated, and that his playing "was the sound that knitted it all together", comparing his "quiet one" status in the band to George Harrison.
column2: 沃特斯说“他动听的声音对 60 和 70 年代的平克-弗洛伊德的重要性难以估量”，并且对他们因 Live 8 重新聚到一起感到高兴。梅森说怀特对弗洛伊德的贡献被低估了，他的演奏“是集大成的声音”，将他在乐队中的“安静的一个”身份比作乔治-哈里森。

column1: Gilmour called him "my musical partner and my friend", praised the ability of the two men's voices to blend, such as on "Echoes".
column2: 吉尔莫称他为“我的音乐伙伴，我的朋友”，赞扬了他混合两个男人的声音的能力，例如在“Echoes”中。

column1: Wright's death brought Pink Floyd to a formal end, with Gilmour re-iterating that it would be wrong to resume touring without him.
column2: 怀特的去世宣告平克-弗洛伊德正式终止，吉尔莫反复说，没有了怀特，继续巡回演出是错误的。

column1: On the day of Wright's death, Elton John, while playing a concert in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, Canada dedicated the song "Believe" to him.
column2: 在怀特去世的当天，正在加拿大萨斯喀彻温萨斯卡通演奏音乐会的艾尔顿-约翰为他献上歌曲“Believe”。

column1: On 23 September, Gilmour performed "Remember a Day", a Wright composition from Pink Floyd's second album, A Saucerful of Secrets, on a live broadcast of Later... with Jools Holland on BBC Two as a tribute to Wright.
column2: 9 月 23 日，吉尔莫表演了“Remember a Day”，这是怀特在平克-弗洛伊德的第二张专辑 A Saucerful of Secrets 中的作品，后来与朱尔斯-霍兰德在 BBC Two 上现场直播，向怀特致敬。

column1: In an interview later on in the show, Gilmour said that Wright had intended to perform with him that day, but that he had texted Gilmour a couple of weeks before his death to advise him that he would not be well enough to attend.
column2: 后来在节目中采访时，吉尔莫说怀特本计划当天与他一起表演，但他在去世前几个星期给吉尔莫发了一条信息，表示健康状况使得他无法参加。

column1: Wright's main influence was jazz, particularly Miles Davis and John Coltrane.
column2: 怀特的主要影响力是爵士乐，特别是迈尔士-戴维斯和约翰-柯川。

column1: He never considered himself a typical songwriter, preferring to create whole albums of music with a theme, later saying "if the words came out like the music, and we didn't have anything else to do, then quite a few would be written".
column2: 他从来没有将自己看作是一个典型的作曲家，更喜欢创作整张某一主题的音乐专辑，后来他说“如果说出来的话像音乐，我们就没有其他的事要做，只需要写下来就行”。

column1: A number of compositions credited to Wright came out of improvisation and randomly trying ideas, some of which were picked up enthusiastically by his band mates.
column2: 怀特的很多作品来自于即兴创作和随机的想法，有些是他的乐队成员热心发现的。

column1: Wright later said "I just play and don't really think about what I'm doing, I just let it happen".
column2: 怀特后来说“我只是在玩，没有细想过我在做什么，顺其自然而已”。

column1: Of all the Pink Floyd members, Wright was the most reserved, sitting down behind the keyboards and concentrating on the music.
column2: 在所有平克-弗洛伊德成员中，怀特是最少言寡语的，总是坐在键盘后面专注于音乐。

column1: In the 1970s, Wright listened to some contemporary progressive rock bands, and particularly liked early Peter Gabriel-fronted Genesis.
column2: 在 1970 年代，怀特听了一些当代新潮摇滚乐队的演奏，尤其是早期的彼得-盖布维尔面对的 Genesis。

column1: He later asked some of the musicians in Gabriel's solo touring band to play on Broken China.
column2: 他后来要求 Gabriel 巡回表演乐队的一些音乐家在 Broken China 演奏。

column1: Wright enjoyed playing the organ, and considered the style he used in Pink Floyd to be unique.
column2: 怀特喜欢演奏管风琴，认为他在平克-弗洛伊德采用的风格是独一无二的。

column1: He played solos in the early part of Floyd's career, frequently using Egyptian scales, such as on "Matilda Mother" or "Set the Controls for the Heart of the Sun".
column2: 他在弗洛伊德职业生涯早期是独奏，经常使用埃及音阶，例如在“Matilda Mother”或“Set the Controls for the Heart of the Sun”中。

column1: His jazz background led to him being interested in free form music, with adherence to tempo being less important.
column2: 爵士乐背景让他对自由形式的音乐感兴趣，在他看来，节奏不那么重要。

column1: Later, he was more interested in complementing each piece with organ, electric piano or synthesizer as a backing instrument, while still featuring occasional solos.
column2: 后来，他更有兴趣使用管风琴、电子钢琴或合成器作为支持乐器来补充每个部分，偶尔仍然会独奏。

column1: Production on the episode began on September 14, 2004, and ran through to September 22.
column2: 剧集的制作始于 2004 年 9 月 14 日，持续到 9 月 22 日。

column1: The standing sets were used for the first three days of filming.
column2: 常备的布景配置用于前三天的拍摄。

column1: Further sets were created to represent the Vulcan Embassy and portions of the Forge.
column2: 为呈现 Vulcan Embassy 和 Forge 部分，创建了更多布景配置。

column1: The final two days were filmed on site in Simi Valley in southern California, which doubled as the main areas of the Forge.
column2: 最后两天在南加利福尼亚的 Simi 山谷现场拍摄，那里还可以被当作 Forge 的主要区域。

column1: The property used in the valley was owned by mining company P.W. Gillibrand, which was near property owned by Vulcan Materials Company.
column2: 山谷中使用地产归矿业公司 P.W. Gillibrand 所有，靠近 Vulcan Materials 公司的地产。

column1: Optical effects were added to represent the firestorm and the sehlat.
column2: 为呈现风暴和泰迪熊，加入了光学特效。

column1: The CGI sehlat was based on one which previously appeared in Star Trek: The Animated Series episode "Yesteryear".
column2: CGI 泰迪熊基于以前出现在 Star Trek：动画系列剧集“Yesteryear”中的形象。

column1: Visual effects producer Dan Curry said that the team "looked at the animated series and it just looked nice and pleasant, so I did a couple of sketches to do a reinterpretation of it to make it look scary, but not be too radical a departure from the original".
column2: 视觉特效制作人丹-柯瑞说，摄制组“看了这部系列动画片，看起来很漂亮，令人很愉快，于是我做了几幅草图，想将其重新诠释为看起来很可怕的样子，但没有过于偏离原创”。

column1: Eden FX modelled the CGI under supervision by staff visual effects supervisor Art Codron.
column2: Eden FX 的视觉特效主管亚特-柯德龙的监督下做了 CGI 模型。

column1: Additional care was taken to create the fur so that close-ups could be used if required.
column2: 在制作皮毛的视觉效果时特别小心，因此在需要时可能会使用镜头特写。

column1: The only physical portion of the sehlat to be created was a single paw. "Yesteryear" was set in the Vulcan city Shi'Khar, which reappears in "The Forge", and it is also the first mention of the area on Vulcan called the Forge.
column2: 要制作的泰迪熊唯一的实物部分是一个爪子。“Yesteryear”是在 Vulcan 市 Shi'Khar 拍摄的，在“The Forge”再次出现，它也是 Vulcan 中第一个提到的地区，称之为 Forge。

column1: A further reference was made to "Vulcan's Forge" in the Deep Space Nine episode "Change of Heart".
column2: 此外，还参考了 Deep Space Nine 剧集“Change of Heart”中的“Vulcan's Forge”。

column1: The Forge and the following two episodes make reference to a time of savagery in Vulcan history known as the "Time of Awakening".
column2: “The Forge”和随后的两个剧集参考了 Vulcan 历史上称为“觉醒时代”的原始时期。

column1: This had been previously mentioned in the original series episodes "Balance of Terror", "All Our Yesterdays", and "The Savage Curtain", as well as The Next Generation episode "Gambit".
column2: 这之前在原始系列剧集“Balance of Terror”、“All Our Yesterdays”和“The Savage Curtain”以及 The Next Generation 剧集“Gambit”中提到过。

column1: The story mentioned the Vulcan T'Pau, who had previously appeared in The Original Series episode "Amok Time" presiding over the fight between Kirk and Spock, with the elder T'Pau portrayed by Celia Lovsky. Michael Reilly Burke returns as Koss, having previously appeared in the role in the season-four episode "Home".
column2: 故事提到了 Vulcan T'Pau，他之前也在原创系列剧集“Amok Time”中出现过，主持柯克与斯波克之间的战斗，还有西利亚-洛夫斯基描绘的长者 T'Pau。Michael Reilly Burke 作为 Koss 回来，之前出现在第四季剧集“Home”中。

column1: Robert Foxworth appears as Administrator V'Las, having previously appeared as Admiral Leyton in the Deep Space Nine episodes "Homefront" and "Paradise Lost".
column2: 罗伯特-福克沃斯作为管理员 V'Las 出现，之前在 Deep Space Nine 剧集“Homefront”和“Paradise Lost”中是作为 Admiral Leyton 出现的。

column1: Husband and wife duo Judith and Garfield Reeves-Stevens had previously written a number of Star Trek-related novels and books, including a series of collaborations with William Shatner and the novel Federation.
column2: 犹迪和加菲尔德-里夫斯-史蒂芬斯夫妻二人以前写过很多 Star Trek 相关的小说和书籍，包括与威廉-夏特纳的一系列合作以及小说 Federation。

column1: They had also written several nonfiction books on the behind-the-scenes productions of the Star Trek series such as Star Trek: Phase II - The Lost Series and Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Continuing Mission.
column2: 他们还写了几本非小说类图书，讲述了 Star Trek 系列制作幕后的故事，例如 Star Trek：Phase II - The Lost Series 和 Star Trek：The Next Generation - The Continuing Mission。

column1: The Forge was their first script together for a Star Trek series, but they had previously written scripts for other shows, including Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's The Lost World and Once a Thief.
column2: “The Forge”是他们第一个共同为 Star Trek 系列创作的剧本，但他们之前也为其他电影写过剧本，其中包括 Sir Arthur Conan Doyle 的 The Lost World 和 Once a Thief。

column1: They joined the Enterprise writing team shortly before working on the story for this episode which formed the first part of a planned "Vulcan arc".
column2: 他们加入了 Enterprise 写作团队，不久创作了这个剧集的故事，成为计划的“Vulcan arc”的第一部分。

column1: After reading an article about the iLoo, Andrew Cubitt, inventor of the similarly named i-Loo, wrote to The Inquirer stating that iLoo "sounds remarkably similar ... it now seems that the clever people at Microsoft have cottoned onto the idea and even call it the i-Loo, the same as mine!"
